choices: They finish working out, but then Grey finds something magical
They finish working out, but then Exvee makes Grey more envious
They keep working out though the whole day
1142.content:
"I'm no ordinary greymon." Sitting back against a tree was indeed a greymon, but had much more muscle than any normal digimon would. He murmurs inside his head once again, "It took me a while to get this big, but I can't help but feel I haven't reached my goal yet. There's actually someone else who I know very well who I've tried running up against, but at this point..."

A larger digimon suddenly lands behind the greymon and the tree, which turned out to be an exveemon! And boy was he big, the muscles all over his body showing off all on their own while he just stood there and greet the dinosaur digimon. "Hey Grey!"

"...between me and him...it's no contest.", the orange digimon replies to himself. He then manages to get up to greet his excited friend, "Hey Exvee."

Suddenly, the larger digimon sticks out his meaty arms. "How 'bout a big hug?"

The greymon hesitates, "No, wait!" Without warning, the massive digimon wraps his mighty arms around the dinosaur's body, practically smothering him and cracking the bones on his back. "ACK!", Grey manages to free himself from the blue dragon's grip. "Do you always have ta do this!?"

"Come on bud! It's time to workout!"

"Alright, Alright. but if you crush me to death I won't be able to work out anymore." Exveemon grins sheepishly and hold his hands out in apology.

"Sorry.. i just got carried away." Grey bends forward a little, and his spinal joints pop in several place and he breathes out a small sigh of relief.

"You get carried away every time, one of these days you are going to break my back." Exvee lets out a laugh and thumps Greymon teasingly on the back.

"Oh come off it Grey. You're too strong to get done in by a muscle hug." Grey grumbles irritably as he rolls his neck, bringing out another ound of popping joints.

"With you my strength wouldn't matter."

"Aww come on, I'm sorry Grey i promise I'll be more careful, now are we going to go work out or not?" Grey sighed in exhasperation and nodded.

"FIne We'll go working out, but if you try anything while i'm doing my reps i'll drop a dumbell on your foot, and i don't mean by accident." Grey watched Exvee mull over the thought for a moment and saw a small shudder pass over, before that same old smile returned.

"Okay I'll behave myself." Exvee began moving away, looking over his shoulder expectantly as Grey began following.

Exvee and Grey walked towards a two-story building. As they entered, they could smell sweat, adrenaline, and testosterone in the air. Exvee especially loved the smells mixing together. It pumped the blue dragon even more to work his muscles to be bigger. Exvee grabbed Grey's shoulder and pointed to the weight room. "Come on, bro!" said Exvee. "Let's break some sweat!" As much as he loved working out with his best friend, Grey didn't always share his enthusiasm in working out. Exvee was clearly more passionate in it. Grey thought he would in more into it too if he had the same muscle results like Exvee.

Grey went over to the dumbbell rack and picked up a 200 pound dumbbell in each hand. He then started pumping his arms. He got lost in his several reps as he could feel the blood in his arms warming and the veins in his biceps pumping more blood. Grey smiled to himself as the warmth invigorated him to get going and keep trying harder. He didn't notice what his blue dragon bro was doing.

Exvee was also doing dumbbells but each weighed 500 pounds. Each rep made his biceps swell to godly proportions. Exvee grinned and grunted happily to himself to see his muscles in action and to feel the same warmth in his body that Grey was feeling. Exvee felt like he could do this forever, just keep lifting and keep growing to get stronger. Grey turned to notice Exvee in his workout and couldn't help but fell a sense of envy.
1142.title: Greymon's Story

11421.content:
Although it was tough lifting and noticing Exvee's large stature, the two finally came to a stop, but with another job well done. Okay, it was mainly just for Exvee, but Grey did an okay job too. Grey has been trying to become as big as his bestest pal, but it just doesn't seem to happening as fast as he hoped it would. The orange dino sits himself on a large stump, and then let's out a rather loud sigh. Exvee turns to his sweatin' friend, "Feelin' the burn?"

"And then some.", Grey replied. "But, I kinda feel like I'm not getting anywhere now with my growth."

Exvee sighs himself, "Ugh, not this again..."

"I mean it.", Grey speaks up. "I don't know if it's your digital form, but you've managed to get as big as you are in only a year. Me, it's been twice as long."

The blue winged dragon walks up to his bro, "Maybe it's because you're always trying too hard, or not trying hard enough. OR, you just can't wait to get better results.", Exvee replied with a flex of his thick bicep. "You know how long it took to buff up those arms of yours? As a T-rex digimon, that's really impressive."

"Yeah...I guess..." The greymon gets up on his feet, "I'm gonna go for a walk."

"Great!", Exvee exclaimed, "That'd be a great start for you leg workout later on."

Grey took a deep breath in the cool air. However, it wasn't enough to put his frustration and jealousy at ease. He couldn't stay mad at his bro, his best friend. Grey was just mad at the slow progress he was making. Grey rubbed his eyes out of stress. Maybe Exvee was right. Maybe he was trying too hard. Grey's negative thoughts were halted by a striking pain from his foot.

"Ouch!" Grey rose his clawed foot to find a round white device on the ground. He turned his head all puzzled and picked it up. Grey knew what it was when he looked at it from his meaty hand. "A digivice?" He asked himself, "What's a digivice doing out here? Surely someone would be looking for it." Grey then noticed there was something different about this digivice. It had additional buttons on all sides of the monitor in the middle. It couldn't have been a later model based on the overall shape of the device and even the later models didn't have these kinds of buttons. Grey couldn't figure out what was with this digivice or who could have lost it.

Grey then noticed a button on the digivice that was the shape a an arm flexing a bicep. He had no idea what it could do but the curiosity overpowered him. Thinking what could possibly happen, he pressed the button with a wide finger.

Grey immediately something was wrong, it was if his body had suddenly been lit on fire. "Aagh!" Grey dropped the digivice and he clenched his fists tightly, his body felt like it was being drenched in molten magma and he watched in shock and fascination as his biceps began growing.

The muscles bulging out, swelling bigger by the moment, pushing out farther than he could possibly do before. Soon he felt a strong burning in his torso as his pecs began swelling out, growing bigger, stronger, tighter. His abdomen grew tighter in definition and actually took on another row of rock hard abs. Grey was suddenly aware that the ground seemed to be growing a bit more distant, but he realized he was infact growing taller.

Soon this burning passed to his legs, the muscles growing tight with thick swelling, showing off an amazing amount of definition before the heat drained from his body and he collapsed onto his hands and knees gasping for breath. "W-What... What happened to me?"

Grey stared at the digivice a perplexed look cross his face as the realization of what happened dawned on him. Reaching down he grasped the digivice and stood up and he stared in awe of his new physique. "Oh man just look at me!" Grey grinned broadly as he flexed his left bicep and watched it skyrocket in height, a couple veins pushing out of the skin. "man... Exvee is going to be so jealous." And then suddenly Grey had an idea...
11421.title: The Magical Digivice

Greymon loved how much bigger he was. Exvee was normally around at least 25 feet, while he used to be half that size. Now he's at least 30 feet of pure awesome muscles. He smiled...but he wanted some more.

He heads home, other Digimon looking on in awe at the giant Greymon. He gets inside, it being a bit of a tight squeeze, and starts charging the digivice. He decides to sleep for a bit, feeling tired from the workout plus the muscle growth.

After an hour long nap, he hears a ding, and sees the odd digivice has already fully recharged. He picks it up, and then wonders what to do next.

choices: V1. Renamon becomes as muscular as a professional wrestler

11511.content:
It had been eight years since the D-Reaper's defeat, and seven years since Digimon had been able to return to the real world. Within that time, humans and Digimon had learned to live in all but perfect harmony: individual Digimon can now be considered pets or people depending on a variety of different factors; Digimon viewed as people can have jobs, and get married (to humans or other Digimon); Digimon fighting is now classified as an official sport in the same vein as martial arts and wrestling; the list goes on. But most importantly, instances of hostile digimon emerging from the Digital World have been reduced to less than one a week. Furthermore, the hostile Digimon that do emerge are very swiftly dealt with by the ever-vigilant Digimon Tamers; humans that are partnered with Digimon for

         One such Digimon Tamer was Rika Nonaka and her partner Renamon. Rika was twelve years old when she and Renamon first met, and their relationship at the time was not one that could be called "friendly;" they had seen each other as means of becoming stronger and little else. It wasn't until they had met Takato Matuski and Henry Wong and saw how the two boys and their Digimon - Guilmon and Terriermon, respectively - respected and cared for each other that their mutual apathy and disregard for each other began to dwindle; only then did they truly start to grow stronger, both in power and in character.

         Renamon was lying down on Rika's bed reminiscing about how drastically their relationship had changed in eight years since then; where they had once seen each other as little more than a means to an end, they were now romantically attracted to each and had been dating for the last four years. Renamon was even hoping that one of them would work up the nerve to propose one day. In fact, Renamon had already worked up the nerve to propose, but wasn't sure when the time would be right.

         Renamon's reminiscing was cut short when Rika came back from a day of shopping with her mother. "Hey, Renamon," she said, glad to finally be home.

         "Hi, Rika," Renamon smiled. "How was your day?"

         "Long and tedious," Rika said, rolling her eyes. "I swear, shopping with mom is pure torture; it's boring, mom always insists on getting me clothes that I don't want or even need, and it always feels ten times longer than it actually is. I swear, if those new card packs hadn't just hit the shelves today, I wouldn't have gone with her."

         Renamon giggled a bit. "Well, if nothing else, you at least got those card packs you wanted."

         Rika's face softened a bit. "Yeah, you're right. I made sure to buy at least two of each new pack, and with five new packs released, that's ten packs in total. Each pack contains twenty cards, so that adds up to two hundred cards in total. Most of them are exclusively for the card game and, therefor, would have no effect on a real Digimon, but, since these are special packs designed for Tamers, there's at least one card in each pack that can be used both in the card game and to modify real real Digimon. So let's check out what new cards we got."

         Rika and Renamon opened the card packs and looked through what cards they got. The packs were supposed to contain at least one card for modifying real Digimon, but the ten that Rika bought had three of said cards apiece; she couldn't believe her luck. First she and Renamon looked through the card game exclusive cards. Half of the cards were really useful, while the other half were situational at best. Rika shrugged and decided to sort them accordingly. One card in particular stood out to Rika, mainly because it seemed really odd.

         "'Healing Junkie'" Rika read the card's description. "'Increases the effect of healing items and skills by 50%, but drains HP by 5% for every other turn health is not restored. Affects all Digimon the user has on the field. Lasts 8 turns. Does not stack.' I can't tell if that's really useful, or very situational." She looked over at Renamon. "Either way, that's all of the cards I can't use to modify you." She then looked back at the remaining cards. "Now let's look at all the cards that CAN affect you."

         The modification cards were designed to be used in battle, but could also be used outside of battle for various reasons. In fact there seemed to be some that were made specifically for use outside of battle. Rika sorted them into piles of cards that were exclusively used for battle, cards that could be used in or out of battle, and cards that designed for use outside of battle. Rika noticed that she had three variations of the same card; they all did the same thing, but to varying levels of effect.

         "'Muscle Enhancement V1,'" Rika read the first card's description. "'Increases Attack by 50%, but lowers Agility by 25%. Affects one of the user's Digimon. Lasts 3 turns in battle, or until used again outside of battle. Does not stack.' Looks like this card will make you stronger, Renamon."

         "So it would seem," Renamon nodded. "You said there were two more variants of that card, so how powerful are they?"

         Rika picked up the other two cards. "Well, this one is apparently 'V2.' This one doubles Attack but lowers Agility by 50%. This last one is apparently 'V3.' It quadruples Attack but lowers Agility by 90%. And they all last the same amount of time; 3 turns in battle, or until used again outside of battle. And they don't stack." She then placed them back on her desk.

         "Well, let's see how much stronger they make me," Renamon said giddily. "I'm eager to see just how muscular I can be. Use any variant; I'm fine either way."

         "Alright," Rika picked up her Digivice and then one of the cards at random and swiped. The card she had randomly picked up was...
11511.title: A new modification card

1211.title: Through hard work.

choices: "I got in a tussle with a throh."
1212.content:
Meet Char. He was a normal, average, everyday charizard lying back against a tree on a grassy field. He has normal wings, legs, snout, all that. Although there was one thing he just couldn't keep his eyes off of, infact two. His arms. Charizards have been known to not have very long (Or thick) arms. Char has been feeling pretty bummed out about this for a while. Suddenly, Charizard overhears the sound of footsteps. They sounded heavy, and turtle-like. It could only mean one thing... "HEY CHAR!!" ...His friend Blast, the blastoise. Jumping up from behind Charizard about ready to dog pile on him..

Char merely avoids it by getting up and moving out of the way. Blast ends up landing on the ground hard. "What do you want?"

Blast tries to pick himself up, trying to look good, "Just wanted to see if you'd like to hang out."

Char turns his head away while crossing his arms and sighs. "I'm not in the mood, okay?--"

"Up, up! I'm gonna stop you right there.", Blast interrupts, standing up on his feet. "You, don't feel like doing anything anymore. You're always sitting in front of this tree, always keeping to yourself." Blast starts using air quotes, "Always, telling me, 'No, I don't feel like it.', or 'I'm not in the mood for anything.', or 'Get out of here! I'm using the bathroom!' Why can't it be like the good ol' days when we would hang out together? Playing games, going out for swims, experimenting..."

"What?!"

"Just wanted to make sure you're paying attention.", Blast replies pointing at Char. "But yeah, you just aren't fun as you used to be, to be honest. And all I have to say is...why?", Blast asks, puckering up his lower lip.

Char stares at Blast's weird face, "......I...I, just don't know, okay?" Char holds up his arms again to stare at them, letting out another sigh.

"?" Blast walks up to Char, tugging at one of Char's arms.

Char pulls his arms away, "What!?"

"You've been staring an awful lot at your arms. Why do you keep doing that? Did you get a beedrill or something?" Blast gasps. "Did somebody hit you!? Did you fall off a cliff?! Did you see something that scarred you for life?!" Blast starts shaking Char furiously, "Why won't you tell me?!!"

"BLAST! Just stop, alright?! NOTHING, has happened to me! ..." Char lowers his head with a sad face, " I just...I just don't think I'm as strong as I want to be."

"Hm?" Blast holds his arms out, "What're ya talkin' about? You're one of the strongest pokemon I know! I've seen you lift up a full-grown rhydon once."

"Yeah, I remember that. It's just, I don't look, or feel strong.", Char explained uneasily.

Blast looked as if he was understanding Char's problem. "Hmm... Sooo...what?"

"I wish I had muscles, okay?!", Char exclaimed.

"Ohhh.", Blast replies understandably. "But, why would you want muscles?"

"Why wouldn't I?! With muscles, I can show off some serious muscle against a machoke, pump some serious iron against a conkeldurr, even become a hot-shot with the ladies.", Char explains proudly.

Blast stares blankly at Char for a moment. "Sooo, you want to become a muscular being all of a sudden?"

Char sighs. And then crosses his arms while turning away, "I knew you wouldn't understand."

Blast runs up in front of Char, "No, no, I understand your plea. I'm just curious to what caused you to make such a decision?"
1212.title: Curse These Arms...

12121.content:
Char took a deep breath and sighed. "You sure you want to know?" He asked. "I think so." said Blast. "Well, it began at the beach." began Char. "I was walking around and having a good time. That is until Machoke showed up. You should have seen him. He had a bunch of pokemon all over him admiring his muscles. I can spit fire but do they care? No! Apparently, people care about the muscle you're packing."

"Well first off," said Blast. "Don't let Machoke get to you. He's always been a attention hog and a jerk." "But that still doesn't change the fact that everyone like him because of his muscles!" said Char. "That's what makes a Machoke."

Blast did his best to comfort his friend. "Look man, you don't need to be like Machoke. You're cool just the way you are." "Thanks." said Char. "But I still think having muscles is a good idea. Not just to be better than Machoke." Blast took a hand to his friend's back. "Come on," he said, "Let's get a berry smoothie. That always makes you feel better." Char took another deep breath. "Yeah. That sounds good."

Blast and Char were walking to the smoothie bar until Char saw something shining at a nearby tree. "What's that?" he said. "What's what?" asked Blast.

Upon taking a closer look, Char's eyes open wide. "Is that...what I think it is?" Char picks up, what turned out to be a belt that belongs to a machoke. Blast walks up to him to take a closer look at what Char was aweing at. "No way...", Char says unable to finish his sentence.

"Is that, a machoke's belt?", Blast asks pointing at it.

"It is! I know for sure!" Char held up a shaking fist as he says with his teeth gritted together, "I couldn't keep my eyes off that show-offy machoke that day...!"

"So what? You gonna start wearin' that now? Speaking of which, what was it doing lying all by itself?" Blast starts scratching the back of his head, "Sure have been findin' a lot of weird stuff around here. One time, I found a charm that belongs to a meowth." Blast holds it up, "And I've still got it. Hm?"

Char puts the belt right on. It didn't fit him at first, but he was able to adjust it. "There we go."

"What're you doing?", Blast asks, the charm now on his forehead.

"I'm gonna take it out for a test drive.", Char asks with a sly face.

Blast had his arms on his hips, "What? You think something that works for a machoke will work for a charizard? How're you even supposed to operate that thing?"

"Like, THIS!" Char raised his arms in a flexing pose. But, nothing happened.

"OOH!" Char looked at Blast, who looked all surprised. "Nothing happened."

Char holds out his arms to look at them once again, "Huh. I thought it work like that."

"Give it up Char. I told you not to stoop to that machoke's level.", Blast remarks.

"Hmm... Maybe I should try something else." Char starts tapping the belt with his a claw, "Maybe there's a button on here somewhere?"

Blast turns around, feeling he should give up on Char, "Why don't you try using 'bulk up'? Maybe that'll work.", Blast adds sarcastically.

Char shrugs his shoulders, "Alright. Bulk up!"
12121.title: Spittin' Fire or Showing Muscle?

121211.content:
At first, nothing happened. Char wore the belt still feeling the same. "I guess Machoke got those muscles by working out." said Blast. "Wait!" Char began to feel warmth and soreness in his muscles. They increased until Char couldn't bear it.

He saw his arms growing thicker. Veins under his orange scales throbbed as biceps and other arm muscles swelled. Char then felt his chest pushing against him as pecs and abs formed. His pecs became this size of Bulbasaurs and his 6-pack abs looked like Diglets. Char could then feel his legs stretching while growing powerful and his wings expanding for more air.

Then suddenly, the sensation stopped. The warmth cooled and soreness relaxed. Char dropped his jaw by the look of him. He had the body he always dreamed of! Muscles were all over his scales and felt stronger than ever before! He stroked his abs to see if they were real and flexed a bicep to himself to see it was strong as an Onix's rock body. "Whoa!" said Char. "It worked! The belt actually worked!"

Blast couldn't believe Char's new figure. Char grew muscles right before his eyes! Blast had no idea Machoke's belt could do something like that. Could that have been Machoke's source of strength?

"I can't believe this!" said Char. "I feel so awesome!" "You definitely look awesome!" said Blast. "How strong do you think you are now?" Char just smirked at Blast. "Only one way to find out!"

Blastoises were naturally heavy with their cannon loaded shells. Char grabbed Blast and placed him over his head. Char then started pumping his arms tensing them up and down as Blast went up and down. "Put me down, put me down!" yelled Blast. Char finally obeyed Blast after 20 reps.

"I'm strong enough to lift you!" exclaimed Char. "That's so cool!" "I don't think so!" said Blast still feeling embarrassed. "Well," continued Blast, "Now that you got muscles, what do you want to do now?"
121211.title: It works!

1212111.content:
"I don't know.", Char replies. "What should we do?"

"What? What about all that stuff about pumping iron and showing off and all that junk?", Blast replies back.

"Yeah, I'll get to it, I'll get to it." Char holds up a finger, "But for now, why don't we get that berry smoothie? Pumping you above my head has made me thirsty." Char grabs a hold of Blast, then carries him in his arm, "Come on! Let's go!"

"Hey!!", Blast cries out in Char's arm. "At least warn me when you're going to pick me up!"

After about a minute of running and proud stomping, Char comes to a sudden stop. "Hm?"

"What is it?" Char lets go of Blast, him landing on his head. "OW!"

Char points out a finger, "Check it out."

Blast gets back up on his feet, rubbing his head. "Owww... What is it?" Sleeping at a nearby bush was one of the largest (and roundest) pokemon they have ever seen. Blast stares at it for a moment, "......It's a snorlax."

"Uh huh." Char slowly walks up to it.

"What are you doing!?", Blast whispers out.

Char kneels down on one knee in front of the snorlax. "Just watch."

"Don't tell me you have a thing for tickling pokemon. You're weird.", Blast remarks.

"No!", Char whispered to his Turtle friend. "If I was able to pick you up, maybe I'll be able to pick up a snorlax too."

"What!?" Blast starts swirling a finger against his ear, "Dude, you using that belt has made you gone coo-coo! Do you really think you can even attempt this?"

"Guess we'll have to see.", Char replies back. He then slips his meaty palms under the snorlax's soft and fluffy body. The snorlax looked as if it was about to wake up, but it merely just turns around to its side. 'Phew' "That was close."

"Dude, just forget abou it!", Blast whispered out. "If I know a snorlax, they DON'T want to be woken up from their sleep."

Char ponders to himself while tapping his chin, "Hmm..."
1212111.title: What's that Sleeping in the Bushes?

12121111.content:
Char knew exactly what to do next. Without telling Blast, Char yelled, "Bulk up!" "Char, wait!" said Blast. It was too late. Char knelt over feeling the intense sensation of growth that Char loved.

Char's already defined muscles grew to wider proportions. His arms went from Bulbasaurs to Gravlers and his chest shaped to diamond-hard pecs and abs.

The growth finally stopped and Char found himself bigger and stronger than ever before. He actually met the hight of the Snorlax. Blast was more surprised than the first time. "Let's try this again." said Char in a deep toned voice.

Char squatted and placed his meaty hands under Snorlax's fat. Char then put a little pressure into his hands. With little effort, Char got Snorlax above the air! In fact, Snorlax felt so light that Char let go of a hand, lifting a heavy Snorlax above the orange dragon's head with one hand! Char was amazed by his feat. He even flexed a veiny bicep to Blast.

Without warning, Snorlax began to mumble as if he was about to wake up. "Char!" said Blast,"Put down Snorlax! He's waking up!" Char just chuckled. "Ok, Ok, don't get your shell in a knot!" As lightly as he could, Char placed the Snorlax down and the Snorlax drifted back to sleep. "See?" asked Char. "No problem."

Blast began to feel a little concerned for his dragon friend. He thought the muscle was getting to Char's head. Maybe Blast was getting jealous. Regardless, Char needed to be careful with belt or he would be no better than Machoke.

"So," said Char, "About that smoothie..." "Wait a sec, Char." said Blast. "Can I talk to you for a sec?" "Sure." said Char. "What about?"
12121111.title: "Guess I'll have to bulk up some more!&...

choices: "You were going through a phase like this too."
"Huh. I guess you haven't mentioned anything like this before."
121211111.content:
Blast stares at Char for a moment, then says, "Char, I'm getting worried about you."

"Ah you don't have to worry about me." Char raises both his arms, flexing his magnificent peaks, "Not while I have these babies now.", Char added proudly.

"That's not it.", Blast objects. "I mean, I'm worried that all this muscle mass'll go to your head. At this rate, you might end up becoming that one machoke you despised so much."

"Oh." Char lowers in arms, placing a hand on Blast's shoulder, "Hey buddy, I assure you nothing like that is gonna happen. I'm really just overjoyed with finding an item that was helpful in finding happiness."

Blast felt pretty struck inside. "Finding...you happiness...?" Blast lowers his head, "You mean...I never made you happy?"

"... No, no! It's nothing like that! I mean to be honest, I was always happy you were around. Plus it was just that one thing that got me down. Before that, I was always greatful that you came along just to hang out." Char starts scratching the back of his head, worriedly, "Sorry if, I made ya feel bad."

"Oh..." Blast suddenly raises his head and grins, setting his hands on his hips, "GOOD!" Char blinks his eyes at him. "Just wanted to make sure. I'm glad I wasn't a thorn in your paw after all. Just a few things you should take notice of as well: Keep the growth under control. I don't want you growing into a behemoth who ends up crushing everything he steps on. If you do get carried away, I'll blast that belt right off of you. And lastly...do you think I can take a wack at that?"

Char takes a second to reply, "Uhhh..."

Blast throws his arms in the air, "Aw come on! You've had that thing for only half-an-hour and now look atchou! You're as big as a dragoneer! Maybe bigger."

"It's just, I'm not sure if I take this off, I may or may not return to normal.", Char replies uneasily.

Blast stares at Char, a tad annoyed, "Char, either way I'm sure you can handle not being a muscular giant for a few minutes."

"Well...how do I know you won't go over your head when you try this out?", Char questions his pal.

"Oh come on!", Blast yells out. "Since when have I ever mentioned wanting to be a big muscular giant!?"

"Well, if I remember correctly..."
121211111.title: Excited Much?

1212111111.content:
"If I remember correctly, Blast," said Char. "You fantasized of not being a 'shell full of lubber' as you put it about a year ago." Blast had to think for second to remember. He did wish for muscles a while back. After losing to a battle with a Nidoking, Blast thought it would be awesome if he had the strength of a Gyrados. "Oh yeah," said Blast. "I guess I did think that one time."

Char could tell Blast had the desire of growing big like him. Why not give him one moment? Char thought it was worth giving up his muscles for his best pal. "Ok, Blast," said Char, "I'll give you your shining moment." Blast's eyes beamed. "Really?!" Char nodded. "Sure. Why not?"

Char unbuckled Machoke's belt around his chisled waist. He expected his muscles to shrink. But they didn't! Char still kept his hulking frame. "I..I'm still muscular!" exclaimed Char. "I guess the growth happens when you're wearing the belt. "Anyway, try it out, Blast!"

Blast wrapped the belt around his shell. "Ready?" said Char. "I think so." replied Blast. Blast closed his eyes and took a deep breath not knowing what to expect from the growth. "Bulk up!" Blast yelled.

Blast felt a chill down the base of his shell. Soreness then creeped up his stubby arms and legs. Blast's arms and legs stretched making him look taller and grew thick with muscle. Blast's arms swelled to the size of squritle shells and his pecs and abs pushed against his shell so much there was definition. After what seemed to be a very long time for Blast, the growth stopped.

Blast and Char were amazed by the results. Blast looked like the strongest turtle in the world. "Dude," said Char, "You look great!" Blast responded with a tensed bicep and said "Thanks! I feel awesome! I never thought I'd feel this good!"

Blast looked back at his best friend. "Thanks again for letting me use the belt." said Blast. "No problem." said Char. "You're my bud. I gotta look out for you!" Blast chuckled. "Well, ready to show off the new us?" "Well..."
1212111111.title: "You were going through a phase like this t...

choices: Nevermind. Just attend to your smoothies.
12121111111.content:
"Why don't we show off these new muscles at the Smoothie Bar?", Charizard asks with an anticipated flex with his right bicep.

Blast raises his arms in a double-bicep flex in response, "Alright! That's not a bad idea!" Blast takes a closer look at his pal. Char was still towering him by at least a foot. Blast then looks down at the belt, "Maybe I should test out the belt one more time..." Char quickly swipes the belt right off of Blast's shell, "Hey!"

"Not so fast!", Char remarks. "Remember what you said about not wanting to let this belt go our heads?"

"This is different! You're still bigger than me!", Blast objects.

"How 'bout this, next person who gets to use the belt will be you. Okay?", Char explains.

Blast pouts while crossing his arms, "Fine..." Char suddenly stuff the belt into Blast's shell. "Hey, what the--!?"

"Just to keep it in a safe place.", Char assures. "Wouldn't want people finding out about our little secret." Char grabs his friend by the arm, "Come on! The Smoothie Bar is not too far from here."

Over to the Smoothie Bar, there was a chansey operating the place, while an abra was sitting in a chair. He was off sipping his smoothie through a straw, until a shadow completely shades him. "Hm?" The abra's eyes suddenly burst open, spitting out what he had in his mouth.

"Wow. That's the most I've ever seen of an abra's eyes.", Blast remarks, the abra falling back from his seat.

Char holds up two fingers, "Two berry smoothies please."

The chansey stares at them for a moment, then finally says, "Oh! Okay." She quickly runs back to whip up their smoothies, then comes back with them on a platter a couple seconds later. "Here you go." Char and Blast grab their own drink, Char being the one to thank her. "You two..sure look... Um..."

"They're huge! They're freaking huge!", the abra yells out for her.

"Thanks.", Char replied, setting his smoothie down. He then turns his upper body around, raising his arms into a back double-bicep flex, "Glad you two took notice."

The chansey starts to ask, "How did you two...get so..."

"Are you, are you gonna finish your questions? Or do I have to finish them for you?", the abra asks annoyingly.

"I'm about as surprised as you are, OKAY!?!", the chansey yells out.

"How'd we get so big?", Blast repeats. He then goes ahead raising his right arm up to flex it, while sticking his left arm back to tense it up as well, "We've just been stepping up our weight training regiment is all."

Char turns back around, raising his left arm in front of his chest to tense and flex his enormous peak, "And, we've, been pretty proud of the results."

Blast changes his pose, gripping his fists in a downard pose while flexes his left arm out the most in front of his chest, "Wouldn't mind if, we showed off a bit in front of your stand, would ya?"

"Oh no. Not at all.", the chansey replies happily. "Just don't block it so that no one'll be able to buy."
12121111111.title: Showin' Off at the Smoothie Bar

121211111111.content:
Char and Blast stood back to back staring at the Chansey flirtily. They then raised their arms to swell thier biceps to massive peaks. Char tensed his chest for the Chansey, even bounced his pecs for her. Blast merely stroked his abs and pecs with a single finger, intensifying the shape and power his chest held. Chansey loved every second of the muscle show.

"Th..Thank you so much!" said the Chansey. "That was wonderful!" "Our pleasure." said Char. "Hey, Char," said Blast. "How about we take the smoothies to the beach?" Char's ears perked at the idea. That would be the perfect place for them to show off the muscles and strength. "Sounds good to me!" replied Char. "Thanks again for the smoothies." he then said back to the Chansey.

As Blast and Char made their way to the beach, they had their mouths to their straws most of the way. Finally, they felt sand underneath their feet. Char and Blast could see all types of pokemon relaxing in the sun, from ground to ghost types. They then looked back at each other grinning. "I'm gonna enjoy this!" said Char.

Without hesitation, Blast and Char walked to the beach as modestly as they could. Heads turned to see the buff Blastoise and Charizard. The crowd was amazed and didn't think that a Blastoise or a Charizard could get so muscular.

Charizard saw a female Ninetales lusting his body. He flexed an arm for her that made her giggle. Blast couldn't help but notice some good looking water pokemon playing in the water. "Well, Char," said Blast, "What do you want to do?"
121211111111.title: Show off some more.

choices: Shrug it off and pose for them some more.
1212111111111.content:
"I think I'm gonna go in for a quick dip.", Blast says with anticipation. "I guess you'll be staying out here on the hot sand?"

"You know it!", yells Charizard. Blast runs off towards the water. He jumps up into the air yelling, 'Cannonball!', the few pokemon that were swimming then swam right out of the way. Blast enters the water with a big 'SPLASH!' As for Char, he chuckles at his pal, and then walks off on his own. He notices a few pokemon keeping their eyes locked on the strutting dragon. He mainly just kept to himself for a time, until he came across the ninetales from earlier. He stares right at her, ninetales staring and blushing right back. Char smirks at her, "Why, hello there."

Ninetales couldn't help at Char's magnificent body, her cheeks a rosy red and her eyes glowing. Sitting next to her was an azumarill, who had the same rosy cheeks as her, but then elbows the ninetales on her arm. "I think he's talking to you,", whispers the azumarill to her friend.

The ninetales shakes her head out of her funk, "Oh! Uh...hi." Char took notice of her looking at his arms, which were folded behind his back. Char then tenses his arms, making his biceps swell and become real visible from behind. "You...sure are big."

"You look amazing!", the azumarill blurts out. "I'm sorry, but it would have taken you forever to say that.", she confessed to her friend. "How did you, get so big?"

Char turns his body halfway so they'd get a good view of his back, and then sticks out his right leg and his right arm, flexing them both in unison, "I've just been starting a new training regiment that's certainly improved my results."

"I'll say!", the azumarill cries out with glee.

Char turns back around, still sticking his right arm out as he flexes it in front of his chest, "And, who do I have the pleasure of talking, and flexing to?", Char asks with a wink.

The ninetales was still pretty fixated on Char's physique, but she finally answers. "My name is Nyne. It's very nice to meet you."

"And my name is Azuma.", the azumarill adds. "Sorry about my friend. I guess she still can't get over it." She whispers even though Nyne is sitting right next to her, "I think she's falling for you."

Nyne actually heard that loud and clear, "Azuma!?"

Char didn't mind if it was true or if Azuma was playing around. He just goes ahead and strikes another pose, doing a downward double-bicep flex, even tensing and bouncing his pecs a bit. "Ah I don't mind. As long as you ladies are enjoying the view."

"Yes, man!", the two replied happily.

Char takes a look over his shoulder towards the water. "I wonder how Blast is doing?", he asks himself.
1212111111111.title: You go Left, I go Right

choices: Char and Blast get back together
12121111111111.content:
Blast was having a great time too. He swam around beating the waves with his gigiantic muscles. He dove down to meet the underwater pokemon having fun. Golduck, Dewgong, Lapras, and many other water pokemon were beating the heat under the waves.

Blast was doing great. Everyone couldn't take their eyes of Blast's muscles. He tensed his muscles to pose the pleasing crowd. However, Blast's muscles tensed more than the turtle intended after see a magnificent pokemon: a dragonair. The dragonair twist and twirled in the water with such grace. Blast was mesmerized by her movements.

Blast had to meet this new dragonair. Except the dragonair was twice his muscular size! Blast wanted to impress the dragonair unlike anyone has ever done before. Then Blast remembered what Char did right before they went into the smoothie bar. Char put the belt in his shell.

Blast had to use the belt again. But where? The sea was crowded. Blast then saw a cave not too far from him. The cave was dark and scary looking. Nobody seemed to want to go in there. "Perfect." thought Blast. Blast paddled into the cave until no light was visible. He didn't want anybody to see him grow, even if it meant he couldn't see it.

Blast took the belt out of his shell and strapped it around the lower part of his shell. "Bulk Up!" said Blast in bubbles of air. The cool water began to feel warm. At first, Blast thought it was the water but it was actually him. He could feel his muscles burning with more power than they were already packing. The power began pushing against Blast's arms, legs, and chest. It was intense but Blast soon felt the coolness of the water again. He didn't know how big he got but he figured enough to amaze the new girl of his dreams.

Blast swam out and dropped his jaw when light struck him. His muscles was twice as big than before! He was about the same size as Char! Already Blast could feel power flowing through his veins like water rushing through rivers. He felt like he could take on a Gyrados! He then swam up the dragonair's direction.

The dragonair relaxed by floating in the current of the ocean and bathing in the sunlight. All of a sudden, she got cold as the sunlight disappeared. "Excuse me," she said, "You're in my..my.." The dragonair fell speechless after seeing a titan Blastoise blocked her sunlight. "Oh, I'm sorry." said Blast. "I didn't mean to spoil your view." "Th..That's okay." said the Dragonair. "I actually prefer this view." Blast smiled at her romantically and gave several poses to her. The dragonair's favorite pose was Blast's flexing one arm while bending a leg showing off definition.

"You look amazing!" said the Dragonair. "Thanks." said Blast. "What's your name?" "Dragona." Blast could feel his heart drop at the sound of her name. "Dragona." said Blast, "that's a pretty name." Dragona couldn't help but blush. Why shouldn't she? A musclular and handsome Blastoise was flirting with her. What's not to like?

Blast stretched his arms and legs thickening them and attracting Dragona. "That sunlight feels good." said Blast. "Mind if I join ya?" "Not at all." replied Dragona. Blast then tilted himself back facing the sunlight. Dragona helped herself by wrapping herself in Blast's might chest. They then drifted in the sun.
12121111111111.title: Check on Blast.

choices: Let's check up on Blast again.
Perform more flexing and feats for the crowd.
121211111111111.content:
Back to Char, he was sitting between Nyne and Azuma on the sand. He let Nyne feel his left arm while Azuma was feeling his right. He even tensed them up a few times while they did so. Char was actually keeping his eyes on Nyne. She was feeling his arm muscles, but even looked up to glance at his charming face a few times. "Heh. Say, would either of you two like to join me in lifting weights over there?" Char points over to a couple weight equipment sitting on the sand not too far away.

"May I?", Nyne asks with anticipation.

"You two go on ahead." Azuma lies back on the sand with a pair of sunglasses. "I need to stay and work on my tan some more."

"Alright. Let us go." Still gripping Char's large arm, Nyne gets lifted up by Char as he stands up as well. They then make their way towards the equipment.

"Oh and Nyne,", Azuma calls out, "don't get too carried away with Char's body!"

"Hah! Very funny!", Nyne replies back. "Don't lie too long on the sun again. Or else you'll get sunburn like last time!"

"Whatever!", Azuma yells back.

Upon making their way towards the equipment, a few other pokemon were also starting to take notice. They slowly started circling around the equipment to watch the burly mon start to perform some feats. The first thing Char had his eyes on was a barbell. There was already 375 pounds on it, but Char felt it wasn't enough. He then grabs a few weights and starts packing them on to the bar. Once he was finished, there was now 750 pounds on it! Char peeks back at his female friend, who was staring with awe at him, as well as taking notice of the few pokemon that stood beside her.

Char bends down with his knees to grip the bar with his meaty hands. He then tenses and thickens them up as he stands back up to his feet. Char turns around so everyone would get a good view of him from the front, and shreds out his arms and chest as he starts to pump up his body with the heavy bar. Nyne's eyes grew wide, staring at the amazing amount of muscle being used and view in front of them as he lifts the thing up and down. Char's biceps really started to swell out as veins had their resting place on top and around them. Char's pecs really filled out as well, practically being felt under Char's chin as he raises the bar up.

Nyne was just speechless. Her cheeks still showed red as she was staring right back into Char's lucious eyes and trademark smirk. As for Char, he was already well past his fiftheenth rep. Once he does his twentieth, he stops, dropping the bar to the ground. This was very exhilarating for him. Getting much attention, meeting one of the pretties pokemon, and most of all, having big muscles! Char goes right ahead, flexing his pumped body for the crowd in various poses. The crowd in return applauds his muscular stature.
121211111111111.title: Back to Char's Side

1212111111111111.content:
Blast and Dragona continued floating in their underwater limbo. Dragona stroked Blast's chest up and down and Blast didn't mind at all. In fact, when Dragona placed her hand on Blast's pec, he made it bounce. She chuckled and enjoyed the giant turtle's company.

"This is really nice." said Blast. "I know," answered Dragona. "The sun and water feel so good together." Blast turned to his dragon girl. "I wasn't talking about that." Dragona blushed. "Oh, stop it, you!"

Dragona then noticed a giant underwater boulder underneath them. She turned to Blast and his gigiantic arms. Could he? "Blast," said Dragona, "How strong are you?" To be honest, Blast had no idea how strong he was. All he did was flex with his muscles. He didn't know what he was capable of with them, especially with his recent growth spurt. "I'm not sure." said Blast. "I haven't strength trained in a while." Dragona then pointed to the boulder. "Could you show me?"

Blast was worried. He wasn't sure he could lift the boulder. It was bigger than the Snorlax Char lifted earlier. But he couldn't let Dragona now, not when she thinks he was so cool. "I'll sure give it a try!" said Blast cracking his knuckles.

Dragona and Blast swam to the edge of the boulder. Dragona enthusiastically grinned while Blast nervously shook a little. Could he do it? Only one way to find out. Blast stretched out his hands and dug them underneath the boulder. He could tell already this was going to be a tough feat. But he could give up in front of Dragona. Blast then pressured his hands upward. At first, the boulder didn't budge and Blast gave more and more effort every second. As the seconds went by, Dragona could see Blast's arms bulging out and his chest rippling. It was hard to see with the dust and gravel flying from the bottom of the boulder.

Blast literally had it in his hands, he could feel it. With one more heap of bubbles flying, Blast heaved the boulder over his head! Blast and Dragona were incredibly impressed! Dragona felt like she could faint. "That's amazing!" said Dragona. "I knew you could do it!" Blast replied with a sexy smile and placed the boulder down.

Blast then had another idea. The feat made his arms feel so pumped and strong that he needed to exert some more strength. "If you think that was cool," said Blast, "Check this out!" Blast curled his fingers to a fist and raised them to his face. Despited the water pressure agaist him, Blast struck the boulder with an incredible force. His hand was stuck in the boulder! As he lifted his hand, Blast could see the impression in the boulder, fingers and all. Dragona then heard a slight crack coming from the boulder. It came from Blast's impression and stretched all around the boulder. The boulder split in two and land opposite of each other!

Blast finally ended with a pose of upward biceps and curling legs. Dragona displayed her reaction by jumping into Blast's bumpy arms. "You are so amazing!" said Dragona. "You are like the greatest Blastoise I've ever seen." Blast blushed. But he went redder as Dragona pecked him on the cheek.
1212111111111111.title: Let's check up on Blast again.

choices: "Can I, speak to you in private?"
12121111111111111.content:
Back over to Char, he was now sitting on a benching equipment while doing reps with a large 375-pound dumbbell with his left arm. Nyne was sitting next to him, getting a good close-up of Char's immense bicep in action. She could barely contain herself, her cheeks still blushing their rosy red color. Char actually kept his sights on her for the moment, and then says, "Hey, you can look, but you can also touch."

Nyne chuckles, "Smooth." But it works. She went right ahead and felt Char's Shredding arm. His arm was so large, she had to feel around it with both her paws. "Sure feels nice though."

As for Blast, he had just exited out of the water, Dragona still wrapped around Blast's wide chest. "That was amazing!", Dragona calls out happily.

"Hey, you're amazing.", Blast adds turning his head back to her. Dragona blushes in response. "I really liked what ya did back there. That was amazing as well."

Dragona giggles again, "Heh. Thanks."

"You normally do that for a living?"

"Well, yeah actually.", Dragona replies. "I'm actually part of a circus that just happened to stop by town."

"So what's a lass like you doin' out here?", Blast asks.

"Say, if you could do what you just did with that boulder, then maybe you'd be perfect if you join us. We need a strong man!", Dragona explains.

"How 'bout two?"

"Two?"

"Yeah! I'm just about to head back to meet my friend. He's a big guy like me.", Blast added.

"Wow... That'd be great! You two being strong men for our show, it'd be perfect! Especially since pokemon like you aren't normally muscular pokemon. Is your friend a machamp or something?", Dragona asks.

"Nope. He's a charizard.", Blast replies happily.

"A what!?"

"Here he is." They were both staring at Char and Nyne. Char was now pumping his other arm with the same dumbbell, Nyne now feeling his other arm in action. Dragona was actually really surprised. A muscular blastoise AND charizard?! That's incredible! In fact she could barely contain herself. "Come on. I'll introduce you to him. Hey, Char!", Blast calls out holding out his arm.

Char and Nyne look up at them. Char sets the dumbbell down as he gets up on his feet. "Hey, Blast! You're ba-... Uh..."

Blast stops right in front of Char. "What?" Blast now realizes he's able to stare at Char at his eye level. Almost. "Oh..."
12121111111111111.title: Wait a Minute...

121211111111111112.content:
Char couldn't help but notice Blast new size. Blast met him at eye level. He was about to talk to him until he saw Dragona. He admitted that she was hot even though she wasn't his type. Char understood why Blast used the belt. He could talk to him about it later.

"What's up?" asked Char. "I got some great news!" replied Blast. "My new friend here says she works with the circus in town and they're looking for a couple of strong men!" "Really?!" Char couldn't hide his enthusiasm of the news. This would be another great opportunity for his new muscles. Char turned to Nyne. "What do you think?" Char asked her while flexing a meaty bicep. "Think I got what it takes?" "Absolutely!" said Nyne instantly. "I'm up for it if you are, Blast!" said Char.

"Oh, this is great!" exclaimed Dragona. "Trust me, you won't regret it!" "Oh, I know we won't." said Blast. "We can handle it right, Char?" Char replied with a double bicep flex and came up with a great idea. "I just came with a great intro for our routine! You two want to see?" Knowing Char meant a posing session with Blast, Dragona and Nyne said, "Yes!"

Dragona sat next to Nyne on the weight bench Char just used while the muscle duo stood proudly in front of them. Char turned around and flexed his arms again. The pose revealed a rippled back that looked like it could withstand any weight. Blast squated down in a thinking position and emphasized his arms and legs. He looked like a ball of muscle. Dragona and Nyne loved thier show. They loved Char and Blast.

Blast and Char finished with a bicep flex back to back and the girls cheered. "That'll bring in the crowd!" said Nyne. "My boss is going to love you guys!" said Dragona. "Follow me and I'll take you guys to the circus!"

Dragona led Blast, Char, and Nyne to a massive tent surrounded by all kinds of pokemon. Char saw an Alakazam doing magic tricks while Blast noticed a Mankey making balloon pokemon for the little ones. The place was crowded but they turned to see the massive Blastoise and Charizard thinking they were part of the show too. "Right in this tent is my boss." said Dragona. "You two be nice!" "We're always nice." commented Blast. "But Char can be a little hot headed sometimes." "Whatever!" yelled Char.

As they all entered the tent, Dragona walked toward an Arcanine in a neat suit. "Hey boss!" said Dragona to him. "Dragona!" answered the Arcanine, "How's my favorite acrobat?"
"Doing good! And soon, you'll be too!"
"What do you mean?"
"I found us a couple of strong men for us!"

"Boss," said Dragona pointing to the muscle titans, "This is Blast and Char!" The Arcanine dropped his jaw at the sight of Blast and Char. He never saw a muscular Blastoise or Charizard before. Didn't think it was possible! "Wow!" exclaimed the boss. "You defitely look the part!" "You know it!" said Char. He then tensed his chest while flexing an arm downward. "But can you use them?" asked the boss. "Trust me, sir," said Nyne. "They can! Char here lifted 750 pounds like it was nothing!" The boss's eyes opened with surprise. "In that case, how about you show me what you two got?" "Sure!" said Blast and Char simultaneously.
121211111111111112.title: Circus Freaks

choices: "What about you Nyne? You have any special talents?"
"What about you Nyne? Want to help with the equipment?"
1212111111111111121.content:
"Why don't we perform a few feats of strength for ya?", asks the burly dragon.

"Ah! Of course! Let's see what you got.", the orange canine replies in anticipaton.

"Okay!" Char looks to his large turtle friend. "Have you by any chance seen a large boulder of some kind on the way here?"

Blast points back towards the beach, "Not unless you want me to go back for a dive underwater."

"Now to worry. I've got you guys covered." The arcanine walks off, but he gestures a hand for Char and the others to follow, "Follow me." As the group walk out of the tent, they were told to follow behind in one direction. After pacing for a bit, "Well, here it is." Char, Blast and the others were surprised at what lay in front of them. "You needed a boulder? Well, here's one for ya."

Char stares at the large object. "Has, that always been here before?"

"Nope.", the Boss replies simply. "Actually I bring a few everytime we move someplace else. I happen to have an onyx worker who helps move the heavy equipment and help out with the acts. Go ahead you two, knock yourselves out."

"Alright. You ready Blast?", Char calls out to his friend.

"You know it!" The two then run up to the boulder, one of them standing on one side or it. "What should we do?"

Char kneels down on one knee, grabbing the boulder from the bottom with one hand, "Just follow me." Blast does as he was told, grabbing the boulder from the boulder bottom. "Now FLEX!" The two tensed up their legs and arms, slowly picking up the boulder. Nyne, Dragona and her Boss watched in awe of the amazing muscle show, as Char and Blast slowly raise the boulder a few more inches with ease. Their arm and leg muscles rippled with power upon the show, the boulder now being lifted up against their chest. "Alright, now you take a step back!"

"What!?", screams his turtle friend, "Are you crazy!?"

"Hey, you're gonna be breaking it into pieces."

"Oh. Okay.", Blast replies with a grin.

"I think they're both crazy.", The arcanine added.

Blast slowly let's go of the boulder. Char looked as if he was about ready to drop it, but then, he goes ahead flexes all the muscles on his body as hard as he could. "RAAAUGH!", and up goes the boulder, which must have been tossed up at least fifty feet.

Blast raises up his right arm, "Here I go!" Blast pulls his arm back, which shredded to show many tendons and veins, and as the boulder came down, his arms goes right up, and strikes the boulder right underneath, "BOOM!!" The boulder gets destroyed into hundreds of bits and pieces.

Char and Blast look at each other eye-to-eye, and then they both flexed their arms down into a side chest pose. "Do we get the job!?", they both yelled out.

Nyne, Dragona and her Boss stared at the too of them with shocked looks on their faces and partly covered in gravel. The arcanine finally says, "......You two may start tomorrow."
1212111111111111121.title: Look What we Can Do!

12121111111111111211.content:
The boss was amazed by Blast and Char. Mucular Blastoise and Charizard. What can make his day any better? He then turned to Nyne. The boss found very attractive and slender. "What about you, young lady?" said the boss to Nyne. "Ever dreamed of joining the circus?" Nyne was surprised. "Oh, um, well," she stuttered. The boss continued, "You look like you would make a great acrobat! Have you done anything like that?" "Well," said Nyne, "I did some gymnastics a while back. I know a thing or two but havn't done it in a while." "Not to worry!" said the boss. "With Dragona by your side, you'll be one of the best around! That is, if you want to take the job."

Nyne thought this was a great opportunity. She's been looking for a job but always came up short. And she always enjoyed her gymnastic days. Being an acrobat and being around her muscle dragon. "Alright!" answered Nyne. "I'll give it a shot!" The boss clapped his hands enthusiastically. "This is great! A new acrobat and two new strong men in one day! Okay, our show begins next week so we need to get you three ready by then. Take it easy today but tomorrow is when the real work begins!" "Yes sir!" yelled Blast and Char together.

The next day, Char and Blast worked out with the circus's workout equipment while Nyne was working with Dragona. Char was doing pull ups on a hanging bar while Blast squatted up and down with a heavy bar on his shoulders. Char chuckled while pulling up. "I've been doing reps for fifteen minutes and still feel pumped!" "I know what you mean!" replied Blast. "I don't think we need to worry about staying in shape! But we might as well just in case the girls show up." They both laughed.

"So, what do you think we should do for our act?" asked Blast. "I'm not sure." said Char as he was setting himself upside down and locking his legs on the bar for sit ups. "I guess we can literally do whatever we want! But it's gotta be something cool! Something people never thought of before or couldn't do before." "I don't know about you but I wanna really wow the crowd!" commented Blast.

They both went from different workout thinking about what they could do. So far, they came up with nothing. That is until Char said, "Wait, I think I got something!" Blast dropped the dumbbells he was lifting and looked towards Char. "What?" "We got some pretty big muscles, right." "Duh!" "Well, I was thinking clothes may not fit us as well anymore.." Blast had no idea where Char was thinking. "What are you going at?" Char smiled. "What if we entered the ring in skin tight clothing and rip em off our bodies by flexing!" Blast liked the sound of torn clothes ripping of his glorious body for all to see. "Yeah, that sounds cool!" he said. "What else?"

Blast worked his arms by doing a handstand then making reps. During his workout, the belt fell out of his shell and Char noticed. "Be careful, man!" said Char getting off the weight bar. "You almost lost the belt!" Char's eyes then widened and his mouth opened to a grin. "Sorry." said Blast noticing Char's expression. "What?" "Okay, here me out." said Char. "What if we used the belt in the show and grow right before the audience?" Blast looked at Char skeptically. "I'd say you lost your mind! We can't!" "Why not?" asked Char. "The people will think it's part of the show! And if we can grow by saying 'bulk up,' it's safe to assume we can shrink back by saying 'bulk down.'"

Blast had to admit it. The belt would make things interesting. "But what if we can't shrink back?" asked Blast. "We'll turn into muscle bound freaks!" Char laughed at Blast's remark and flexed a bicep to him. "Blast, I think we already past that! Besides people will think we're circus freaks even if we don't use it. Come on, man. Let's at least give it a try!" Blast wanted to say no but the thought of a bigger Blast hovering over the circus audience made him reconsider. "Okay," he said, "But we gotta make sure that the belt bulks down." "No problem!" said Char.

Char grabbed the belt and wrapped it around his waist. "Bulk down," he said. All of a sudden, Char could feel his strength leaving his body. His muscle mountains became muscle hills. Char reverted to the first stage of muscle growth when he first found the belt. "See?" said Char. "We can make this work!"

"Bulk up!" Char yelled. The warmth of strength returned and he became the muscle mountain he loved being. "What do you say?" he asked Blast. "Okay," said Blast, "Since we know how the belt works, why not?" Char responded by giving his turtle friend a big strong muscle hug. It would normally break a Hitmonchan's spine but to Blast, it was just a tight squeeze. "Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" said Char. "This is going to be a great show!"
12121111111111111211.title: Ready for the show

choices: Give the girls a quick preview.
121211111111111112111.content:
"Oh hey, do you wanna go check on the girls?", the burly turtle asks.

"Oh yeah!", Char replies, turning away, "I wonder what those two have been up to this whole time." Char and Blast walk over towards the entrance of the large show tent. They both first take a peek inside, then someone's spiraling shadow leaps above them. "Whoa! What was that!?"

It turned out to be Nyne, who was curled up and spiraling in midair for a moment. She then gets carried back by a hitmonlee, who was swinging from one of the acrobat swings. Char was really impressed by her technique while in the air. He never even knew how agile she was. "Wow! Lookit her go!", Blast cries out.

"Yeah... Monlee must really be training her well. Just hope she'll be okay...", Char added worriedly.

Blast slaps Char on the back, "Not ta worry man! The boss said as long as Monlee's around, she'll be just fine. Plus there's always a net on the bottom, so if she does fall, she won't ger hurt either."

Char takes a moment to stair at Nyne perform her upcoming act, and then looks at his buddy, "Alright."

"Hey, how come you don't worry about me this much?", Blast asks with a frowny face.

Char stares at his sad-eyed friend. "Shut up." Char starts walking off, "Wanna go check on Dragona?"

Blast jumps up, "Oh yeah!" Blast then speeds past his friend, running straight into another tent. The one Dragona was residing at. Char just takes his time, pacing towards Blast's direction, and then finally enters into the tent.

Char notices his friend, standing in front of him, but he didn't seem to be doing anything. Just, standing there. Char walks up to his shell, giving him a few hollow taps. "Hey, you okay?" Char then overhears a splash. "Hm?" The burly dragon moves his head out from behind Blast, and then sees Dragona, in all her beauty. "Whoa." Dragona was standing on the water with her tail in a large glass tank. She was spinning around, making the water underneath her start to swirl around her body in two blasts. Char walks up beside Blast, and then starts elbowing him on his side, "She's a keeper. Huh Blast? Blast?" Blast looked as if he was lost in a trance, keeping his glaring eyes set on Dragona's upcoming routine as he was starting to drool a bit. "Ew. But I see what's going on here."

Dragona had her eyes closed the entire time, but she then takes a quick peek, noticing Char and Blast standing side-by-side as they kept their eyes on her. She just continues on with her routine, "Oh. Hi guys. Just gimme a minute."

Blast says while still in dreamland, "No... Take your time..."

"Oy..." Char crosses his large arms, "It's gonna take a tire iron to knock him out of his funk."

After a few minutes, Dragona's routine comes to a close, the water around her falling back into the tank. Dragona then slithers out of the tank, "So how have you guys been doing? You figure out what you two are gonna do for the show?"

"Oh yeah!", Char replies with a flex of his right arm. "We can't wait to show it! Right Blast?"

Blast's eyes were still gleaming, "Marry me?"

"What?"

"I-I mean, uh, Mary. Mee. Mary Mee, is a character from this old childhood story I used to read. Hehehe...", Blast continues fakely laughing.

Char looks at his friend with a smirk, "Smoooth."

Blast whispers so only Char could hear, "Shut up!"
121211111111111112111.title: Where the Girls At?

1212111111111111121111.content:
Char and Blast stayed in their dressing room sitting anxiously for their act to start. It was show night, their first show, and they couldn't wait to show the crowd what they can do. Char paced back and forth in front of Blast who was sitting relaxed in his chair. "You got the belt?" asked Char nervously. "Yep." answered Blast. "Are you sure?" said Char. Blast got up and grabbed the mega dragon's shoulders. "Yes, I'm sure I got it. I haven't moved it from my shell since you put it there! Don't worry. We're going to be fine. Just stick to the plan and everything will be alright!" Char took a deep breath. "You're right," he said. "I'm ready."

The Arcanine boss came in to their room. "You guys got five minutes!" said the boss. "Wait for my signal. When you hear it, break the brick wall we set up." Blast and Char gave a thumbs up and the boss left. "Well," said Blast. "Let's do it!"

Blast and Char walked up the a ten foot solid brick wall. They could hear their boss anouncing to the audience. "Ladies and gentlemen, if you think you've seen everything, think again! This show is still young, my friends! Ladies and Gentlemen, I present you the strongest Blastoise and Charizard you'll ever see! Blast and Char! It was their cue, Blast and Char raised their fists and striked against the barrier before them. The muscle pokemon were blinded by lights and deafened by the cheering crowd.

The audience was happy to see them but a bit confused. Char and Blast were wearing skin tight clothing on them. If they were muscle men, the crowd needed to see some raw muscle on them. "I think we need to show 'em!" said Char. Blast and Char began to flex and swell their bodies as much as they could. Slowly, the audience could see flesh peeking out of their clothing. The holes in Blast and Char's clothes got bigger and bigger until there was noting left. Blast and Char erupted themselves out of the clothing! The crowd cheered by this feat and some of the females in the crowd were stunned to see such big and powerful muscles on Blast and Char.

The muscle duo waved and bowed. "You ain't see nothin' yet!" said Char. "Ready, Blast?" "Ready, Char!" answered Blast. Blast opened his shell and released his twin cannons. He pointed them directly at Char. The crowd had no idea what Blast was planning. Blast released freezing cold wind at Char. Char could take it despite ice being his weakness but he still didn't like the cold. As much as he wanted to leave, Char couldn't. Char's feet were frozen with ice! The ice was creeping up his rippling body! It wasn't long until Blast covered Char in a block of ice leaving but Char's fiery tail unharmed.

The audience gasped and whispered in panic. Has Blast lost his mind?! Blast raised his arms to the crowd. He said, "Laides and gentlemen, don't be alarmed. I assure you my friend is fine." Blast turned to the frozen dragon. "Aren't you, bud?" Everyone could hear creaking from the ice cube. The creaking got louder as the cracks got wider. Char burst out the block with a roar and a double upward bicep flex! The crowd cheered to see Char was okay. Blast and Char responded by flexing their amazing bodies to the pleasant crowd.
1212111111111111121111.title: It's Showtime!

choices: Hold on to that for a sec."
12121111111111111211111.content:
Char points out to the crowd, "Alright folks! Prepare to get your minds blown! Blast?" Blast shoots the belt out of his shell, landing perfectly onto Char's hand. Char then straps the belt onto his waist. "Observe. Bulk up!!" Char immedietaly feels the belt working it's magic all over his already muscular body. Char clenched his teeth, feeling his neck start to widen out and stretch above his chest. Char then turns around, letting the crowd get a good view of his widening back muscles, which also started to show much more definition as more inner muscles started to protrude. Blast watches his pal grow as the crowd starts to gasp with become awestruck. "Gettin' a good view folks?!"

The crowd cheers. In fact they even got a couple whistles and girly screams. "Come on folks, yell with me.", Blast chants, "Grow! Grow! Grow!" The crowd started chanting along, Char really starting to like the response he was getting. Char started to feel a tingle in his arms. That could only mean one thing, they were the next to grow. Char goes right ahead and flexes his arms up in a back double-bicep pose. His biceps were the first to fill out, then his triceps, and then his forearms, until he had two magnificent arms bulging all over, which he flexes hard in response. "How's the gun show folks?", Blast asks the crowd.

The crowd just screams with applauds once again. Char was feeling great so far, the growth, the rush of adrenaline, everything! Char then turns around so he was facing the crowd, stretching out his pecs and lats, which were the next in line. Char just tensed up his chest, his pecs starting to throb a bit, and then stretched out even more. As for Char's abs, his rock-hard six-pack was filling out even more, turning into an 8-pack. It could even become a 10-pack if he flexes hard enough, which he did. Blast cheers on for his growing pal, "Doin' great so far!"

"Almost done!", Char yells out proudly, sticking out his left leg and stomping the ground. Char's thighs started their growth, becoming even thicker than they already are, as well as his calves down below. After one last throb from his entire body, Char's growth had come to a close. He was now a foot-and-a-half taller than his blue turtle friend, show applauded him in response. Char went and did a couple poses for the crowd, tensing and flexing as much of his body as he could after his most recent growth. Every inch of his muscled body has become noticeably bigger, as well as his wing span. Char then slips the belt off, handing it to his friend.

Char bend down and jumps right up, flapping his massive wings and flies across the large show area, letting the crowd get a closer view of his muscles as he continues flying around. The crowd cheers proudly for the burlier dragon in response. After about a minute of flying, Char lands safely beside his impressed friend. "That felt amazing!"

"Yeah!", Blast yells out, then turning towards the crowd, "But did that LOOK amazing!" The crowd cheers loudly in response.

Char looks at Blast, "Alright Blast!
12121111111111111211111.title: Grow Char, Grow!

121211111111111112111111.content:
Char looked back to the audience. "If you think I look good, you should see my buddy here. You guys want to see him big and strong?" The audience responded with a loud cheer and a chant, "Grow, Grow, Grow!"

How could Blast disappoint his loving fans? Blast wrapped the belt around his shell. "Okay, everyone," said Blast, "Say it with me! One, two, three!" The crowd, Char, and Blast altogether yelled, "BULK UP!" Blast could then feel the change happening inside him. His arms grew to peaking proportions and his chest added another set of abs. He could feel his bones stretching making him taller. Although Blast loved the growth sensation, it was very intense. He spent the whole time with his eyes closed and his teeth clenched.

The growth finally ceased. The crowd was wilder than ever before. Blast opened his eyes to see the new and improved Char face to face. Blast and Char then stood back to back in front of the crowd and flexed a bicep for the loving crowd

Blast and Char continued flexing every muscle they had. "What now?" asked Blast. Char grinned. "I have an idea, but you're not going to like it." "What do y..whoa HEY!" To everyone's amazement, Char grabbed his turtle friend and raised him above his head. "I hate it when you do that!" said Blast. "Get me down now!" Char looked up and smiled. "Nope!" Char then squatted down and spread out his wings. Blast knew what Char was thinking now. "Don't. Even. Think about it!" Too late.

Char got into the air flying with Blast over his head! The audience didn't have anymore energy to express their amazement. They just sat speechless by this remarkable feat. Char felt great, so great that he felt he could literally do anything. Meanwhile, Blast was terrified as they flew very close to the audience. Blast was never one for heights.

After a minute, Char flew back to the circus ring and placed Blast down. Before Blast could say or do anything, everyone on the bleachers stood up clapping and cheering. Blast and Char waved their meaty arms while Blast said, "Never. Do that. Again!" Char just smiled and said, "Not making any promises!"

After what felt like forever, the show was finally over. Blast and Char grew down with the belt to their previous size in the dressing room. Char collapsed on the chair next to him. "Man, that was awesome and tiring!" he said. "I know what you mean!" said Blast. "But I liked it!" Blast and Char high fived each other agreeing that they could keep on doing this forever. Then they heard a knock on the door. It was Nyne and Dragona. "Hey, guys!" said Nyne. "We just wanted to come by and tell you were amazing!" Dragona nodded in agreement. "Especially when Char flew with Blast over his head! That was so cool!" Blast blushed in embarrassment.
121211111111111112111111.title: Grand Finale

choices: "Perhaps, show us how strong you are?"
1212111111111111121111111.content:
"How did you do that?", Dragona asks them curiously? Should they tell them? Well, it should be okay, but they're not gonna tell them the whole story.

Blast looks at Char, who nods back at him in agreement, but quickly pulls Blast in to whisper to him. "Just, don't tell them that we're originally normal pokemon."

Nyne and Dragona stared at the two of them, a little puzzled. "Is, something wrong?", Nyne asks.

Char and Blast looked at them, and then Char lets go of Blast. "Oh, nothing. Blast just needed me to scratch his ear."

Blast punches Char away. "What he means to say is, we simply grew using this." Blast holds up the belt they found and used.

Nyne and Dragona look closely at it, Dragona being the first to say, "Wow. Isn't that a machoke's belt?"

"Uh huh.", Char replies rubbing his cheek.

"So, does that mean a machoke's belt can pump up anyone who wears it?", Nyne asks.

"Apparently yes.", Blast replies.

Dragona continues, "And, does that mean you two are normally..."

"No!", Char blurts out suddenly, the three staring at him puzzled. He regains his composure, "I mean, we're still buff and all that. In fact we wouldn't have gotten so big if not for the inspiration of this belt in the first place."

Blast shakes his head him, not looking impressed. He continues while turning towards the girls, "Look, you two are actually the first we've ever told about this. So, if you don't mind, keeping this between us?"

"Oh. Well, to be honest, you really didn't have to tell us.", Dragona confesses.

"In all seriousness, we were commenting, not questioning.", Nyne added.

Char and Blast glance at each other, and then backed up a bit, each striking their own well-muscled pose. "Isn't it obvious?", Char asks.

"We're in love with you two. And that's all that matters.", Blast answers for them. They then stood back up side-by-side. "Plus we can destroy you two if you tell anybody." Char sighs, and then elbows Blast on his cheek. "I was kidding!"

Nyne and Dragona look at each other, and then back at the two of them. "Alright.", Nyne being the first to speak. "We'll keep this a secret."

"It wouldn't be very pleasing to the crowd if they knew how you guys grow anyways.", Dragona finishes. "But, if, you two wouldn't mind doing a little something for us."

Char and Blast blink their eyes at them, "Hm?"
1212111111111111121111111.title: Here's How it's Done...

12121111111111111211111112.content:
"Well," said Nyne, "do you think you guys could grow some for us?" Blast and Char smiled at her request. "It would be our pleasure!" said Char winking to Nyne. "Blast, hand over the belt!" Blast tossed the belt to his dragon buddy and Char wrapped it around his waist.

"You girls ready?" said Char flexing an already large bicep. Nyne and Dragona nodded excitedly as if they were shake their heads off their bodies. Char breathed in puffing his chest. "Bulk up!" he yelled. Then he felt it again. The girls could barely contain their excitement as they saw Char's muscles growing to greater proportions. Char kept his bicep tense during the growth process. It grew bigger and stronger with a vein stretching to his wrist! The girls looked down to see another set of abs popping out.

The growth was complete and Char felt the same amount of power as he did during the show. He looked down to see Nyne and Dragona with ther jaws dropped. "Wow," mouthed Nyne softly to herself. "That was amazing!" exclaimed Dragona. Char returned the compliments with a smirk. "You ain't seen nothing yet!" Char then raised his arms as high as he could and tense them until they were bigger than his head. His biceps were the size of beachballs and his legs looked like huge tree trunks. Char joked with Nyne and Dragona by bouncing his pecs and stroking his abs.

Char unbuckled the belt and tossed it to Blast. "Show these ladies what you got, Blast!" Blast looked at the girls who were giving the same envious look they gave to Char. "With pleasure." said Blast.Blast put on the belt and yelled, "Bulk up!" The same process was happening to Blast. His already huge muscles on his arms, legs, and chest were growing even larger! It wasn't long till he got the same results as Char.

Blast and Char looked down at the girls and leaned on each other's back side by side. "What do you think?" said Blast. "You guys look amazing! I can't believe it!" said Dragona. "Show us what you can do!" yelled Nyne. Blast and Char then went into a posing session for the ladies. They tensed their muscles as the girls' emotions for them also tensed.

After a puff of their chests, Blast and Char finally lost all their energy after what felt was a long time. "I think it's time to call it a day." said Char. Nyne and Dragona gave a sound of disappointment. "Are you sure?" said Nyne. Char nodded. "Yeah, Blast and I need our energy for our next show! Don't worry, this isn't the last time you'll see us like this!" Char winked at his foxy lady and she said, "Okay." Blast and Char took turns bulking down to their previous size with the belt. Dragona wrapped her tail around Blast's shell, "Thanks for the show," she said. Blast blushed. "No prob. Glad you liked it!"

The girls walked out of the duo's dressing room. "So, what do you want to do now, good buddy?" asked Char. "I don't know about you, but after a couple of intense shows like that, I just wanna relax!"
12121111111111111211111112.title: Grow more!

choices: "Come on. Let's go for a massage."
"Come on. Let's go for a quick bite to eat."
