121211111111111112111111121.content:
"I know! Let's bulk down real quick and head to the spa.", Blast replies with anticipation.

"The spa huh?", Char thinks to himself. "That sounds like a great idea!"

Later, it didn't take long for Char and Blast to reach the nearest spa place. Inside, they were greeted by a furret and a blissey, who were surprised by their muscular stature indeed. Char told them they'd like to have the full package. The first was the hot pool spa. Char and Blast were now lying inside of a large hot spa pool, with only half of their body in the water. They were also sweating profusely with a sweat towel on their foreheads, but it was good for them. Blast had his eyes closed, and then opens one eye to look at his pal Char, with his eyes closed and pretty much in the same relaxing position as him. "Hey, Char? You awake?"

Char had his eyes closed, but was responsive. "Mm... Talk ta me."

"There's, been something I've been wanting to talk to you about.", Blast said.

Char starts wiping the side of his head with his sweat towel. "Okay. What's it about?"

"It's about you and me and the belt. You really like what you're doing with the belt and all that?", Blast asked.

"I'm pretty sure you know the answer to that question.", Char replies, squeezing his towel.

"I mean lying to Nyne about what you really look like.", Blast added.

Char paused. He stares at the pool for a moment. "Well, no. But, I don't think it'd be okay to tell her now." Char points at Blast with his towel, "But what about you?! You're lying to Dragona about what you really look like."

"Nope. She knows.", Blast replies simply.

"What!? When was this?", Char asked profusely.

"Remember when we bulked down and I said I had to use the restroom? And you said I should ease up on the smoothies?", Blast explained.

"Oh yeah...", Char remembered. "So, how'd she take it."

"She was okay with it. In fact she was proud that I was honest with her." Blast went ahead and flexed an arm, "She still likes to see me big though."

Char stares at his big friend. "Oh. Well, I don't know. She was kinda mesmerized about me when I first walked up to her. I don't know how she'll react when she finds out when I'm not really big."

"Who knows.", Blast adds. "Maybe she'll like you more for being honest with her."

Char turns around, laying on the edge of the pool with his arms, "I don't know... I kinda want wait for the right moment."

"Jeez, it's not like you're gonna marry her or anything." Blast shrugs his shoulders, "Maybe not yet. But hey, if you wanna wait, I won't force ya."
121211111111111112111111121.title: Relaxation Time

1212111111111111121111111211.content:
Despite hot water soaking their bodies, Blast and Char still felt tense from their shows. Char started feeling anxious about what to say to Nyne. "Sorry I brought that up," said Blast, "I know what will cheer you up! A massage!" Char took a deep breath. "Yeah, that sounds good."

Char and Blast got out of the tub, wrapped towels around their waists, and walked to the massage rooms. They met a Blissey at the front desk. She too was amazed their size and blushed at the sight of water streaming down their bumpy chests. "Um, can, can I help you?" asked the Blissey. "We would like massages please." said Blast. The Blissey was thrilled by the request and was excited to do it for them, but she kept her composure. "Oh, of course," she said, "Go ahead in back. My assistant and I will be there shortly."

The meaty pokemon did as they were told. The Blissey couldn't help but stare at their back muscles as they passed. The Blissey returned to them with her Machamp assistant. "Are, are you two ready?" asked the Blissey. Blast and Char looked at each other knowing why Blissey was stuttering. "You bet!" said Char. "Okay," she replied. She tried to quickly choose the one she thought would have the most muscle to touch. She pointed to Char. "I'll go ahead and take you. Maca, could you do the Blastoise, please?" "Of course," answered the Machamp.

Char lied down on the massage table and Blissey almost instantly placed her hand on his shredded back. She stroked his back up and down feeling the tensity and power Char's muscles held. Char surprised her by flexing his back, showing more definition. Blissey was amazed how much strength Char must have. After a few minutes, Blissey said, "I finished with you back, but I think you're tense in your arms. I might need to massage those two." Char knew what Blissey was trying to do and didn't stop her. "Whatever you say," said Char innocently.

Maca pounded her four hands on Blast's shell. It would normally crack a regular Blastoise's shell but Blast was different. Her pounding was very soothing to him. The vibrations from the pounding loosened the tendons and relaxed his muscles. "This is awesome!" said Blast. "Anywhere else you want me to massage?" asked Maca. Blast turned over face up and said, "Think you can pound my chest?"

After half an hour, Blast and Char were fully energized and at ease. "That felt great!" said Char. "Thank you!" "Th..Thank you." said Blissey. "Please come again." As Char and Blast were walking away, they could hear the Blissey and Machamp talking about how big they were and how their muscles felt. They knew they felt good. "I don't know about you, but I feel great!" said Blast. "What do you want to do now?"
1212111111111111121111111211.title: Rough Tension

choices: Try out the test of strength.
12121111111111111211111112111.content:
'Yawwwn' Char yawned. Although the spa was very soothing, he was now even more sleepy than before. Blast pats Char on his shoulder, "You sound tired. What say we head back and go get some sleep?"

Char yawns once again, a tear on the side of his eye. "Yeah. That'd be nice."

It wasn't long until they've reached their destination back at the circus. Thanks to Dragona, they both had their own tent to sleep in now. After the show they brought upon everyone back there, the boss would give them their own home if they wanted. Just to sleep and relax in of course. Anyways, Char and Blast entered back into their tent. Inside were two sleeping bags that were luckily large enough to fit the two of them in their current size. Any bigger and they'd have to just sleep ON the bag instead of IN it. "You have a good sleep. Kay bud?", Blast says to Char.

Char was almost already half asleep, "Mm... You too..."

In a matter of few minutes, Char was already fast asleep. Blast on the other hand, was still awake, lying in his sleeping bag with his muscled arms folded behind his head. He was just staring up at the top of the tent they stayed in. "Huh. Guess I'm not that tired." Blast sits up, looking over to his dreaming friend. Blast chuckles, and then decides to get out from the tent. He raises his arms, stretching them, then stretches his body and legs. "Hmm... Maybe I'll take a look around the place."

Blast takes a look around the circus, checking out all the people who participated in the show earlier. He thought about meeting one of them, but then spotted another place. A carnival. Apparently there was a carnival taking place on the other side of the circus. "A carnival huh?" Blast shrugs his shoulders, "Wouldn't hurt to check it out." Blast went right ahead. It wasn't that crowded, but it was enough to keep a business going. Blast merely checks out one attraction, which was a game where you throw a dart to pop a bubble and win a prize, but then gets sidetracked by a couple screams. "Huh!?"

The pokemon around him sure knew who he was. Heck, he was one of the tallest pokemon there! The folks were happy to see him and Char at the show, but never expected him to be hanging out there with them! Blast looked around, getting a lot of looks back. Blast slowly raises a hand, "Uhhh, hi." Blast gets a BUNCH of greetings in return. "Alright, alright, alright! I'm, just here ta hang out a bit. Maybe, try out a few attractions." Blast slowly starts to walk away, dragging himself with one foot, "So, you, all, have, a good time." Blast just walks away, but not without a small group of pokemon following him. He sighs. "Ah well. What are ya gonna do? Hmm... Maybe I can appease them with one of these attractions."
12121111111111111211111112111.title: Sleepy. Not Sleepy.

121211111111111112111111121111.content:
Blast knew there was no escape from the crowd following him. Might as well show them what they want. Blast spotted a test of strength carnival game when a player has to pick up a heavy hammer and slam it to ring the bell several feet above him. Blast shrugged. "Why not?" he thought to himself.

Blast walked up to the carnival game where he was met by a Dragonite standing beside it. The Dragonite was hosting the game. He took one look at Blast and instantly knew who he was. "Pleasure to see you this evening, Mr. Blast!" said the Dragonite. "Care for a little game?" "You know it!" answered Blast.

Blast saw the hammer leaning against the stand and picked it up with little hesitation. Normally, an average sized pokemon wouldn't be able to swing it. Blast swung over his shoulder with one hand. The turtle gripped the hammer tightly and focused on the target right in front of him. The crowd gathered around him wanting to see his magnificent feat.

Blast took a deep breath and slammed the hammer against the target. The piece of metal flew like a bullet all the way to the top. The bell rung so hard for everyone to hear. The audience screamed in praise for Blast. Blast responded with a simple bicep flex with his hand still holding the hammer.

Althougth Blast didn't expect the attention, he grew to like it. He posed for photos and had little kid pokemon hang on to him. It felt good to be appreciated. "Blast?" The turtle turned to see his beautiful water dragon girlfriend behind him. "Dragona!" he said. "What are you doing here?" "I'm hosting a dunk tank game here." said Dragona. "What about you? I figured you and Char would be asleep after the day you two had."
"Yeah, but I couldn't sleep. Thought I'd come here and check the place out."
"You want to walk around? I have some time before I get started."?
"Sure."

Blast and Dragona passed games and staring people as they walked and talked. "I told Char about you knowing we're not actually big." Dragona turned to his face. "You did? How did he take it?" Blast shrugged. "Pretty well, I think. Still isn't sure if he should tell Nyne though." "She's gonna get mad if she finds out before Char tells her." said Dragona. "I know."

"Anyway, change of subject," said Dragona, "How'd you and Char like your first day as strongmen?" Blast didn't hesitate answering. "It was awesome! Doing impossible feats in front of a cheering crowd is very rewarding!" "Well, you going to continue on liking it," said Dragona. "We're going to be here for a few more days and head to the next town." "Sounds good!" said Blast. "It would be a crime to hide these guns from the world!" Blast then heaved an arm to flex and Dragona laughed.
121211111111111112111111121111.title: Step right up and test your strength!

1212111111111111121111111211111.content:
"So Dragona, who's the guy being dunked?", Blast asks his serpent friend.

"His name is Goldu. I've actually been waiting for him to come back from his break, but he's still not here yet. Unless..." Dragona looks up at Blast.

Blast just stares back at her. "...What?"

"Well, I've actually had a pretty long line waiting and...", she and Blast came to a stop. In front of them was a line about a fourth of a mile long. "Oh no..."

"I didn't even know the dunk tank would be a popular game.", Blast remarks.

"Neither did I.", Dragona added. "Unless there's a wise guy sitting over the tank. He's been mouthing off people and they just wanted to keep him quiet all day." Dragona takes another look around. "And he's still not here...!"

Blast glances at Dragona. "Hey, why don't I take over for him? At least until this line dims down a bit."

Dragona stares at Blast for a moment. "Are...are you sure? You're not gonna talk down to people are you?"

Blast pats his chest, "No way. I may be the biggest guy you know, but I'm not the meanest. Come on."

Dragona grins, nodding her head in agreement. "Alright. Let's get going." There were a couple pokemon waiting impatiently at the front. That all changed once they caught a glimpse of a large figure taking Goldu's place. Dragona showed Blast the way, and then he sat right where the volunteer normally sits. Luckily the seat was steady enough to hold a big guy such as himself. "Alright everyone. Sorry for the wait. So, who's next in line?"

The pokemon standing at the front were staring intently at Blast, who was sitting patiently in his place with his large arms crossed over his chest and with his usual grin set on his face. Blast breaks the silence. "Well? What're ya waitin' for? Who thinks they can hit the target at just the right spot?"

Blast was still sitting with a bunch of frozen eyes staring back at him. He was starting to worry he was a little hard on them before. Dragona stares at the crowd, then at Blast, then back to the line. "He'll keep his trap shut the whole time." Suddenly, those who were in line held out their arms with a dollar bill sticking out in their hands.

Well, we'll just have to wait and see.
1212111111111111121111111211111.title: Game Time

choices: Go on to the next day
12121111111111111211111112111112.content:
So far, no one was able to dunk Blast. But Blast didn't mind; he liked showing off his bare arms and chest to the crowd. In a way, he was still rewarding the crowd even when they lost. Blast felt good on top of his pedestal and Dragona was so thankful for his volunteering.

After about a half hour, a large Vinesaur came up from the line. He wasn't intimidated by Blast's bulk. In fact, he was determined to humiliate him by dunking him underwater. The Vinesaur fueled himself with confidence. He felt like there was no way that could lose.

"You think you can dunk me?" asked Blast to the Vinesaur while flexing his arms. "You bet I will!" replied the Vinesaur. "Everyone's just distracted by your size! Not me! I'll dunk you and show everyone the woose you really are!" Blast like his enthusiasm and decided to play along. "Okay, prove it!"

Dragona gave the Vinesaur a few balls for him to throw and the Vinesaur began without hesitation. The first two throws were misses. Blast could see the Vinesaur was getting really frustrated. On his third and final throw, the Vinesaur struck towards the target as hard as he could. The ball hit the target, but it didn't hit it hard enough to dunk the mighty turtle.

"Are you kidding me?!" exclaimed the Vinesaur. "I had that shot! That should've counted!"
"Take it easy, man," said Blast. "It's just a stupid game."
"Shut up! You cheated! This whole thing is rigged!"

Dragona had to do something before this got out of hand. "Sir," she directed the Vinesaur, "I'm going to have to ask you to calm down." The Vinesaur got up to Dragona's face. "Shut up!" said the Vinesaur. Dragona was getting impatient with him. She hated sore losers. "Sir, I'm going to have to ask you to leave."

The frustration quickly turned to anger in the Vinesaur. If there one thing that he hating than losing, it was people telling him what to do. He pushed Dragona to the ground. "I told you to shut up!" The Vinesaur then kicked Dragona while she was on the ground.

Blast was getting angrier than the Vinesaur ever could. No one ever messes with him or his girl. Blast jumped off the platform over the tank and shadowed the Vinesaur. Before the Vinesaur could turn to see him, Blast grabbed by the shirt and lifted him a few feet in the air. His arms thickened and tensed as well as his neck in anger. "Don't EVER touch her!" Blast yelled into the Vinesaur's face. "Got it?!" The Vinesaur could tell Blast meant business and he wasn't holding his muscles just for show. The Vinesaur nodded his head as fast as he could before Blast did something to him.

Blast threw the Vinesaur across the stand. "Get out of here!" Blast yelled. The Vinesaur did as he was told. Blast then turned to his girl and offered her his giant hand. "Are you okay?" he asked her. "Yeah," Dragona answered getting up. "I hate people like that!"
"Don't worry. He'll never bother you again. I'll be sure of it!"
"Thanks, Blast. I think it's time we call it a night."
12121111111111111211111112111112.title: The Biggest Loser

choices: Check out the late night carny.
Nah. Just work out. Maybe try something with the belt.
121211111111111112111111121111121.content:
Night time was fast approaching, and still no sign of Goldu. Oh well. It'd be too late to worry about him now anyway. Before turning in, Blast wanted to make sure Dragona was okay after her ordeal. "I'm fine Blast. I didn't get hurt too bad."

"But you still got kicked.", Blast objected. "You uh, want me to accompany you to your abode?"

Dragona chuckles. "It's a little early for that, don't you think?"

Blast jumps up, waving his arms in front of his chest in a assurance, "Th-that's not what I meant! I--"

Blast then gets interrupted by Dragona's laughter. She then wraps her arms around Blast's back. At least as much as he could of it. "I'm kidding. You're awful jumpy."

Blast turns his head away, grumbling to himself, "I wasn't until now."

Dragona then plants a quick smooch on Blast's cheek, making him blush just a smudge. "I'll be fine, okay? But thanks for checkin' up on me." Dragona starts trotting off, waving back to the burly turtle, Blast doing the same.

Back in Char and Blast's tent, Char was still fast asleep from his afternoon nap. As for Blast, he had just entered back into their tent, slowly lying on his stomach in his usual resting place next to Char. Char's ears perked, and then his eyelids started to raise, "Hm?" As for Blast, he was starting to feel really sleepy himself, about ready to shut his eyes when, 'YAWWWN!'

A loud yawning noise eminates from behind Blast, but who else could it've came from? "Hmph. I see you're finally awake."

Char then lets out another loud dragon-like roar. "Mmmyep! Feel like I can take on the whole day now!"

"It's night time, genius."

"Whoa! That was fast!", the charizard yelped.

"Oy..."

Char turns to his muscular friend and started shaking him a bit, "Well, hey, why don't we head out and work out some more?", Char asked eagerly.

"Sorry man. I'm out." Blast turns back around to sleep, "You go on ahead though."

Char pouts, standing up, "Jeez man. You just NOW go to sleep?"

"Hey, that's what you get for sleeping early." Blast lets out a yawn now. "Good night."

Char was about to complain some more, but the snoozing from his friend showed that he was already fast asleep. Char sighs, "Alright, fine." Char walked on out of his tent. It wasn't that late right now, but it was getting there. He first takes a look around to see many tents that stood around him, but then takes notice of the carnival Blast last partook in. It seemed very bright and vibrant over there. Maybe Char can entertain himself while he's there. But still, a late night carnival?
121211111111111112111111121111121.title: Back to the Tent

1212111111111111121111111211111212.content:
Char thought it was a little late to go to the carnival. Besides he didn't want to draw too much attention to himself. The nap made Char feel a little sluggish, so he figured a decent workout would wake him up. Before he left, he got the belt and then made his way.

Char walked around with his hands behind his head emphasizing his arms and chest. He was thinking about how much his life had changed so much in so little time. Char was glad where his life was heading but it was also a bit overwhelming. But at least he had his best friend with him.

Char went back to the tent where the show took place. It was completely deserted. All that was left were platforms, weights, and other heavy objects he could lift. Char figured this would a good place to wake up his muscles.

Char first noticed the weight he and Blast used in their act. He decided to give it a shot. The last time he lifted it was when he was bulked up but he wanted to challenge himself. Char squatted to the weight and gripped it tightly. He raised the weight to his chest but it wasn't easy; just the way he wanted it. He could feel his muscles burning and growing stronger under the pressure. The muscle dragon loved this sensation.

Char thought it was too dangerous to lift the bar over his head without bulking up so he just did reps up to his chest. He was feeling more energetic and powerful after each rep. In fact, he stared off into space while lifting it.

"Um, excuse me?"

Char stopped and turned to see a little Charmander kid peeking throught the tent. Char dropped the weight and greeted the kid. "Hey there, little guy. Come on in. I won't bite." The Charmander walked towards the mega dragon still holding his shy composure. The Charmander then stuttered trying to get words out. "Um, I just wanted to say..I saw your show..and..I really liked it." Char couldn't help but be flattered by him. The Charmander reminded Char of him when he was a Charmander. He was very shy until he met Blast as a Squirtle.

Char squatted his hulking frame to the Charmander. "Thanks a lot," said Char. "That really means a lot coming from you."
"R..Really?"
"Yeah, I really appreciate it."

Char could see the Charmander was still a little scared of him. "You don't need to be afraid," said Char. "Despite my intimiding appearance, I'm a nice guy, especially towards Charmanders like you!"
"Thanks," said the Charmander. "Someday, I wish to be big as you."

That really flattered Char. He never thought of being a role model for somebody so small and innocent. He felt proud of both himself and the Charmander. Char could see someday that the Charmander will reach his goal someday.
1212111111111111121111111211111212.title: Strength Large and Small

12121111111111111211111112111112121.content:
The charmander was really proud to meet one of the biggest inspirations he'll ever meet. He's still awfully shy though. "Well I, guess you'll want me out of your hair."

"Nonsense!", Char interjected, patting the small pokemon on his head. "You actually got me in a good mood. Why don't you stay awhile? It'd be no trouble at all."

"Oh, uh, okay.", the small dragon replies with anticipation. "So, what're you doing?"

Char raises his right arm, flexing his well-peaked bicep for the charmander, "Workin' out. What else? Gotta stay on top if I want to be the biggest dragon around." Char walks up to the large weight he was lifting earlier, bending his thick legs to grip the half-ton piece of metal. Before he lifts it, the charmander runs over to feel the weight in Char's hands. "Hm? What's up?"

The small reptile looks up at Char, "Um, this thing is made of metal."

"Well, yeah."

"I thought it was made out of rubber.", the charmander remarks.

Char felt offended, but he couldn't yell at the little tike. "Who gave you that idea?"

"My dad.", he answered. "My dad says everything weight-lifters lift is fake and made out of rubber just to make you guys look good. And that your muscles were just balloons being inflated to make you look buff."

Okay, Char officially felt offended now. But he's still not gonna yell at the little tike. He stand back up straight, "Oh yeah?" Char kneels down on one knee in front of the small charmander, flexing his right arm once again in front of the shy pokemon. "Go ahead. Give that a feel."

The small charmander was unsure at first, but then he went for it, patting his small hands all over Char's enormous bicep. "Wow! Your arm feels like metal too!"

"Eeyup!" Char then sticks his arms outward to his left in a outwards side-chest pose, pumping and flexing his muscles hard. "What you just felt and see in front of you is an all-natural, hard-working dragon pokemon." Char then raises his arms up in a double-bicep pose with his fists pointed away, still with his knees bent. "Every muscle on my body is sculpted to solid perfection, and all I want is to get bigger."

"Is that what the belt is for?", the small pokemon interrupted.

Char relaxes his muscles to look down at the small charmander, "What do you mean?"

"My dad says you're really a puny weakling under all that mass, and only use the belt to make yourself look good and hide what you really are inside."

That comment hit Char pretty hard on the inside, even though half of it was partly true. Char yammers in his head, his eye twitching, but not enough to get the small pokemon's attention. "Yo daddy sounds like a messed-up jerk." Char then puts his warming expression back on, looking back down at the small charmander pokemon, speaking aloud, "Listen, you've just felt my arm right? Isn't that proof enough?"

The charmander nods his head, "Uh-huh. I think so."

"Good. Then why don't you tell that to your dad? If he still doesn't believe me, he's more than welcome to head over and meet me and my friend. Alright?"

"Okay.", the charmander replies with anticipation.

Char stands up straight backing up a bit. He then turns sideways and turns his upper body around so that the small reptile would get a good view of his mountainous back muscles, raising his arms up and flexing them along with the rest of his body. The charmander was just in awe of the large dragon's mass and definition all over his body. "Just remember kid, THIS, is real." Char even kissed a bicep just to show off, and gives a peace-out and bright and proud smile to the little guy.

"Wow!"

Char walks up to him and pats him on the head once again, "Now, why don't you head on home? It's getting pretty late."

"Okay." The charmander starts to walk off, but stops and turns around to face Char. "It was really nice to meet you. I hope I'll see you again."

"Hey, you're welcome anytime you want. The same goes for your parents.", Char assured the little pokemon happily.

"Wow! Okay!", the little tike exclaimed. "I will!" The little one was just about out of the tent, but turns back around to face Char. "Oh, and my dad says that your friend is a real knucklehead, and is really slow because of his large shell."

"It's gettin' pretty late kid.", Char interrupts. The charmander remembers how late it was, and then skimpers off. Char sighs, setting his hands on his hips. "Cute kid. Really hope he and his parents stop by tomorrow." Char then punches a fist against his other palm, wearing a tick-off grin on his face. "I'd like to set his dad straight."
12121111111111111211111112111112121.title: Parents Tell Their Kids Anything

choices: "You want I help you back to your tent?"
"You want I get you some medical supplies?"
121211111111111112111111121111121211.content:
Aside from Char's being offended by the tike's father, Char was actually feeling more exhilarated to work out some more after showing off for the little guy. Char turns back towards the large weight he was about to lift, "Now! Back to that weight!" Char starts by firmly planting his feet on the ground, and then bends his body forward to squeeze his meaty paws underneath to get a good grip. After a few deep breaths, Char flexes his entire upper body to lift said weight of the ground as slowly and firmly as he could. Twas no problem of course, "There we go."

The burly dragon immediately starts lifting the weight without a second's thought, bending his legs up and down in slow repititions, lowering his body down to work out his legs, and bringing his body back up to pump the weight on his upper body. Char was really starting to enjoy this even more, letting out a toothy grin on the side of his maw. One of the things helping this dragon perform such feats was the thought of him flexing and posing to one of his littlest fans. What was helping him even more was what the tike brought up, 'My dad says
My dad says you're really a puny weakling under all that mass, and only use the belt to make yourself look good and hide what you really are inside.'

This made the large pokemon growl, pumping himself with the half-ton weight even harder. "I can't wait to show that no-good--"

"Looks like you're having fun."

"GAH!" Char flinches, letting loose the large weight from his hands. The weight hits the ground, and, crushes Char's right foot. "GAAAUGHCK!" Char tries frantically to slip his foot out. He was successful, but his foot looked a little worse for wear. "Owww...!"

"Oh no! " The person who ran to Char's side was Nyne, who drops to her knees to attend to the injured mon. "Are you okay!?"

"No! I think it's crushed...", Char bursts out.

Nyne felt so bad for the hurt dragon. "I'm...I'm so sorry. I didn't mean to scare you like that."

Char's face showed he was in deep pain, but he still puts on a weak smile for the saddened fox. "Heh. Ah don't worry. I can't stay mad at you."

Nyne felt that was pretty touching, but..."Char, your foot looks pretty bad. It's starting to swell up."
121211111111111112111111121111121211.title: Exhilarated

1212111111111111121111111211111212112.content:
Char felt embarrassed that a big strong dragon like him would have a foot injury like this. His foot went from a slab of meat to a puffy balloon. Nyne had to do something.

"I'll go get the first aid kit," said Nyne. "Will you be okay till I get back?"

Char flexed a bicep back to her. "Of course!" he answered.

Char was doing his best to act cool under the pain for Nyne but it was so hard for him. He then turned to the weight he was lifting. How was he going to prove the skeptical dad now with his foot like this? Judging by the pain and look of his foot, Char may not be able to perform for weeks, maybe months. What was going to happen to the mighty dragon now?

Nyne returned carrying a white box with a red cross on it. She opened it grabbing the roll of bandages. "You're going to be fine," she said. The fox then opened up the bandages and began wrapping them around Char's swollen foot. The coolness of the bandages made Char feel more comfortable but didn't make the pain go away. After a few minutes, Nyne was done wrapping Char's foot.

"Okay, I think this will do for now," said Nyne, "But I think we need to get you to a doctor to have it properly treated." Char couldn't agree more.

"Here, let help you up," said Nyne. The fox offered her hand to her dragon man and Char accepted it. Char place his good foot solid on the ground while keeping his bad foot up. "I can walk you to the car," said Nyne. Char was a little worried about that plan. "I don't know. I think I'm a little too big for you to lean on. Go get Blast. He'll help us out."
Nyne nodded. "Okay, I'll get him!"

Char leaned on the side of the tent waiting for Nyne to come back with Blast. After a few minutes, the fox and turtle appeared. Blast was surprised to see Char's foot. It didn't look good at all. Without hesitiation, Blast offered his arm to his buddy and Char leaned on Blast as they made their way to Nyne's car. As they were walking, Blast said, "Think you overdid it?"

"Shut up!" said Char.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112.title: Is there a doctor in the tent?.

choices: Stick around at the hospital some more.
12121111111111111211111112111112121121.content:
Char was sitting in one of the beds at the pokemon center. His foot was being lifted off the bed by a pully so he wouldn't feel anymore pain. Or at least not as much pain as he is currently enduring. Blast and Nyne were sitting beside him in a chair, Nyne still feeling very saddened by the whole incident. "Hey, what's the matter?" Nyne looks up at the injured dragon, who had a warming grin on his face. "Is something wrong?"

Nyne took it as if it were a stupid question. "Char!? I was the one who scared you and made you drop that weight on your foot! How can you understanding of me?"

Char looked back at Nyne as if she had just asked a dumb question, but then smiles. "It was just a fluke okay? It was mainly more my fault for being distracted while working out. I just had something on my mind." Nyne took in Char's comforting words, but, they didn't sound comforting enough. "Nyne, come here." Nyne gets up out of her seat to walk up to the muscular mon. She then receives one of the biggest hugs she was ever given. It didn't feel that hard, but it was enough to feel the large reptile's muscles thicken out around her. Char then sits back properly on his bed. "There. Ya see? It's okay."

Nyne couldn't help but blush at Char's kind gesture. "Mm... Okay."

Blast shrugs his shoulders, "Eh. Seems believible enough."

"You're not allowed to talk.", Char uttered.

"Hello. Char, is it?" The three are soon greeted by a rhydon doctor in a white lab coat and carrying a clipboard. "How're you feeling?"

"Still hurts a lot.", Char replied.

The rhydon takes a look at Char's chart. "Well, do you want the good news or the bad news?"

"Um...I, guess the bad news first.", Nyne answered.

"Well, it seems your foot got flattened pretty good. Probably won't get to walk on it for a month at the least."

The three of them gasp, Nyne replying, "Oh no..."

"And the good news?", Char continued.

"You're the last patient I have before I take the week off.", the rhydon doc replied happily. The three of them not at all interested in the good news.
12121111111111111211111112111112121121.title: Current Situation

121211111111111112111111121111121211211.content:
"Well, that was anti-climatic good news," said Char. "A month? What am I going to do in a month?"

Blast chuckled as said, "Maybe you can be the circus' new fortune teller!"

"Shut up!"

Nyne followed Blast's laughter and got up from her seat. "Well, I think I'll head back to the circus. You going to be okay, hun?"

"Of course!" replied Char tensing both his arms. "I'll be fine. Don't worry."

"Okay." Before she left, Nyne stopped at the door and turned back to Char. "Char, again, I'm sorry."

Char shook his head. "I told you not to worry! I'm fine! Go on back, I'll see you tomorrow."

"Okay," Nyne then left before she could apologize again.

Char gave a big sigh from the pillow he laid his head on. "So what am I going to do if I can't use my muscles for a month?"

"I'm sure we'll think of something," said Blast. "So what were you doing at that tent?"

"I thought I'd get a quick workout. But Nyne surprised me and I dropped the weight on my foot."

"Ouch!"

"Hey, I'm not mad at her. I can't stay mad at a cute girl like her. By the way, I saw the cutest kid come by the tent when I was working out!"

Blast's ears perked up. "Really? You already have a fan?"

"Yep. It was a little Charmander. He was a bit shy but a few flexes here and there changed that. He also mentioned a dad who's quite skepitcal in our muscle power."

Blast got up from his seat. "Say what, now?!"

"Yeah, the charmander said his dad thinks we're just a bunch of weaklings just putting a smoke and mirror show!"

Blast became just as offended as Char was and pounded his fist into the palm of his hand. "Looks like we're going to have to change his mind!"

"I couldn't agree more! But it's going to have to wait till my foot heals up." Char then gave a frown and sigh of disappointment.

The next morning, Char was greeted by his boss who had a sympathetic look on his face. "Hey champ," said the boss, "How ya feeling?"

"Doing okay," answered Char. "But I won't be able to walk with this foot for another month."

"A month?! What am I going to do without for you for a month?"

"You got Blast, sir."

"Yeah but I already advertised you guys as the muscle duo! Imagine people wanting to see you guys only seeing a muscle uno! I just might have to tell the audience the bad news. You just relax, Char. Focus on getting better." The arcanine then left the room leaving Char to think.
121211111111111112111111121111121211211.title: Hospital Stay

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast started to think to himself along with his burly friend. "Hmm... I suppose I can do a few extra feats to stall for some time at the show."

Char actually wasn't listening, staring intently at the ground. "......"

Blast starts tapping on Char's snout, "Heeey, you hear me?"

"I think I'm still go on.", Char interrupted.

Blast was surprised by Char's remark, but didn't really show it. "Dude, you're crazy. I think the pain from your foot is affectin' yer brain."

"Now, normally I wouldn't do this", Char added, "but, I kinda made a promise to that little charmander and wanted to prove his dad wrong about what he said."

"Dude, I'll prove him wrong for the both of us!" Blast raises his right arm in a bulging bicep flex, "I'll be sure to show him the good 'n' everything."

"... I still want to BE there though.", Char grumbles.

Blast relaxes his flexed arm, and then lets out a sigh. He was starting to get annoyed by his friend, but he also knew how stubborn Char was. Blast sets his hands on his waist, "Alright wise guy, how exactly do you intend to prove yourself to this kid on that hurt foot of yours?"

"It's simple. I'll just put most of the weight on my other foot." Char made it sound like it was so easy, but Blast cocks an eyebrow, not believing Char can pull it off. Char stands up from his seat, patting his injured foot lightly on the ground. "See? It's not--AAACK!!"

Blast sighs as his less-than-average-minded friend once again. "Look, before you start making yourself look bad, why don't you just stay in bed or something?" Blast pats Char on his shoulder, "I care about ya man. And I don't think this is the way to go. You may only end up making your foot ache even more."

Char held on to his aching foot a little more, but then looks and stares seriously at his friend, "It's fine. I can take it!"

"......" Blast facepalms himself. "You know, if there was a voltorb around, I'd have him explode right in your face."

"Alright, FINE!", Char bursts out. "How 'bout this, I'll be the one to grow while you be the one performing for the crowd?"

"And if the crowd demands you perform with me?" Char just stares back at Blast with a straight and serious face. Blast sighs one last time, shrugging his shoulders. "Alright. You're the one in pain. Not me."

"Hey, Boss?", Char calls out.

The arcanine circus-runner enters back into the tent. "Yes? You call?"

"I've decided I'm gonna still do the show from here on out.", Char assured with a proud grin.

The arcanine stares at Char for a moment. "I think the pain in his foot is gettin' to his head."

"That's what I told him!", Blast shared in his skepticism.

"Shut up!!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Still performing, Injured or Not

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast looked back at his friend who was doing arm reps with dumbbells. A worried look came upon the turtle. "Char," said Blast, "I really don't think you should be doing this. You're going make that foot worse!"

Char paused his workout and set the dumbbells next to his good foot. "I told you not to worry! I'm going to be careful. All I'm going to do is grow. That's it!"

"And what if the crowd wants you to do something with those bigger muscles?"

"Let me worry about my part and I'll let you worry about yours."

Blast let out another breath out of his rippled chest. "There's nothing I can say that'll make you change your mind, is there?"

"Nope! I wanna see the look on that dad's face!"

"Does it matter that much to you?! Who cares what people think of us? In case you've forgotten, we work in a circus! We're always surrounded by people who don't like us!"

"This guy think's we're weak, bro!" said Char. "And I want to see that skeptic smirk off his face by getting bigger than ever before!"

Char sounded like he made his final decision and there was nothing Blast could do. "Okay," said Blast. "But if you go back to the hospital, don't expect a "Get Well" card from me!"

Char scoffed Blast's remark. "Whatever, just give me the belt!"

Blast opened his shell to dig for the belt. He found it and reluctantly gave it to Char. Char grabbed it and quickly strapped it around his scaley waist. Before he could yell the magic words, Blast interrupted, "Do you think your foot can handle the stress while growing?" Annoyance began to show in Char's face. "I don't know, Mom, let's find out!"

"Bulk Up!" Char yelled. Once again, the euphoric warmth overwhelmed his muscles and, for some reason, his injured foot. Char could feel his already giant muscles pushing harder against his scales and his foot against the cast it was in. The fueling power became intense pleasure to Char that he gave a loud roar. His bones shifted and stretched to new heights and his injured foot grew out of the cast shattering it.

Char finally cooled down and looked down to his new body. He noticed a new set ten-pack abs followed by pecs that nearly touched his chin and biceps the size of an Onyx's head! Char was so surprised by the results, he wasn't aware he was standing on two bare feet.

Blast was surprised mostly by Char's newly formed and healed foot. "Char! Your foot, it's healed!"

"What?" Char finally snapped out of his growth trance and realized he was not feeling any pain from his foot. He raised his foot while standing on the other and could see no signs of injury. It was as if it was never broken. Char just chuckled in excitement and pumped his new bieceps in the air. "I think I'm well enough to play, Blast!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: The Show Must Go On

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
"So not only is the belt a muscle-gainer, but a pain-reliever too! No wonder machokes can take so much and then heal so quickly afterwards.", Blast recaps, and then sighs with relief himself. "Good thing you're stubborn, or we'd never find out about this."

Char flexes a massive bicep to his turtle friend, "Yeah, life's sweet ain't it. Let's get going!"

Once they headed to the show, the two musclemons waited patiently as Dragona was doing her thing. "Char!?" Char hears a loud feminine cry out from behind him.

Char turns around while Blast was too fixiated on his love's act. "Oh! Hey Nyne!"

"What are you doing here!? I thought you weren't gonna be able to perform!", she cried.

"It's alright Nyne. Turns out that belt does more than gain muscle. It also helps relieve pain." Char pats his once-injured foot on the ground a few times, proving himself correct. "See? No pain." Char also does a shredded double-bicep flex for her, "Feel a million times better!"

The white fox stares at Char for a moment with a happy smile, but then starts to tear up a bit. "Oh...", Nyne runs up to give Char a big hug, "...Char...I'm so happy for you!"

Char pats his girl on her head a bit, "Just, don't apologize again. Okay?"

"And that was Dragona's underwater tank routine!", a loud stereo eminated. "Give her a big hand folks." A roar of cheering comes in response to Dragona and her routine.

Blast was also applauding with sparkling eyes at his serpent friend. Dragona slithers back behind stage to join her friends. "Hey Blast. Hey you two. Break a leg out there, okay guys?"

Blast pulls out a mallet and holds it up above his leg, "I would do anything for you."

Char quickly grabs the mallet and pushes Blast towards the backstage entrance, "Alright casanova, you're gonna need that."

Nyne and Dragona watched patiently as the two were about ready to be called out on stage, Nyne then turning to Dragona, "Is, anything serious going on between you two."

"Not really.", Dragona replies blaintly for her admirer.

"And now forlks, the men you have been waiting for, give it up for the MUSCLE DUO!" Without hesitation, the two performers quickly sprinted out from backstage and ran out in front of the arcanine, each giving the crowd a pleasing flex of their own.

While Char was flexing for the crowd, he actually caught a glimpse of the little charmander yesterday in the large crowd, who was cheering happily for his greatest hero. Sitting next to him was a charizard as well, who was just sitting beside him with his arms folded. He didn't look too pleased to see you guys at all. Then, as if they were looking right at each other, the two squinted their eyes, a lightning bold shooting between the two. "That must be him, Char uttered in his mind."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Target Sighted

choices: Meet the charmander and his dad
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast and Char continued tensing and flexing mountains on their bodies. It was time to show the charmander's dad that these muscles weren't just for show! And he knew just how to do it!

Char walked to a couple of weight bars sitting side by side of each other. He squatted down to pick them up above his head with ease. The crowd applauded but weren't entirely excited. They hoped he would show them more. All of a sudden, the muscle dragon swung one weight across his abs and the other into the air. As the weight flying in the air came tumbling down back to Char, it looked like he was going to get another injury. Luckily, he grabbed it and swung underneath him to throw the other weight in the air. The crowd was amazed that a strongman could juggle such heavy weights. As Char looked into the audience, he saw the charmander's dad still keeping his unimpressed complexion.

It was time to kick it up a notch. Blast was cheering the crowd and getting it pumped for Char's feat until his friend yelled to him, "Hey, Blast! Can you throw some more weights in my direction?" Blast bugged out his eyes as the crowd clapped loudly encouraging it. "Umm," stuttered Blast, "Are you sure you can handle that?"

"I think so!" said Char still juggling. He turned to the audience. "Do you guys think so?" The crowd responded with a loud cheer and chanted, "More! More! More! More!" Blast wasn't one to disappoint an enthusiastic crowd. The turtle walked over to the weight area and picked up a couple more extremely heavy weights.

"Ready, Char?" asked Blast.
"Ready Blast!"

Blast threw the first weight towards Char. Everyone held their breath hoping the muscle dragon would catch it. Right between switching the weights already in his hands, Char grabbed it and began juggling three! The crowd applauded and cheered wildly. Char wasn't sure how long he could do this feat but if it meant keeping the crowd happy, he was willing to do it. Besides, he loved how defined and tensed his arms looked from the workout they were getting.

Char was ready to really wow everyone! "Bring on the fourth one, bro!" Blast did was he was told and threw the last one in his hand. Grabbing a fourth weight was challenging while keeping up with three other weights. Char got his hand on a fourth one with no problem and juggling four weights that, when combined, could break a typical bodybuilder's back. Good thing Char wasn't typical.

For the grand finale, Char heaved all weights above his head making it look like they were going to fall on his face. The crowd and Blast gasped hoping the dragon knew what he was doing. With a grin, Char grabbed all four weights with two on each hand! The audience then stood up to cheer for their wonder dragon. Char replied with a double bicep flex and a hard high five from Blast.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Weight of the World

choices: Show off for the two of them
Talk and maybe get to know them
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
A couple minutes after the show, Char and Blast were sitting backstage, still heaving a bit from all the performances they've done. Blast looks at his stubborn friend, "Once again, you're a crazy man bro."

Char looks at his tuckered friend, "Heh. You weren't too bad yourself. Nice job impressing the crowd with the belt." Blast was actually a tad bigger now than before. Hey, one of them needed to do it.

"Thanks. You should have tested it out on stage. You would have gone crazy with your performance and all that right after.", Blast remarked.

Char just chuckles. "To be honest, I was thinking of doing just that too."

"Hey fellas!", their boss enters the tent to greet them. "You guys actually have a visitor. You wouldn't mind would you?"

The two waited to see who followed behind, and it was the charmander and his father. The little charmander waves out to his favorite performer, Char smirking in response. "Yeah, it's fine. I actually the little guy." Char looks up at his guardian, who still appeared to have that same unimpressed look on his face as before. Char added into his head, "And I think I'm going to get to know his father A LOT more."

"Alrighty.", the arcanine replies. He then makes his way out, "I'll leave you guys be."

Blast let's out a bright smile to the little tike, "So, you're the shy fellow who got to meet my friend up close."

"Did you enjoy the show?", Char asks.

"Yeah!", the small pokemon screamed. "You were amazing Char! And you were cool out there too Blast."

Blast blushes a teeny bit, "Aw chee, thanks kid."

Char looks back up at the charmander's dad. "So, you must be his father." Char gets up on his feet and walks up to the skeptic pokemon while the little guy continued chatting with Blast. "Did you enjoy the show yourself?"

It takes a second for the dad to answer. "It was, worth the entrance fee. I suppose.", still not sounding at all impressed.

Char holds out a hand to him, "Put'er there!"

It takes the normal-sized charizard to respond once again, but at least he responds. He holds out his hand to shake with Char's. "So, Char is your name? I don't mean to crush my son's spirits, but I think you two are corrupting my son with your fake bo-DIIIES...!!"

With just a small tightening of Char's grip, it was enough force to crush the father's hand. Char then flexes his hand-shaking arm in front of his ches. "You think this is fake?" Char then inches his head closer to the father's. "I'm not gonna make a scene in front of your son. That's why my counterpart is speaking with him. I just want you to know that what me, my friend, and every other circus performers I counteract with are REAL performers. We've spent months, maybe years even getting to where we are. Me and my pal may be new on the circus scene, but we've been working out for years to get this far." The father just stares at Char with a sort of terrified look on his face, when Char suddenly wraps an arm around the father's back, "And come on man, he's a kid. Don't start ruining things for him."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: The Charmander, and His Dad

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
The charmander's father began to see the passion and determination in Char to prove him otherwise. He began to think that maybe they were the real deal. Char saw the doubts disappearing and figured a plan that both prove the dad and please the charmander kid. "How about if we give you guys a mini-show for being such a good audience tonight?" The charmander's eyes beamed. "I'd love to!"

Blast chuckled at the cute kid. He could see why Char liked him so much. Blast was more than willing to stand back to back against his dragon friend and started flexing playfully in front of the charmander and his dad.

The muscle duo flexed everything they could. From their arms and legs, they peaked every muscle until veins slithered around their muscles showing off their power. The charmander loved every minute of it. The duo really inspired him to want to be as big as they are.

As much as the charmander loved the show, Char thought they could do more. He turned and saw Blast put the belt on a nearby chair. "You want to see some more?" Char asked. The charmander nodded enthusiastically. The muscle dragon once again got the belt and set it on himself. He then went back to the kid. "Now, what were the magic words?"

"Bulk up!" the charmander yelled.

The enthusiasm in the kid slowly turned into amazement as he saw Char growing up close. The charmander saw Char's biceps getting larger and rounder, his legs more bulky, and another set of abs below his 8-pack. Char was turning from a hero to an idol in front of the charmander's eyes.

Everyone was amazed by the results, including Char. He never felt so much power before even from his previous growths. He could've sworn he saw a jealous look on Blast's face. The dragon then curled his arms downward, his legs slightly upwards, and pushed his chest till it touched his chin. His new muscles showed more strength and power than ever before.

"What do you think?" said Char.
"You look awesome!" exclaimed the charmander. "You look like you could do anything you want!" Char blushed making him tense his muscles even more.

"Doesn't he look awesome, dad?" asked the charmander. "Aren't these guys just amazing?!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Handling the Truth

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
"He certainly does!" The charmander's father remarked. Seeing Char flex in all his glory really changed the normal charizard's tone.

Blast watches his pal flex for the moment, but then takes a look at the time. "Hey Char, I think that's enough flexing for one day."

Char struts his body straight while curling his hands against his hips, "There's NEVER enough time for flexing my friend.", Char replies proudly. Blast merely holds up his left wrist, Char taking a good look at the time. "Oh."

"You have something important you have to go to?", the tike's father asks.

"Unfortunately.", Char admits a bit unhappily.

"Will I ever get to see you again?"

Char kneels down and lightly sets a meaty paw on the tike's shoulder. "Of course." Char holds up a finger, and taps it where the charmander's heart would be, "Just remember, I'll always be with you. Right here."

Blast and the tike's father stare oddly at the buff charizard. "...What the heck are you talking about?"

A couple minutes later, Char and Blast were back to their normal sizes and with their boss and the other performers on stage in their main tent. The arcanine walked up to the stage, holding his hands behind his back. "Performers, as always, you've all put on a great show! But, I fear our performances are going to be challenged."

"What do you mean?", Nyne remarks curiously.

"I just recieved word that another group of circus freaks are coming our way. And they want to set up tent right next to us.", the striped canine explains.

"Uh-oh.", Goldu says without enthusiasm.

"That doesn't sound good.", Dragona added.

"It's not that bad, I assure everyone. We just have to make sure WE'RE the real deal. Plus with Char and Blast on our side, I don't think they'll stand a chance." The arcanine assures.

"Hah! Right. And I'm a flying tepig."

Char, Blast, and everyone else turned around to see who it was.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Change of Tone

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
To everyone's surprise, a hulking emboar stood confidently at the entrance of the tent. His frame almost covered the whole entrance and the flames emitting from his neck intimidated the other circus performers.

Char and Blast weren't afraid of this newcomer but they knew he meant business. "Who are you?" asked Char. The emboar shrugged smuggisly and said, "I'm the guy you don't need to worry about, according to you!" The emboar then noticed the giant weights from Char's juggling routine. He stomped his way towards it and lifted it with ease. Char and Blast weren't impressed at first, but chills went to their muscles when they saw the emboar bending the weight over his head into a curve and slamming it to the ground. The emboar then flexed a mountainous bicep to the titan dragon and turtle and said, "But you can call me, Embo."

Char and Blast didn't know what to think about Embo. He was definitely strong for an emboar and had the arrogance to match it. Blast knew from Char that muscles and arrogance don't mix.

"So you're the new guy?" asked Char.

"Yep!" said Embo. "You guys think you're the biggest and strongest guys around? Well, I'm here to prove everyone otherwise!"

"And how are you going to do that? Arm wrestle us?"

Embo sarcastically laughed at Char's mild sense of humor. "No, I'm actaully going to invite you to my own show tomorrow evening. I got my own show and partner to back me up! I'll be sure to put you guys out of business!"

Embo picked the weight he bent and went back to the muscle duo. "If you guys think you're the strongest punks around, think again!" Embo then pulled on each end of the weight until it began to creak and crack. The giant pig tore the weight in two! He chuckled and tossed the pieces to Char and Blast. "Enjoy the show," he said before leaving.

Dragona and Nyne looked very worried. What if Embo really did make their circus go out of business. Having a strong boar like Embo almost guartanteed a circus' success. Dragona looked at Blast scared. "Blast, what are we going to do? That guy looks like he really wants us out of here!" Blast wrapped his muscular arms around his dragon and drew her closer to his chest. He tensed his chest to calm her with his raw strength. "That's not going to happen, Dragona," said Blast. "I promise. Char and I will make sure of that!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: When pigs flex

choices: Embo just leaves, with an attitude.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast looked at each other, and then at the other performers. They all looked a tad worried after their encounter wit Emboar. Even their boss was starting to worry a bit himself, unsure of what he was going to do. The two went through a lot to get this circus going, they're not gonna let some large emboar ruin their circus. "I think we should talk some senses into that emboar."

Char nods to his bro. "I couldn't agree with you more."

Nyne walks up to the burly dragon, "Char, be careful."

Char glances at Nyne, but then chuckles. "We're just gonna talk Nyne. You don't have to worry." In fact, that's the last thing he would want to do. The same goes for Blast towards Dragona.

Blast turns back to the group, "Don't worry folks. We'll set him straight." The two weight-lifters ran off. Embo shouldn't be too far away.

The whole group stares at the two as they speed off, until Goldu disrupts the silence. "...We're in trouble you know." Dragona whips her tail against back of Goldu's head.

Char and Blast were speeding in and around the carnival. Searching for whoever resembles a rather large flaming boar. It wasn't long until they heard, "HEY FOLKS! Care to take a gander at this?" Char and Blast quickly sped to the direction of the proud yelling. It wasn't long until they came across a rather fair circle of people. And sure enough in the middle of it all was a bold flexing emboar, trying to attract some attention. He raises his immense are up against his head, flexing two mountainous peaks that raveled the crowd. "Whatcha think o' these folks?"

Most of the crowd was impressed, but the charmander from earlier felt differently. Instead of feeling amazed, he feels terrified. He had never seen such a large pokemon before. At least one that doesn't sound like a show-offy behemoth. The tike hides behind his dad's wing. "Dad...he scares me..."

Embo glances back at the shivering pokemon, "Hm?" He then walks up to the tike's father. "Hey there little guy. I'm not a bad man. I promise. Mind if I carry him?"

"I rather you didn't.", his Dad replies bluntly.

Embo suddenly grips the tike by his tail, "I promise, I won't hurt him."

"AH! Don't touch me!", the tike screams.

"HEY!" Embo let's go of the tike's tail, glancing at Char. Char looked furious at the boar pokemon. It's bad enough he was on their territory, but scaring the little guy was too much for the bulging charizard. "Don't you DARE touch him!"

"Char!", the tike cried happily.

"Sheesh. I wouldn't hurt a kid you know.", Embo remarks carelessly.

"You obviously don't know how to act towards kids. Just look at them!" Embo takes a look around, noticing the few kids who were hiding behind their parental guardians, but that doesn't change his careless expression. Char then walks up to the towering pokemon. "You best leave. NOW."

Embo then closes his head against Char's, "Make me."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Confronting the Boar

choices: Embo rigs the muscle duo's show
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Embo was really making Char's scales crawl and blood boil. This giant pig was full of himself that would go so far as to hurt little kids to get attention. Embo went too far.

Blast agreed that Embo needed to be taught a thing or two and knew just how to do it. The titan turtle reached deep into his shell and grabbed the belt. "Hey Char," yelled Blast, "Catch!"

Blast threw the belt into the air and Char grabbed it with a single hand still locking his eyes on Embo. Char knew exactly what to do to put that oversized pig in his place. The orange dragon strapped the belt around his already large waist. "You wanna know how to get the crowd's attention, Embo?" asked Char. "You need to control yourself! Like my bro and I do!"

Char then turned to the crowd. "Everybody, you want to see more? What do I need to do?" Everybody in the crowd was thrilled and excited about what Char was implying. They all yelled, "BULK UP!" Once again, Char felt an overflow of power coming soaking into his scales, muscles, and bones. His chest grew more rigged and packed with power, his arms pushed his scales to become the size of boulders, and the bones in his wings and legs grew to great proportions for height and wingspan (with the following muscle power flowing into them).

Embo was struck with amazement and fear. He was always the biggest guy around until a few seconds ago and everybody was cheering for Char out of love instead of fear. He didn't understand. The hulking pig looked back at the little charmander whose eyes brightened at the sight of his muscle dragon hero.

Char returned to Embo. "If you want to be a true muscle man, do it right!" Char went back to the crowd to begin a friendly posing session. The crowd, especially the charmander, loved how Char's muscles swelled and tensed as he squeezed them between his limbs. The crowd loved all of Char's powerful poses. They couldn't explain it but despite Char's giant body, they felt assured that he would never hurt them.

After a double bicep pose, the charmander ran up to his hero. Char was so happy to see him that he reached out his vascular arms to hug him. The little lizard felt safe and energized in Char's arms as if the muscle dragon was giving some of his strength to him.

Embo had seen enough. He felt more steamed than ever before. The crowd didn't even notice his leaving into his personal tent. The muscle pig swore under his breath that this feud with the muscle duo was far from over. He would do whatever it took to shut them and the circus down for good. Embo sealed his by tossing random weights against the walls of his tent in anger.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Lesson Unlearned

choices: Char AND Blast teach Embo a lesson.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
"Hmph!", the large boar grumbled, tossing a large weight at the damaged wall one last time. "He thinks he's SO great, huh?" Embo began thinking to himself, scratching his chin until his grin turned into a rather devilish one. "Hmm...", he chuckles to himself evilly. It seems he had just formed an evil plan at getting back at the duo, but mainly at Char.

The next day, Char and Blast were doing their usual workout session, pumping and lifting weights to prepare themselves for their next show. Which was in a couple of minutes. Char lets loose a heavy dumbbell he was pumping his arms with, and then goes right ahead to lift his arms and flex with himself, watching his peaking biceps throb in the air right in front of him. Char smirks, "Heh.", and then turns to his ally, pounding his plump with a fist. "You ready Blast?"

Blast had just finished one last rep with a 500-pound barbell above his head, dropping it to the ground behind him as well. He then tenses his muscled legs, getting a close view of his tree-trunk thighs and calves after the workout he had just put them through, and then sticks a foot out to take a step forward and stomping the ground hard and proud. Blast raises his right arm out to flex for his friend, "You know I am!"

"Great!", cried the proud dragon, "Then go grab the belt. We're almost on."

"Be right there!", Blast replies, attending to a dresser drawer that was a few feet away from him.

While Blast was doing that, Char turns to admire himself in a full-length mirror. He smirks at himself, tensing up certain muscle groups to see them flex out and show how he was doing. He's just getting stronger and stronger each day, he KNOWS it! He was about to ever start another quick posing session, turning his muscular body sideways and sticking his arms out, until he notices his friend had been shuffling through the drawer for quite some time now, tossing out things that weren't the belt. Char turns his head to Blast, "Hey, you finding it?"

"No!", Blast cries. He then sticks his snout away from the drawer to scratch his head, "I don't understand. This is where I last left it!" Blast turns to Char, "You think one of the guys took it?"

"One of the guys? Please." Char raises his left arm, flexing out his densely-peaked bicep for show, "I'm pretty sure my warning was clear enough if any of them were to take it."

Blast takes out the whole drawer, pouring out anything else that was left in there. But still, no belt. "This isn't good. We're almost on! Hm?" Blast takes notice of what looks like a note on the ground. Blast picks it up, and was immediately stunned. "Char! You gotta look at this!"

Char runs up to his pal's side, taking notice of the note as well, which had Embo's name on it. "!! Quick! Read it!"

Blast reads: 'Dear Muscle Duo, If you're looking for your belt, don't bother wasting your breath. I have it now. -Embo'

Blast tenses up his thickly-muscled arm, crumpling the note in his hand. "Embo... I should've known.", Blast growled. Blast turns to his chum, who also appears to be really angered at Embo's note, only his entire body was flexing out profoundly. "Whoa..."

Watching Char's muscle pump out, it was as if he was using the belt right now! But just this once. He certainly seems more frustrated than Blast, that's for sure. "Why that no-good, little... First he makes my little chum cry, and now THIS!?" Char holds up a meaty arm, "When I find him, I'll tear him a new one for sure!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Stealing

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Embo went too far this time. Scaring the crowd was one thing but stealing the one thing that changed Char and Blast's lives was a whole different concept. Char crunched his dragon teeth together while swelling his muscles in anger. "That's it!" he exclaimed. "It time to teach that oversized porkchop a lesson once and for all!"

Blast shared his friend's frustration but he tried to keep a cool head. Blast tried calming his friend down. "Char," Blast started, "I'm mad at Embo too and he will get what he deserves. But we need to calm down or else we'll be no better than he is." Char knew Blast was right. The beffy dragon sucked in a wind of air to cool the fire in his gut.

After a few minutes, Blast asked Char, "Feel better?"
Char nodded, "Yeah, still want to kick his teeth in though."
"Let's try avoiding that when we get the belt back."
"Okay, okay, but what about the show? We can't just leave the audience."

Char made a point. The crowd would be very disappointed if they didn't see the Muscle Duo. Blast had to think for a minute about what to do. "Let me talk to the boss," he said. "I'll see if I can work something out with him."

Blast left Char to talk to the boss. Blast explained everything that happened and the boss agreed that not having the belt would mess up their performance. The boss said he would try to stall the crowd as long as he could until Blast and Char got the belt back.

Blast returned to his fire fueled friend and gave him a thumbs up. Char knew exactly what the turtle meant: it was time for some payback.

Blast and Char stomped out of their circus and into the carnival. They scoped the crowds walking, running, and playing games. The duo couldn't find Embo anywhere and the crowds greeting and praising the them didn't make the search any better.

Char put on a fake smile and a light pose for the fans until he saw smoke moving up into the air and across the ground. Char stretched out his neck and found Embo walking around the carnival as if he was the king of the world. Blast noticed him too and was ready to get the belt back.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Ready for School

choices: Blast just comes along for the ride.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast were ready to rip Embo an new one, but they didn't want to attract too much unwanted attention with all these children around. Blast taps Char on his shoulder, Char turning his head back in response. "Let's just follow him. We don't want things to get out of hand with all these kids around.", Blast whispers.

Char nods his head, "Yeah." The two look back to see Embo was on the move. "We'd better follow him, quick." The two shuffled through the crowd as softly and swiftly as they could, making sure they don't lose track of Embo. It wasn't long until the crowd dimmed down and was dealt with, and the two bodybuilders raced off to catch up with Embo. As soon as they ran clear of the crowd, Char couldn't help but yell out, "HEY, Embo!"

The two ran into an alley, but then came to a sudden stop. The two looked around, but there was no muscular boar in their sights. "What the...? Where'd he go?", Blast asks procuriously.

"Sheesh. Didn't think you two would catch on this quick." Blast and Char turned around, seeing a stubborn embroar standing in front of them with his muscular arms folded. "Don't you two have a show you should be performing in?"

"You now DARN WELL we do!", Char growled.

Blast steps in front of the angered dragon, "Look Embo, just give us back that belt, and I won't let my angry friend tear you apart until you do."

"HAH!", the boar laughs loudly. "You think I'm afraid of him? He's not so tough without his belt, is he?"

Char could only take so much, stepping up in front of the stubborn boar, who was actually still towering Char by half a foot. "I may not be as big as you right now, but I'm not afraid to take you on!"

Embo looms over the angered dragon, "Oh? You think you're so tough now? Alright. I'll give you back the belt, if you can take me on at my circus."

"Huh?", Char replies with an eyebrow cocked. "What're you talking about?"

"Competing against me at the show I perform at. Whoever impresses the crowd keeps the belt.", Embo explains.

The whole thing just wasn't fair to the angered Char! But he doesn't wanna let some overgrown embroar show him up either. "FINE! I'll take you on on your next show tomorrow!"

"It's actually today.", Embo corrected.

"Oh. Then I'll take you on later on today!", Char repeats.

"Actually it's on right now."

"WHAT!?"

"What? You feel you're not ready?", Embo looms once again.

"Alright, FINE! Let's go!", Char yells. The two then stared each other down, growling very loudly as the muscles all over their bodies tensed up all around them.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Follow Embo!

choices: Char and Blast go to the show
Dragona and Nyne stall their show
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
It was on. Time to get what belongs to them. Char continued glaring at Embo picturing defeating him. "Hey, Embo!" said a voice, "You here?"

Char, Embo, and Blast turned to a giant feraligator with muscles the strength of iron. His biceps looked like beach balls were stuffed into his arms and his 8 pack abs were cleanly cut with creavices that emphasized the feralitgator's power.

"Feral!" said Embo. "Hey, we got ourselves some competition!" Feral curled his lips menacingly revealing his giant teeth. "Really?" he asked, "Who, these pipsqueaks?"

Char's blood was boiling as it was; now it was erupting. Char glared at the feraligator and stomped to his direction anxious to punch his lights out. Luckily, Blast grabbed him by the shoulder to stop him.

"These are the big shots from the other circus," said Embo. "Somehow, they're more popular than us. I don't how compare to us."

Blast held Char's shoulder tighter. "Is there a reason you're here, Feral?" asked Blast.

Feral just chuckled. "I was just looking for my good buddy so we can warm up our REAL muscles for our REAL show. But if Embo's challenged you I just might not have to."

Blast was getting annoyed with Feral's arrogance and obnoxiousness. Char, on the other hand, let anger grow larger. "No offense," said Feral, "But your fired up friend here doesn't stand a chance. You don't stand a chance against the both of us."

Blast let the arrogance fuel his anger as well. His muscles slightly swelled and tensed under adrenaline. "How about we find out?" implied Blast. "Feral, I challenge you to this competition. You will compete with Embo while I with Char. Whoever wins gets the belt."

Feral heard a lot about the belt from Embo and how it could help with their show. It would be great if they could keep and humiliate the turtle and dragon. "You guys are on!" said the alligator. "We start in ten minutes so give your toothpick arms a quick workout."

Feral and Embo left laughing to get ready for their act. Blast agreed he and Char needed to get the belt back now more than ever. This wasn't just about the belt anymore; it was about defending their pride and dignity. "We can do this, Char," said Blast. "We can beat those clowns."

Char still kept his angry composure when he turned to his friend. "I'm going to wipe those dumb smirks off their dumb faces!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Fire and Water

choices: "You're lucky. One of our performers are taking longer than expected."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast shared the same angry stares at the two muscle-bound jerks. They were practically ready to beat them up, aside from being smaller than they are, but there would just be no point. Char and Blast looked around, taking notice of the tent they were secluded in. Off to one part of the tent were multiple pieces of weight-lifting equipment lying around. Char and Blast looked at each other, and then back at the equipment. The two studs walk up to the equipment, taking notice of how much larger the equipment is. Char's eyes grew a bit wide. "...Are these for real?"

"That barbell sure is big.", Blast gulped, still holding his composure.

Char stares at the equipment, contemplating on whether or not he should even lift such a thing, let alone participate in such a petty competition. "!!" He then remembers about his biggest little fan, and Nyne. He couldn't give up on them. Not NOW! Besides, Embo and Feral don't deserve the belt anyway! Char gritted his teeth.

"Hm?", Blast turns to his friend. Suddenly, Char balls up a fist, making a vein stretch up to his elbow. Blast jumps as Char goes and plants his fingers underneath a massive pyramid-shaped weight. "Char! Don't strain your self!"

Char blinks, "!!" He relizes that if he were to do such a dumbfounded thing, he would probably make matters worse for him still. Char stands back up. "You're right. We should start off small."

"Yeah.", Blast nodded. Blast glances over to a rather large dumbbell rack, ranging in dumbbells that appear almost twice as big as the one at their tent. The hardened turtle walks over to the rack, his dragon pal joining him as he did. "Just how much do these guys workout?"

"A lot more than us. That's for sure." Blast turns his head to Char, then watching as Char grips one of the dumbbells, taking it off of the rack. That unfortunately seemed like a chore. The weight alone was almost as heavy as the barbell Blast was benching earlier. It sure seems like a lot for the burly dragon, but he had best workout as much as he can before their show, slowly pumping his arm with the lead weight. After a few reps, Char turns to his astounded friend. "Well?"

Blast was really skeptical, but he didn't want to Char to go in alone. He even lets out a small grin, thinking about Char's stubbornness. "Alright. I gotcher back.", the turtle remarks. He then grabs the same weight Char was honing, almost loosing his grip with it, but then manages to find the strength to lift it like Char. Even after the heavy lifting, it seemed like it was all they could do.

"Hey!" The two turned back, taking notice of the boar that was standing behind them.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Bigger Equipment

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Feral channeled his energy into his fists and his fists to the punching bag in front of him. "I don't know, Embo," he said to his partner, "You think we can beat them?" Embo preoccupied himself with flex poses in front of the mirror. The muscle pig scoffed. "Of course! Those guys are nothing without their precious belt!"

"I don't know, man," said Feral. "I think there's something more about them that we don't already know."

"Will you relax? We're going to be fine. I'll make sure of that!"

The next day, the opposing duos met inside a tent surrounded by a large audience. Before the competition began, the muscle duos flexed playfully as a tolken of their appreciation. They then turned a set of gigantic weights of various sizes. The goal was to lift the heaviest weight they can carry and whoever lifts the heaviest wins. Embo knew they could beat Blast and Char.

Without Blast and Char's knowledge, Embo switched labels of the weights to make the heavier weights seem lighter. Just to be on the safe side, he even super glued the heaviest weights. Embo thought there was no way he and Feral could lose.

"Ready, bro?" asked Blast to Char. The dragon was pumped with anger towards Embo and passion for his fans. This was his moment to shine. Embo insisted Char to go first and Char didn't hesitate in accepting the offer.

Char wanted the belt here and now. He felt like he needed to do something that would beat anything Embo or Feral could ever perform. The dragon tilted his meaty neck toward the heaviest weight of the set, which was super glued on behalf of Embo.

Blast put a hand to his face embarrassed knowing what Char was trying to accomplish. Embo just smiled thinking he already won this.

Char squatted and curled his claws around the bar. The weight felt stiff to the touch like it couldn't budge no matter how hard he tried. But Char didn't care. He had to prove himself to everyone that he was the strongest dragon around.

Char steadied his feet and began to pull up on the weight beneath him. The super glue almost met his match. Char's arms, chest, legs, even wings swelled under exerted pressure. Char kept pulling until veins pumped out everywhere on his body. Char could've sworn he heard a snort of contempt from Embo. This made flames spill out of Char's lips and into his muscles.

With all of his strength, Char broke the super bond of the weight and lifted the weight high above his head! The cheer of the audience grew louder and louder as Char exhaled more fire from his mouth and Blast patted a hand on his buddy's back. "That was awesome!" yelled Blast. Embo stood in shock and jealousy.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Make it or Break it

choices: Embo hands over the belt, but is still not happy about it.
Embo doesn't hand over the belt so easily.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
