Embo was starting to get furious with Char now. He wasn't going to let the likes of him show him up. For the next half hour, it appeared to be a real show between the two firey bodybuilders. Blast and Feral competed as well, but things appeared more tame between them two. One of Blast's performances was of him and Feral juggling 50-pound weights. Feral was the first up, juggling up to five dumbbells and made it seem like nothing. When it was Blast's turn, Embo pushes him close to Feral while he was still juggling the weights.

Feral notices Blast, and then starts tossing the weights to him. Blast never really juggled before, so this whole thing was a major surprise for him. Feral tosses the first weight, which Blast managed to catch, as well as the second, and then the third. Blast just went for it, juggling the three as best he could, and he was gettin' the hang of it! Blast just keeps his cool, juggling as slowly as he can, until the last two dumbbells get thrown up above him. This made the turtles eyes grow wide. How the heck was he going to catch two at the same time?!

Char was about to run out to help him, but was stopped by Embo, who grabbed his ankle and made him trip to the ground. Miraculously though, Blast managed to toss the three weights he currently had in his hands high enough for him to grab the other two in his hands and started juggling them with the others. Blast was sweatin' like crazy, but he still kept his cool. After a few minutes of juggling, the crowd cheered for the muscular turtle as he caught and set the dumbbells down one-by-one.

Char ran up to his buddy to congradulate him, and check if he was okay. Even Feral was proud of Blast and his feat. As for Embo though, his patience to ruin them was growing weary and intense. For their next performance after that, it basically involves all four of them flexing off as if they were in a bodybuilding championship, just to see who does best. For Char, this was like his specialty. He sure wouldn't want to disappoint a crowd of this calibre. For the next ten minutes after, it was nothing but flexing hard and showing off what they've got. Char was just off flexing for the crowd for himself, until he feels a sudden boar bump into him.

Char turns to Embo, who glares back at Char and Char does the same. It seemed like a tough competition between them two once again. As for Blast and Feral though, they seemed to be going at it between each other as well, only they were starting to be more friendly about it. As they were nearing the end of their routines, Char and Embo were sweating and panting like crazy as they still stared each other down. Suddenly, a huge roar of applause started raining upon the four. Though they weren't sure who they were applauding for.

Feeling persistant as ever, Embo steps up in front of the three while the spotlight followed. To his surprise, the applauding had actually died down. Seems like Embo wasn't the one who caught the crowds eye after all. Char quickly sprints up in front of Embo, the spotlight now shining on him. That was when the crowd cheered happy for him. Char could hardly believe it himself, but he was really happy. Looks like Char's passion was got the crowd's attention. His muscles too, but that was a helping hand in Char's win as well. Before he flexed some mroe to the crowd, he turns to his friend, wanting the pumped turtle to join him. So Blast did.

This in turn makes the crowd cheer even more, as they started flexing their already tired muscles to no end as part of their appreciation. Feral stood beside his jealous friend, feeling proud for the two. Embo on the other hand, grew more furious than ever...
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: And the Winners Are...

choices: Try out the belt before bed.
Just go to bed, then let the boss know tomorrow.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Embo just couldn't stand it. The fact that someone would please the crowd better than him. On HIS stage. Embo's muscles were bulging and throbbing like mad all over his body while accompanied by some angry veins. Suddenly, Feral walks up to his steaming friend, whose flames were flaring out more than usual. The muscled gator pats Embo on his hardened back, "That'll do pig. That'll do."

Embo turns to his partner, "Shut up!" The large boar turns back to the two crowd-pleasers, who were still flexing off proudly and waving a bit to the crowd a few times. A couple minutes later, the four were standing back in Embo's backstage tent. Embo had his large crossed over his meaty chest while staring away and pouted. "Hmph!"

"Alright Embo.", Char demands calmly, the stubborn boar looking at Char and Blast. "Give us back our belt. We pleased the crowd the most, fair and square."

"Hrrrm...", Embo grumbles.

Embo walks over to one of their large weights, lifting it up so he could pull something underneath. It of course turned out to be the belt. Embo then walks back up to Char. The two just stared at each other for the moment, looking all serious and what-not. The two suddenly turn their heads towards their partners, who were shaking each other's hand. "I see you've got a very competitive partner as well.", Blast mentions.

"Eyup!", Feral replies happily. "Say, we should do this again sometime. You're welcome to bring Char along if you'd like."

"Definitely considering it!", Blast replies proudly.

Embo and Char grumbled as they hunch their shoulders. "Water types... !!" The two look back at each other, and then turned their heads away while pouting with their eyes closed, "Hmph."

"Well, here's your belt.", Embo holds out.

Char swipes the belt away, "Uh, yeah. Thanks." Char pulls his pal away, taking a final look back at the one who had been giving them trouble. Blast on the other hand waves back says goodbye. A couple minutes later, Char and Blast were finally back in their tents, lounging back on their makeshift beds. "Ugggh...!", Char moans. "I see you were getting chummy with one of our rivals."

"Ah he's not that bad.", Blast remarks. "I'm sure with a little time, you can get to know Embo a bit more yourself."

Char rolls his eyes, "Psh! Yeah, right." Char holds up the belt he finally got back. Even though it's only been a few hours, it stills seems like he hasn't gotten to use it in a while.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Friends or Foes?

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char was glad to have the belt back into his paws again. He and Blast can finally get back to doing their acts. But Char was still bitter towards Embo and Feral for stealing the belt in the first place. Blast could see Char's lips sucked in out of anger and contempt. He tried slapping the dragon's back to get the harsh feelings out.

"Cheer up, man!" said Blast. "We got the belt back and we probably won't see those guys again."

"We better not!" exclaimed Char. Blast brought up closer to his rippled frame and hugged him on his side. "Relax, ok? Let's just get to our tent, get some sleep, and be ready for tomorrow. Besides, I think Nyne will be happy see you happy."

Char's bitterness melted at the sound of Nyne's name. The muscle dragon took a deep breath and began to calm himself. "Much better," said Blast.

The next morning, Blast and Char yawned and stumbled out of their tent to see the whole circus staff standing outside. The muscle duo saw Dragona and Nyne standing at the back of the crowd and walked towards them.
"What's going on, Dragona?" asked Blast.
"The boss has an announcement for us," she answered. "He going to announce where we're going to go next to perform."

Char's ears perked at the news. His muscles thickened and tensed out of excitement and Nyne couldn't help but stroke his arm to share her excitement. The arcanine boss walked out of his tent and came to the front of the crowd.

"Ladies and gentlemen of this great family," he said, "Let me begin by saying I'm so proud of our performances these past few days! We did a great show here and made new family members along the way." The arcanine found Blast and Char in the back of the crowd and pointed to them.

"Blast and Char, thank you all so much for all your help and being a part of this great family! We really appreciate you all as if you are our brothers!"

Blast and Char blushed out of flattery and modesty. "Back to business," continued the arcanine, "We will be going to great city of Poketropolis, the biggest city in the world!

The whole crowd cheered excitedly. Poketropolis was literally a town of a million opportunities and if the circus did great there, they could go anywhere! Char always wanted to go and hugged Nyne and Blast yelling, "Let's get to it!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: New World, New Opportunities

choices: Another delay on the way there...
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast were one of many who were pumped for their trip to Poketropolis. For part of the day, the two bodybuilders spent it picking up and packing tents and stuff while they loaded it all into a train to carry all of their cargo. It wasn't long until everyone was ready and rarin' ta go! Nyne and Dragona were really excited themselves, sitting together while they waited patiently for everyone else to get seated. It wasn't long until everyone was seated, except for Char and Blast.

Turns out, the train was already under schedule. Char and Blast were outside, standing beside the infernape conductor. It turns out one of the train's wheels weren't working properly, as told by the ingernape. It seems they'll have to change one of the bolts in the train's wheels in order for them to proceed as scheduled. "I can call someone out here, but it's probably gonna take an hour or so to change."

Char and Blast looked at each other, but then both started to think amongst themselves. They sure didn't want to wait an hour for someone to fix the train. In fact, they felt they've waited long enough. Char is the first to call out. "Hey! Maro!"

Suddenly, a marowak pops from out of the train. "Yeah? You call?"

"You know anything about trains?", Char questions.

"Well, sure I do."

"Good! Come on Blast.", Char replies.

The burly turtle scratches his head, "So, how does this thing work?"

"W-wait!", the infernape cried. "What in the world are you two planning?"

"We're gonna fix the wheel.", Blast replies happily.

The infernape was still realy skeptical about all this. "Look, I know you two are considered 'strongmen' here, but I don't think--"

"You've obviously not seen one of their shows.", the marowak interrupted. "Just stand back and watch."

For the next couple minutes or so, Maro explained to the two burly pokemon about what they had to do in order to get the train's wheel fixed. One of the things they had to do was lift the train itself. Char and Blast looked at each other, and then shrugged their shoulders. Blast got the belt from out of his shell to give to Char, but Char wanted Blast to give the belt a try this time. Blast nodded in agreement. Blast manages to slip the belt on, and then called out the magic words. In seconds, Blast's body starts to tense up all over, until he was starting to grow from all over. Blast just flexed his arms downward the whole time until he was now at least a foot taller than he normally is. The infernape was just in awe of what the two were actually capable of.

Maro then instructs the two for the next ten minutes. Afterwards, Blast raises the train one last time so Char could install the wheel. And they were done. After the pumped turtle sets the train down, he wipes off some of the sweat on his forehead. Blast then looks up at one of the windows and spotted Dragona staring at him with shining eyes. The burly turtle smirks, and then turns his body around and kneel on one knee to do a back double-bicep pose just for her. They couldn't hear it, but they could see Dragona was squealing happily for her favorite man, which only made the other pokemon inside cover their ears.

Char, Blast and Maro stared at the squealing pokemon for the moment. Char then turns to Blast, "She's a loud squealer you know."

"Oh yeah. Forgot.", Blast replied.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Small Delay

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
The train was back on track. Blast and Char went back to their seats after Blast shrunk back to his original muscular size. Dragona was still enchanted by Blast's magnificent feat and clutched onto his arm still warm with power. Nyne was also proud of her man that Char allowed her to nap on his rippled chest as if he was a firm yet warm power that flowed into her fur. Blast and Char were happy they could help and with the reward they were given by the girlfriends. Everything was smooth sailing for Poketropolis.

The group dozed to sleep the rest of the trip. They all woke up by the screeching of the train slowing down to a stop. As they looked through the window, Blast and Char saw an incredibly fancy platform with various people boarding and leaving trains. For appreciation, Blast and Char carried their women against their pecs onto the platform.

After stretching out from the ride, they all helped carry the circus materials through the train station and walked across the streets to their destination for circus performance. Everybody of the circus staff was amazed by the crowded streets loaded with cars and tall skyscrapers cramped with people. They all stopped at the city arena. Blast and Char was stunned how big the place was. It looked like they could show three shows at the same time.

"Hey Blast, Char!" The muscle duo turned to the boss. "What's up, boss?" asked Char. "We need to advertise for the circus a little bit and let the people know we're here. Think you guys can get some folks?" Blast and Char just smiled and flexed arms to the arcanine. "You bet we can!" Dragona spoke from behind them, "Hey boss, can Nyne and I help them out too? We can hand out flyers." The boss knew what the girls really wanted and decided to let them have some fun. "Sure," he answered. "You guys head on out and we'll set up for show."

Blast, Char, Dragona, and Nyne walked around the streets finding out where to get customers. They all noticed a crowded park on their right. Char knew instantly that was a great place to get people. He instantly threw his shirt off his back and walked right in. The other three followed him and people began to stare at the charizard's amazing body.

When Char figured he got enough people staring at him, he began flexing all the muscles on his arms, legs, and chest. Blast didn't want Char to hog all the glory. He took off his shirt as well and joined his friend in the session. Everyone was amazed how two pokemon could be so big and build so much muscle on their bodies. As they were watching, Dragona and Nyne tossed flyers to the audience and the audience accepted them while mesmerized by the show. As they flexed their arms upwards, Blast and Char gave each a thumbs up as a sign of mission accomplished.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: First Impressions

choices: Let Wigg show them around the city.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast gave each other a high-five for a job well-done. There's sure to be a crowd for their grand opening now. Dragona and Nyne were proud for the proud two. The serpent turns to Nyne, "Hey Nyne, wanna help me and the other set up?"

"Sure.", Nyne replies happily. "We'll you two in a little while."

The proud dragon and turtle flexed an arm in unison for the two, Char being the one to say, "Alright. Don't strain yourselves too hard."

"That's our job.", Blast adds.

The two ladies chuckled at each other as they were walking off and back towards the tent. Char turns to his muscular friend, "What say we go take a look around the town ol' buddy?"

"That sounds like a swell idea.", Blast replies happily.

"Hold up you two!" The two musclemons turned around to see a small pokemon standing behind them while wearing a reporter's cap and writing on a notepad with a pen. It turned out to be a wigglytuff. "Not before I get a quick scoop from you two."

Blast cocks an eyebrow, "And, you are...?"

"My name is Wigg.", the wigglytuff replies. "While being a reporter I also happen to be a famous modeling agent and part-time director. Trust me boys, you've the real thing standing before you."

"Well, that would be nice...", Char remarks, "but me and Blast were kind of planning on scouring the town a bit."

Wigg suddenly zips up on Char's head. "I can show you two around. Take ya to points of interest 'n' everything."

Char was still unsure. "I don't know..."

"Look kid, you either have me join you guys or get lost in the deep, dark city.", Wigg remarks.

The burly dragon snorts, a bit of smoke spitting out of his nostrils. "Hmph!" The pumped charizard then raises his arms against his arms against his chest to flex and tense up his entire body. "I ain't afraida nothin'! Besides, I can fly."

Blast whispers to his friend. "Hey, just let her join us. We don't know a lick about this place. Plus she'd probably never leave us alone."

"Hey." The two look up at Wigg, who was now lying on her side on Char's head. "I can hear you ya know. But he is right about the last part."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Reporter/Agent/Director

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Wigg walked in front of Blast and Char. Char was still a little skeptic about what's around town. But it was Poketropolis, the biggest city in the world! Surely there was something that interested them. But Wigg carried a smirk at the corner of his mouth.

The first stop was a ancient looking building with several hundred steps leading to the front door and columns on both sides. People walked up and down the stairs with books at hand.

"This is the Poketropolis City Library," said Wigg, "One of the oldest buildings in the city."

As much as Blast loved books, the way Wigg described the building was dull and monotone. Char, on the other hand, always fell asleep reading books. Book makers might as well drug the book pages with chloroform. After what seemed forever for the duo, Wigg started walking and they followed.

The group walked for about fifteen minutes until they reached the sunny beach. Blast and Char's eyes opened to the sparkling ocean and the blazing sand with the several sized people on the beach. Wigg noticed he got the muscle duo's attention now.

"This is the city's beach," said Wigg. "Lots of pokemon love to come here to get some sunshine...and girls." Wigg saw Char's ears perk at the sound of girls. "Moving on," said Wigg.

Wigg made Blast and Char walk another several minutes and stopped at another giant building with a dome on top of it. "Welcome to city hall," exclaimed Wigg. He lost the dragon and turtle again. One of the things the duo hated the most was politics. They stood there patiently as Wigg explained the importance of city hall and what politicians were doing in there. Wigg could tell Blast and Char hardly cared about what he was talking. Just like he planned.

Wigg then guided the muscle bunch to a building on the side of a retailing street. He opened the door for Blast and Char and squeezed into the tiny doorway. As they entered, Blast and Char found a room full of different sized cameras, props, backgrounds, and dressing rooms full of different modelling clothes.

"And last but certainly not least," said Wigg, "This is my modelling studio." Blast and Char were really impressed by her set up, Char especially. "If you guys want to model, come by here and you'll get plenty attention than what you're already getting! Who know's? Maybe you'll even invite some girls to the beach?" Blast and Char felt really excited about this. It would be great to show off their muscles for photos and more fame.

"So what do you all say?" asked Wigg.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Grand Tour

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
"Sure! Why not?", Char replies excitedly. He has never gotten to model for anything before. This is really a surprise for him.

"Yeah.", Blast shares Char's expression. "This should be interesting. For Char that is."

Char turns his head to Blast. "Huh? What's that supposed to mean?"

Blast wraps an arm around Char's broad shoulders. "Nothin'. You just weren't the type to be modeling before."

"Hmph!", Char grunts pushing his pal away. He then raises his arms up against his chest while pointing at himself with his thumbs, tensing up his muscles. "That was BEFORE I had a rippling body like this."

Blast inches his head down at Wigg. "He's also just as self-absorbed as ever."

Char turns his head back, "Hey, shut up!"

"Good!", Wigg remarks happily. "That at the 'shut up' part, you know what I mean. I'm sure you two should get along with the other modelers."

"Oh. There are others?", Blast asks curiously.

"Only a handful, but only one of them has trained enough to be as muscular as you guys.", Wigg explained.

"That's interesting.", Char adds. "Other than Blast and me, and other actual muscular pokemon, we've only come across two others. Would be nice to meet him."

Wigg raises an arm to look at the time on his watch. "He's actually gonna be here in a couple minutes. For now, why don't I get you two started?"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Still Stubborn

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char was pumped and ready to get started. "Let's do it! Right here and now!" Blast shared his friend's enthusiasm in a lower proportion but still excited to show off his muscles.

"Great!" said Wigg. "You guys go on ahead in the dressing room. Clothes are already in there. I'll get my cameras ready."

Char and Blast did as they were told and got into adjacent dressing rooms. Inside there was a mirror and a single bench with a skimpy speedo lying on it. Blast found a blue speedo in his room and Char a red one. Blast picked up his with his thumb and index. "Does he really expect us to fit into these things?"

Char felt a little nervous himself but was willing to give his speedo a try. Once he got it on his waist and looked at the mirror, he felt amazing. Char could see all his muscles bulging and tensing at the slightest movement. He said to Blast from his room, "Don't be a wimp, man! Give em a try!"

Blast looked at his blue speedo nervously. It looked like it wouldn't fit him and split while posing. But he agreed he would be there for Char. Might as well trust him. Blast's speedo felt tight against his shell but he liked them the same reasons Char liked his speedo. Blast flexed playfully thinking he didn't look half bad.

Blast and Char got out their rooms and complimented each other on their speedos when Wigg yelled to them he was ready. Wigg liked seeing the muscle giants literally showing off what they were made of. He felt so lucky that he found them. "Alright!" Wigg started. "Let there be light!"

Blast and Char's first poses were just them standing showing off their rippling chests with their powerful arms on their waists. The duo then started flexing arms upward and downward. They felt everytime they moved a flast a light followed.

Char was having a blast. He was pushing every muscle on his limbs until veins were visible. He wanted to make sure the camera caught the power that was erupting from his body. Blast was enjoying it as well. He stretched out his chest to reveal more power from his pecs and abs. He played a little by stroking his hand across it.

After about fifteen minutes. The cameras stopped leaving spots in Blast and Char's vision. "That was awesome guys!" exclaimed Wigg. "I never had such great shots before! I need to find muscle guys more often!"

"No problem!" said Char. "It was fun. Right, Blast?"
"Yeah! I admit I was a little nervous in this blue thing but I think I can get use to it."

Wigg still had excitement running through him. "I'm so glad! This is going to be so great! Trust me, you won't regret this!"

"Don't worry," said Char. "We never doubted you for a second." Blast tilted his head to the side and rolled his eyes.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Session time

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast were still feeling pumped after their recent session. It always feels great to just flex and show off for the camera. Suddenly, having the supersonice ears Wigg had, he overhears someone walk in. But he immediately knew who it was. "Ah! That must be him now!"

"Who?", Blast asks.

"Remember I mentioned I had one guy as a current modeler?", Wigg reminded them. Wigg holds out a hand, and in seconds, a burly dragon pokemon steps in. Char and Blast's eyes widened a bit at the pokemon. "Char, Blast, meet Drago."

Drago, is well-muscled dragonite, wearing blue jeans and a white and blue-patterned, buttoned, shirt. He was actually taller than the two, and carrying more mass. "Hey Wigg." The muscular dragon raises his brute titan arms to fold them over his barrel chest. The two smaller-muscled pokemon couldn't keep their eyes off how tight his shirt was under all that rippling mass! "So, who're these guys?" Drago raises an eyebrow at them while still keeping a small grin.

"They're our newest modelers.", Wigg answers proudly. "How 'bout you guys introduce yourselfs?"

Blast was the first to walk up to the burly reptile, showing his hand. "Hi, uh, the name's Blast." Drago stares down at Blast's palm, still with his eyebrow raised but his grin faded. "Uh..."

Soon it suddenly reappears again as the muscular titan holds out his large arms, "Hey, don't be afraid!" Drago wraps his thick arms around the buff turtle. Blast could almost FEEL the power eminating from such a magnificent beast, of a pokemon that is. Drago pats Blast on his shell, but it almost felt like he could chip it, "So, a muscular turtle huh? Haven't seen any o' those before. Name's Drago. Nice ta meet ya." Drago pushes them away. A small part of Blast practically felt like he was lucky to be alive. The beefy dragon then looks up at Char. "And who might you be?", he asks with anticipation.

Char blinks his eyes. "Oh! Uh...", before he knew it, Drago was already standing in front of him. "Uh...", Drago was about to hold out his arms, "...I'd, rather not do the hugging thing."

Drago blinks his eyes. "Oh. Okay!", he replies proudly. He then holds out a hand to Char. "Put'er there!"

Char stares at Drago's bright face, and then down at his meaty palm and arm. It takes him a bit to finally accept his handshake, holding out his hand as well. As soon as their hands locked though, as soon as Drago's fingers interlocked, Char's eyes grew wide. Wider than before. He couldn't believe what he was feeling. Drago's grip was really hard, and firm! In fact, if Drago was a bad guy, he would be able to take Char down in a heartbeat. Suddenly, Char feels Drago start to put some pressure in their shake, and it felt nearly like a compressor squeezing his hand down. Char slips his hand away from Drago's grip, "Gah!" Seems like to Char, that was a close one.

Drago on the other hand was unsure of what he did. "Hm? What?" Drago raises his hand-shaking arm a bit, "I didn't shake THAT hard. Hm?" Drago looks down at his shirt sleeve, realizing that it had just torn apart. Char was just flabbergasted, his expression of shock while his mouth agape. Drago scratches his chin while staring at his enormous and sleeve-torn arm, "Hm. Maybe I did." He sighs, "Drats. I lose more shirts that way."

Drago was about to take his shirt off, but Wigg steps in in front of him waving his arms, "Whataminute big guy!" The titan of a dragonite looks down on the small wigglytuff. "Not so fast. I think I just got an idea for your next shoot. Why not rip the shirt off this time? We can even record it on camera."

"Really?", Drago ponders to himself.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Current Modeler

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Drago wasn't sure at first but then he looked back on his torn shirt. The shreds and drags flowed and shaped his pecs and abs perfectly. In fact the ruined shirt emphasized his bare scaly chest. Drago let out a daggery grin and said, "Sure, why not?"

Wigg was happy to hear that. He was getting all the photos he could only dream of. "Great!" Wigg exclaimed. "Just stand in front of the camera and we'll get started!" Wigg then turned to Blast and Char. "Would you guys like to see how my regular clients work with my photos?" Char and Blast were really impressed with the dragonite's physique. With Drago's chest and arms revealing, they really wanted to see how well Drago would do.

The cameras started flashing the moment Drago stood in the background. He started by raising an arm to flex a bicep while clenching on his torn sleeve with his free claw. He then clenched the remains on his shirt and tensed his abs and pecs. He even added a grin.

Enthusiasm added more and more after each camera flash. Drago gripped his shirt tighter around his chest and tore straight off his body to show off ten pack abs and pillow sized pecs. Wigg flashed his cameras crazily as Drago performed such a feat. Blast and Char literally gasp out of amazement to see a dragon have such a ripped body than their own. Drago looked like he used the belt several times to get those muscles.

Drago even flexed his legs covered with long legged pants. The pants didn't rip as his legs quickly filled them up but the threads of the pants were thinning revealing bare leg scales.

Wigg stopped the cameras feeling happier than he ever felt in his career. He felt like he got such great photos from great models, especially with his regular dragonite that he could always count on if his other photos didn't give Wigg what he want.

"That was awesome!" said Wigg running to Drago. "You never let me down!" Drago shrugged a boulder of a shoulder. "I do my best for the best!" Wigg laughed out of flattery. Blast and Char, Char especially, grew envious and tad jealous of Drago. They knew the dragonite got great photos from a body anyone could wish for. Blast felt like they could never reach Drago's level with the belt no matter how much he and Char used it.

Blast and Char did their best to hide their personal feelings towards Drago. Drago was a nice guy overall. The dragonite came to them and said, "You guys stick with me and I'll show you how to be the best models you can be!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: How The Pros Do It

choices: Their next show won't be for a few days.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast would have been happy to get some pointers for future sessions, but it was about time Char and Blast headed back. "Okay. Let me show you two the way.", Wigg assures.

"Ooh! A circus? Why don't I join?", Drago adds with anticipation.

Suddenly, Char and Blast felt like they were glass sculptures breaking apart. "Uhhh..."

"Come on.", Drago says excitedly. "I'd sure like ta see what you guys can do."

Blast, along with Char, was starting to sweat profusely. "Um...well..."

"We're...still, kinda setting up.", Char finishes for him.

"Really?" Drago raises his arms, in a rather intimidating double-bicep pose right in front of the two, "Say, why don't I help you two out? Surely we'd get done sooner."

Blast's eye twitches a little. "Uh, don't, you, have a couple shoots to do here?"

"Oh I'm sure Wigg wouldn't." Drago looks down at Wigg, "Would you?"

"Eh, sorry big guy. Kinda reserved some equipment so we only have it for the rest of the day.", Wigg objects.

"Aw darn.", Drago sighs.

Wigg snaps a finger at him, "Don't worry big guy, you'll get ta see where they're takin' place. So you can visit them then."

"Oh yeah!", Drago pats a fist against the other.

"Oh no...", the two uttered.

"What was that?"

"N-nothing!", the two cried.

For the next couple minutes, Wigg directed the two to where they had to go so that they could get to the modeling place and back safely. Blast and Char were also getting a lot of feedback from Drago the whole time about certain places, which were starting to make the two a little uncomfortable. But not as uncomfortable as the fact that Drago was completely shirtless the entire time. Drago was getting attention from all around. So much for being the new strongmen in town...

Within due time, the group had finally reached their destination. "Oh, this is it?", Drago asks. "That wasn't much of a long walk. Maybe I'll get to see you two more often." Char and Blast started to grumble at each other. "Hey, you two okay? You've been doing that a lot since we left the modeling place."

Char and Blast took notice of the circus tent. Looks like it was almost up and running. They both then turned around towards the two, Char being the first to say, "Well, it's been nice seein' ya to, but we gotta get going."

"Yep!", Blast continues, putting on a fake smile. "Thanks for showin' us around."

"Hey, you guys gotta tell me when your next show is! I'd sure like to see it.", Drago adds.

Char and Blast looked at each other, then remembering that they had the belt as an advantage, for now.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Back to the Circus

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast and Char knew that Drago meant well. He was a nice guy but the muscle turtle and dragon couldn't get over how large he was. Their muscles looked like pebbles shoved into their bodies compared to Drago. They figured it was time to take their training more seriously.

Char rushed into their personal tents and dragged out all of the weights and other exercise equipment he could find. "Char," started Blast, "What the heck are you doing?"

"We're going to show that dragonite what we're made of!" said Char.

"And you think that lifting several weights in one day is going to do anything?"

"Well, we gotta start somewhere! Do you want that guy to upstage us?"

"Well...no."

"Well he will unless we prove him what we can do! What if the boss decides he wants Drago and ditches us?"

"I don't think he would do that. Don't you think you're overexaggerating a little?"

"I'm just looking out for ourselves! What if Dragona sees Drago and likes him? He was a dragonair once too you know!"

Blast's heart sank at the image of Dragona in the arms of Drago. What if that really happened? She was the best thing that happened since Blast and Char found the belt in the first place. Blast couldn't let that happen. "Okay," said Blast. "Let's do this!"

The muscle duo began pumping every limb vigorously. Most of the weights felt light due to their current strength but they didn't care; all they cared about was working till they dropped. Blast and Char didn't notice but their muscles slowly grew larger between each rep of every workout they could think of. They certainly felt stronger and satisfied in the end.

The arcanine boss noticed how hard the duo was working and proud to see what he thought were a couple of guys taking their first show in town very seriously. To him, they looked like they were going to be ready for anything.

Char was the first to collapse from exhaustion. He lied on his back against the floor huffing for air. Blast was still going fueled by the image of Dragona and Drago together. Char lifted his arm to feel the bicep of his other arm. His tiredness turned to excitement as he noticed how much harder it felt than before. Char tilted his head noticed that not just his arm but his whole body looked bigger! And Blast had the same results!

Char had no idea how this happened. No one could pump so much muscle in so little time...unless they had a machoke belt. Char grinned, jumped back up, and went back to his workout more motivated than before.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Preparedness Workout

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char started to do a few poses, seeing how much progress he was making so far. It was almost unbelievable to him, but his muscles tensed and flexed harder than they did before! The motivated dragon looks up at Blast, who was pumping an arm with a large 350-pound dumbbell. He sure was happy to see his buddy really focused in this as much as he was. "Hm?" Char took a closer look at Blast's rippling arm, and was amazed. He could have sworn he saw the muscled turtle's arm tense up just a tad more with each rep. "Amazing..."

Suddenly, Char overhears two different sets of footprints enter their tent. "Hey Char. Hey Blast.", Nyne calls out to the two.

Char and Blast look back at the two of them. They could see they were pretty tuckered out themselves from setting up. "Hey, you girls okay?", Blast asks, taking a small break from his reps.

"Just a little tired from setting up.", Dragona shrugged, still holding that cute smile Blast loves.

"I see you two have been up and at it again.", Nyne adds. "You two do seem a little more motivated than before. Run into a certain someone on your travels?"

Char and Blast's eyes grew wide. Was it really that obvious to her? Then again, she could just be asking a retorical question. The two bodybuilders were still able to keep their cool, Char letting out an easy sigh. "Nah. Just thought we pump up some more for you two.", Char replies with a big grin.

The two chuckle softly at them. Blast sets down the dumbbell, and then walks up to Dragona, who was looking back at him a little puzzled. "Dragona..."

It took a short moment for her to reply. "...Uh, yeah Blast?"

Blast stares at her for a moment, his lip starting to shrivel a bit. Char and Nyne were just as puzzled and confused as Dragona was. Blast then wraps his strong muscular arms around Dragona with care, and then says..."Mm... We...will be together...forever...right?"

All of a sudden...it was as if the mood just got awkward. Char facepalms himself while Nyne and Dragona felt really awkward themselves. Char pulls Blast away. "Alright Casanova, let's go."

"I just asking!"

Char turns back to them, restraining Blast in his arms, "Why don't, you two get some rest. We've had a rough time ourselves."

Blast still couldn't stop worrying about his relationship with Dragona. Would she really leave him for a guy like Drago. He felt so scared and nervous. He also felt a little mad towards Char for bringing it up. To make matters worse, he knew he just made things awkward between him and Dragona. Blast slapped his palms to his face in embarrassment and worry. What was he going to do?
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Awkward Cassanova

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char drags his turtle friend into what would be another 'room' of the tent, so that Nyne and Dragona couldn't hear them. The burly dragon drags Blast and stands the turtle right in front of him as if he were a statue. "Hey." Blast suddenly falls forward to the ground on his chin. Char sighs, and then picks the turtle back up into place. "Hey! You're a real crybaby, ya know that?"

Blast points a finger at Char, "And you're a stubborn dragon who's the same color as an orange!"

"Okay, now you're just yelling and makin' up insults.", Char added, his thick arms crossed over his chest. Blast was glaring at Char with angry eyes, which soon stared to turn into sad eyes while his lower lip puckers up. "Uh... Dude, are you about to-"

The ripped turtle suddenly wraps his arms around his ripped friend. "WAHHH! It's so hard! It's just so hard!"

"What're you talking about!?", Char cries back, pushing the heavy turtle away.

"It's just...I've never met anyone like Dragona before I...just can't afford to lose her to Drago...", Blast explains tearfully.

Char lets out another sigh. "Okay, first off, Dragona hasn't even met Drago yet. Second, you're still a crybaby."

"Shut up."

"Third, even when she does meet him, it's not like she'll just go and run into his arms." Blast wasn't looking very brightly at Char, still feeling very worried. "And if she does", Char reaches into Blast's shell and holds something up in front of Blast's face, "just show HIM who's boss." What Char was holding turned out to be magazine. "Uh..."

Blast swipes it away. "Storage, alright?" The blue turtle sticks in back inside. "Well what about you? What if Drago comes in and suddenly scoops her off her feet?"

"I'll just do the same thing.", Char confidently assures. "No way am I letting another guy step in between us."

"Um, don't mean 'no way am I letting 'Drago' step in between us'?"

Char is literally right in Blast's face, "NOOO OOONE..."

Blast looks away, "Sheesh. And I thought I was the jealous one."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Love Talk

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
The next morning, Char stretched his seviper-like arms in the sun rippling his scaly chest and back. Blast was still tossing and turning in his sleep from his "episode." Although Blast was acting obnoxious, Char really cared for his buddy. He didn't want his turtle bro to feel insignificant next to Drago. Char wanted to do something to get Blast's confidence back up.

Blast walked out of the tent an hour later and scoped the circus looking for Char. The first spot he looked was their performance tent. Luckily enough, Char was there pumping his abs with several hundred sit ups.

"Morning," said Char. "I was beginning to wonder if you were ever going to get up."

Blast rubbed the back of his head gropingly. "Sorry, I had trouble sleeping last night."

"I'd figured as much. You were tossing and turning when I got up. If you're still worried about Drago, why don't you just use the belt?"

Char made a strong point. With the belt, Blast could grow ten times stronger than the dragonite but what would that accomplish? This was more than just the amount of phyical strength they had. "No, this isn't about muscles," said Blast. "This is about proving my personal self to him and myself. I got my muscles the easy way while Drago had to earn them. I just don't want to depend on the belt too much. I think that's a sign of weakness."

Blast made another solid point. Everything that happened to the both of them was practically given to them. Who knows what Drago had to do to get into modelling? As much as Char loved his muscles and what they gave him, he knew Blast was right. This was about proving the real Char and Blast under their strength.

"Good point," said Char still contemplating, "So what are you going to do?"

"I'll worry about Drago when I see him," responded Blast. "As for Dragona, I'll try talking to her again when I see her."

"Sounds like a plan to me. You ready for another hard workout without the help of the belt?"

Blast felt encouraged and empowered and this time it wasn't from his strength. "You bet!"

Char went back to his sit ups while Blast began lifting dumbbells. They still didn't notice the definition in their muscles growing greater. Char's abs slowly became more sculpted and was forming another set of abs. Blast's arms grew slowly to giant proportions biceps and tripceps pushing so hard against his skin veins bulged to feed his muscles blood and power. They both took a glimpse but didn't take much notice. They just thought they were just getting pumped from their workout.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Morning Routine

choices: It was Wigg. What could he want?
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast just continued their morning workout, getting unnoticeably more pumped with each pump, flex and grinde as they did. Without noticing, their tent swings open. A tall and burly pokemon started to make his way into the tent and up to the two weight-lifters. "Dang. You guys sure don't fuss around with your workouts."

Suddenly, the two musclemons freeze up. Char glances to his turtle pal. "Did you, hear that?"

"I can already see it.", Blast replies, pointing into a full-length mirror and seeing Drago's reflection. Blast sets the weights he had down, and then takes a deep breathe. He turns around, trying to keep his composure, "Drago! What the heck are you doing here?", Blast asks sarcastically.

"Oh boy...", Char remarks, picking himself off the ground.

"Oh. Wigg just got me all hyped up about you guys being in the circus, so I just thought I stop by and see what you two were up to. If, that's okay.", Drago explained.

"Not really-"

"Of course it's okay.", Char stepped in. "But, maybe next time you could have given us a little future notice?"

Drago starts rubbing the back of his head, "Oh. Sorry. Yeah, I guess I should have."

Blast started to tap his fingers against each other, "Um, just out of curiousity, you didn't happen to pass by a tall dragonair on your way here, did you?"

"No. Just this arcanine, who I assume is your boss?", Drago asks.

"Your assumption is correct.", Char replies. He then glances back at his worried friend, and then looks back at the ripped dragonite. "Uh, look, we're, kinda busy right now."

Drago raises his hands in assurance, "Oh okay. I understand. I'll probably give you guys another notice once we meet up with Wigg later."

"Oh, that's right.", Blast remembers. "Uh, yeah. See you then."

Suddenly, the tent opens up. Who could it be?
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Drago, in the Flesh!

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Wigg hopped into the tent as Drago was about to step out. "Boss," said Drago, "What are you doing here?"

Wigg grinned widely. "I heard you were coming this way and I had a great idea for guys!" Blast and Char didn't know whether to be excited or horrified. "What's up?" asked Char.

"Well," started Wigg, "Since you guys are strongmen with the circus, I figure I take some modelling photos of you three posing as strongmen!"

Drago's ears perked at the idea. "That sounds awesome!" said Drago. "What do you guys think?"

"One second," said Char. Char could tell Blast wasn't fond of the idea based on his clunching hands. They turned around to speak privately. "I REALLY don't know about this, Char," said Blast.
"Look, I know that. But Drago's trying be nice and this could be a really great opportunity to get to know him better. Who knows? Maybe you'll learn to like him."
Blast took a deep breath. "Okay, fine. But if he tries to steal my thunder, he's going down!"

Char and Blast returned to Wigg and Drago and agreed with the photo session. There was really no reason for them to change. The muscle trio had their bare chests already showing so all they needed to do was pose with some heavy epuipment.

Blast started by lifting a giant bar of steel above his head as if it wasn't anything. The workout swelled and empowered his arms to massive peaks. To finish his pose, he curled his lips to a sly smile.

Char meanwhile raised dumbbells up to his chest and flexed his chest as hard as he could. His chest literally rippled and grew emphasizing the real beast sleeping inside him.

Blast and Char felt confident of their poses as Wigg flashed his camera against their muscles. The duo could see the flashes reflect against their raw power. Their jaws dropped when they turned to Drago.

Drago was also lifting a bar but his muscles grew more tense and thick as he pushed more pressure on the bar. Squeaks were emerging from the bar as Drago starts bending it! Wiggs's camera goes crazy towards the dragonite as if he was a fountain of power.

Blast and Char (especially Blast) were losing their patience and grew more confused about Drago. He was a nice guy but he was upstaging the both of them. But they continued the session as if everything was normal.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Wigg's Idea

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Wigg lands back on his feet, feeling really excited about about what he caught on film. "Well done Drago! You never cease to amaze me." Wigg turns to his other two recruits, "You guys were amazing too."

"Yeah!", Drago cheers. "Can't wait to do this again." Char and Blast didn't even smile, which gave the two a puzzled look. The dragon and the turtle look down at the bent barbell, not even speaking a word. Drago stares at it as well. "Oh! Don't worry, I can always straighten it out." The pumped dragonite walks up to the barbell, about to pick it up, "Allow me."

"No!", Blast suddenly screams. Char and Drago looked at Blast with wide eyes. "Um, I mean, let me take care of this.", the buff turtle replies with a weak smile. Looks like he wanted to do this very badly. Blast walks up to it, and then slowly picks it up in his hands. He grunts, pumping and tensing his arms as hard as he could to straighten the bar back into place. Even with Blast's added-on strength and mass, it still didn't prove as effective, only straightening the bar just a little, until he could take no more. "Gah!" The barbell drops to the ground, still bent quite profusely.

Blast was left sweating and panting quite heavily, but Drago pats his back to cheer him up. "Hey, maybe next time."

Suddenly, Blast slaps Drago's hand away. "Me and you, into the shark tank!", Blast pointed to a large fish tank that would normally be used for Dragona's waterdancing performance.

Drago raises an eyesbrow, "Huh?" He then looks back at the jealous turtle, "Uh...why?"

Blast walks up to two triangular weights, and then picks them up with rage and tosses them into the fishtank. He then glares back at the curious dragonite, "I've had it with you! Always upstaging us! I'm gonna show you what I'm capable of!"

"Huh? Upstaging...?", Drago utters worriedly.

Char walks up to Blast, reaching a hand to him, "Dude, don't do this.", Blast just replies by slapping Char's hands away as well. Blast climbs up a ladder and then jumps right in to the water. He swims to the bottom, and then picks up both weights with both his arms. "Dude, you're gonna sprain yourself!", Char cries.

Blast didn't really care. It seems he had just about had enough with Drago, and wanted to do something Drago might now be capable of. He goes right ahead and starts lifting the weights, two-at-time. The three could certainly see this wasn't gonna be so easy for the raging turtle. Even if he is capable of lifting such great weights, he appears to be doing it too fast. Char, Drago and Wigg could already see the straining in Blast's eyes. He just went through one weight-lifting session, why go through another?!

Blast's arms were really shredding out, but it doesn't look like he can take anymore of what he was lifting. "Gah!", Blast gurgles.

"Blast!", Char cries out.

The worn out turtle falls to the ground, about to pass out. Suddenly, Blast hears a splash. It turned out to be Drago, who wasted no time in rescuing the poor thing. Blast sees Drago come to his rescue for only a second, and then passes out.

"Buddy?" It sounded very vague, but Blast was able to hear it. "Buddy, are you okay?" Blast starts to crack his eyes open, seeing Char, Drago, and Wigg look back at him. "Oh. Thank goodness."

"Wha-? What happened?", Blast asks, trying to recollect his thoughts.

"You overdid it bud.", Char replies blantly. "You were out for a few minutes."

"Oh..."

"Luckily I was able to give you CPR.", Drago added happily.

"You what?!", Blast screams "Why would you give me CPR!?"

"Well because, uh... Oh. That's right.", Drago remembered.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Had Enough

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast collected a few breaths before talking to Drago. "Drago, I owe you an apology."

Drago knew Blast doesn't normally act like that. "What's going on?" He asked.

Blast was both shy and didn't know how to explain himself. "I..I'm...I got jealous."

"Jealous? About what?"

"I got mad on how strong you are. Char and I thought we were the toughest guys around and that no one could ever beat us. That is...until you showed up. Look, I'm really sorry I was acting such a jerk to you when you've been trying to be nice to us."

Drago just shrugged it off. "To be honest, I guess I did get carried away, so you're not entirely to blame. "What do you say? Friends?"

Drago took out his hand to Blast waiting for a response. Blast took one last breath and said, "Yeah, let's start over."

Wigg figured to call it a day after such excitement. Drago suggested going to a resteraunt for lunch as a peace offering. Char and Blast agreed. This could be a good opportunity to know Drago better. When they arrived at the resteraunt and took their seats, Blast began to feel a little better, especially with his chair creaking under his heavy weight.

Char and Blast finally got to be friendly with Drago and they were right about his being nice. The buff dragonite even got Blast and Char laughing at some jokes. Then they got to talk about working out and how they got to where they are.

"So how did you guys get started in the circus?" asked Drago.

Blast and Char were worried about telling him about the belt at first but they decided to tell them. Surely he would have found out eventually. So they told him about their desire grow big and how they found Machoke's belt. Blast was worried about telling Drago because he wasn't sure how he would respond to their taking the easy way. But Drago took it really well. He actually thought that was pretty cool.

"What about you?" asked Char. "Did you get started because you got bullied?"

Drago chuckled. "No, nothing like that. I actually got started by uncle. I...I lost my parents in a mugging gone bad and my uncle took me in. He took bodybuilding very seriously and got me into it to build my confidence and take care of myself in rough situations so something like that won't happen again."

Blast couldn't help but admire Drago and his story. "Your uncle sounds like a really awesome guy," said Blast.

"He is!" said Drago. "I owe him everything that's happened in my life."

"Thank you for sharing that with us, Drago" said Char.

"Thanks for listening. And thanks for giving me a chance to be buddies with you guys."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Starting Over

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast remembered that they had a show to perform at soon, but they've still got plenty of time to spend with their new pal. Drago suddenly speaks up to them, "Say, you guys wouldn't happen to have any time to spare time, would you?"

Blast rubs the back of his head, "Well, yeah. Our show's not for another hour or so."

"Well then", Drago raises up a thick peak, "how 'bout we go for a quick workout?"

Char and Blast didn't feel too hot about about about that. Char started rubbing his muscely stomach, "Uh... We kinda just ate."

"Oh.", Drago replies. "Sorry, I guess I'm not used to not being active. That and I thought you guys wouldn't mind a quick workout before your show."

Blast raises a hand, "Nah. We're good."

"Alright. See you two then.", Drago waves happily as he walks off.

Wigg follows behind, "See ya guys. I'll bring my camera and material for the daily pokenews paper." Wigg springs off.

The charizard and blastoise look at each other, and then let out a deep sigh. Blast speaks up, "That turned out okay."

Char chuckles, "Yeah."

They sat in their seats for a moment. Blast then turns to his buff friend, "Still want to work out before the show?"

"Yep!", Char replies happily.

Luckily it didn't take too long for the two to find their way back to their tent and circus. Once they got there, they were already able to see the carnival was well underway. It even looks as if there were more pokemon then at their past circus. The two musclemons decided to walk casually through the crowd, but the moment they entered inside, they were already the talk of the town. They were all excited to see both their upcoming acts, that's for sure.

Char and Blast tried to stroll through, but the attention they were getting seemed to catch their eyes as well. The two looked at each other and then put on sly grins. Why not put on a quick small show? Char spreads his legs out a bit, and then lowers his arms to flex them against his packed chest. Blast turns around, raising his arms upwards to flex along with his wide and shredded back. The crowd of pokemon started to clap and cheer excitedly. Char and Blast looked at each other, maybe today isn't so bad after all.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Need to Be Active

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
It was showtime before Blast and Char knew it and they returned to their tent to prepare. Blast checked the belt was in his shell and Char made sure all their equipment they planned to use for their act was accounted for.

"Ready, Blast?" asked Char over his gigantic shoulder.

"Yep!" replied Blast with a grin.

The duo spent the beginning of the show preparing for their act. They placed all the heavy weights to their spot and felt ready as they as ever. Blast and Char dragged a piece of solid brick wall and covered the entrance to the audience. All they had to do was wait for their cue.

They heard their arcanine boss on the other side of the wall. The moment the ringmaster yelled their names, Blast and Char curled their hands to fists and shattered the wall in front of them, suprising the audience immensely. The crowd was astonished how big they were. Most of them didn't believe a charizard or a blastoise could grow so muscular.

Char decided to amaze the crowd early so he grabbed several weight bars and began to juggle them like in the previous act. Blast meanwhile grabbed the belt and strapped it around his waist. As he looked at the curious faces of the crowd about what he was doing, Blast saw both Drago and Wigg sitting in the show. Even though Blast reconciled with Drago, Blast was ready to show him what he could do.

Blast asked the audience to count to three and yell "Bulk Up" with him according to their show. The moment those magic words rang in his ears, Blast felt the familiar power of the belt flowing to his waist and to the rest of his body. His muscles erupted into new peaks and shapes while his bones made him strectch to new heights. Blast flexed his arms upwards while puffing his chest as he grew. Drago and the rest of the audience gazed in awe how Blast flexing thickened rapidly. Blast knew the audience enjoyed the growth as much as he did.

Finally Blast was done and perfomed a final pose of holding his arms downwards by his wrists and opening his cannons to show off. Char stood by Blast's side pointing as the audience cheered.

For a second, Blast looked directly at Drago and walked over to the weights Char was just juggling. He picked one up above his head with one hand easily. He then placed his second hand on it and began pulling down on the weight. Blast was pleased to see creaks and wrinks on the bar as he bended it to a perfect curve. He then raised the bent bar over his head for the wild crowd to see. Even Drago was happy Blast could do it. With Drago's approval from afar, Blast finally let his ego be at peace and do the rest of the show joyfully.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Blast's True Colors

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast and Char went back to their personal tent to relax after the show. After shrinking back to his previous form, Blast stretched out his arms feeling totally at peace with himself.

"You're in a good mood," said Char sitting down with a soda at hand.

"I really am!" exclaimed Blast. "Drago was in the audience today. I know we got over the whole jealousy thing, but it felt great showing him what we can do! I know he was impressed by the look on his face!"

"So this concludes all your issues?"

Blast nodded enthusiastically.

"Good. Blue's more of your color than green."

"Ha-ha, very funny."

The muscle duo just relaxed as they continued to hear the roaring excitement of the audience from the other tent. After about an hour, a giant frame entered their tent. "Hey guys!" said Drago waving his thick arm in the air. "You did great tonight! I can't believe how big you got with that belt, Blast! That was so cool!" Blast couldn't help but feel a sense of pride in hearing those words come out of Drago's mouth. Not that Blast showed him he was better but that he was just as good.

"Thanks," said Blast. "Thanks for coming to see it. We love having fans!"

"Oh, I'm a fan, alright!" replied Drago. "Umm...if it's not too much trouble, could I try the belt?"

Char and Blast couldn't find the harm. Drago was their friend like they were to each other. Char threw it to him with a grin. Drago clipped the belt onto his waist. "Okay, what now?" Blast chuckled. "You don't remember?" he asked. "You say 'Bulk Up'!"

The belt activated. Drago felt a warm feeling coming from the belt into his waist and then towards the rest of his body. He thought it felt great but overwhelming at the same time. The warmth grew hotter and hotter and wanted to get out of his scales. The sensation failed to leave as Drago's muscles thickened and grew to greater peaks than he ever thought he could achieve. Drago could feel his arms growing strong as a steelyx, his chest as machamp, and his legs as a hitmonlee. He was amazed as Char and Blast appear to be getting smaller as he grew taller.

After what felt like forever, Drago was done growing as was astonished by the results. "Oh my gosh!" the hyper muscled dragonite exclaimed. "Look at me! I'm huge! I never thought I could get this big!" Blast and Char could tell Drago was really enjoying his new look but their necks were getting sore but looking up at him. "Consider this as an apology gift from me," said Blast.

Drago grinned down flexing his mighty arms. "Apology accepted!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: It's never too late to apologize

choices: Nyne and Dragona suddenly step in as well.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Drago was still really excited about all the extra muscle he was packin' on. It was a little tough to move around, but he got used to it pretty quick, clenching his fingers to see what he was dealing with. He raises his left arm up, watching his immense bicep peak up and flex, with a good vein ta boot! "Dang. This is incredible!"

Char and Blast watched their new pal enjoy himself a bit, but then they looked at each other. Why should Drago have all the fun? Char walks up to the thick dragonite, and then pulls the belt off of him. "Alright, you're not the only one who's gonna have this much fun." Char slips on the belt around his waist, and then says the magic words. "Bulk up!" The charizard feels his body tense right up, gritting his teeth as well. Char's body began to bulk up right in front of Drago, his back starting to rise up along with his arms, pecs, and legs. In no time, Char was nearly as big as his bulky friend. Char's body comes to a rest, and then he takes a stomp forward to Drago, showing off his meaty pecs and thick arms. "Check me out now!"

As for Blast, he slips the belt off of Char and then puts it on himself. "Now it's my turn.", the blastoise remarks proudly. "Bulk up!" The turtle's body began to thicken out from all aroud. He holds out his arms, giving his pals a good view of the growing biceps, triceps, and all that good stuff that showed off from all around. Blast's pecs and abs were also showin' their stuff, which were protruding out more and more. As for his thick tree-trunk legs, they just pumped out more and more. Char and Drago were really excited for their turtle buddy, who was now standing just as tall as Char. Blast stomps a foot in front of them just like Char did, flexing out his thick peaks and large pecs, "How do guys like this?"

Drago snorts, turning his upper body around to flex up his left arm and tenses up his large legs. Char and Blast glance and smirk at each other, and joined in on the fun. For the next couple minutes, it was just a straight-on posedown between three muscular freaks! They all just looked at each other with proud grins, showing off what they got. Suddenly, what sounded like a little furball, was bouncing its way into the tent. The furball turned out to be Wigg. "Heya guys. I just thought I stop by--AIEEE!!" Wigg leaps back once at the sight of it. He almost couldn't believe his eyes. "Drago? Is that you?"

Drago puts on the smile he always had. "Well, yeah. Why wouldn't it be?"

Wigg kept his distance, staring at the three muscular behemoths. "Oh. ...... Almost didn't recognize you there for a moment."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Growing Together

choices: Go back to their previous size
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Wigg couldn't believe the mountains of muscle that stood before him. Their biceps were ten times his size. Wigg could literally see the power flowing through Blast, Char, and Drago's veins. He had to take advantage of this moment.

"You guys look absolutely amazing!" Wigg exclaimed, "And powerful!"

Drago chuckled rippling his pecs and abs. "Thanks boss! You should thank Blast and Char. They helped me out!"

Before Blast and Char could say anything to Wigg, the little pink puffball jumped with euphoria and a grand idea. "Guys, I HAVE to take photos of you guys like this! With your muscles and my pictures, we'll be famous!"

Blast, Char, and Drago thought it would be great to pose with these amazing muscles but they seemed to be too big to pose in the circus. Char raised his arm to look at his relaxed yet sturdy bicep. They still had to do this.

"I'm up for it!" said Char.
"Count me in!" said Blast.
"You know I gotta be part of this!" said Drago.

Wigg jumped up more happy than ever. "Fantastic! And I know just the place for us to try!" The trio looked at the wigglytuff puzzledly. "Where?" asked Blast. Wigg smirked. "Follow me and I'll show you!"

As Wigg jumped along the road to the mystery destination, the giant muscle pokemon followed him with quaking steps. Char accidently made a car alarm go off as he walked beside the car.

Wigg stopped in front of the gates to a giant junkyard with hundred piles of dead cars. "Here we are!" said Wigg.
"A junkyard?" asked Blast.
"Think about it!" exclaimed Wigg. "There are plenty of heavy stuff for you guys to try out and you'll look awesome crushing some cars!" The sound of crushing cars with his bare hands sounds really pleasing to Char.

"So what'ya say?" asked Wigg.

Simultaneously, the trio said, "We're in!"

The next thing Wigg knew was his taking photos of titans doing incredible feats! Drago started by lifting a car in both hands and raising them above his head. He then tossed one car into the other hand making the car land on top of the other!

Wigg then turned his attention to Blast who had a massive pick up truck in his strong hands. Wigg automatically started taking pictures. However, he paused as the truck creaked in Blast's grip. The metal carrier of the truck began to crack as Blast pulled the truck apart. The crack got bigger and bigger for the truck to be cut in half. Blast then raised the halves as high as he could.

Char wanted to impress Wigg and outdo what Drago and Blast managed to do. The dragon grinned when he saw a dangling wrecking ball over a pile of cars. Char walked to the ball and grabbed the chain. "Hey, Wigg!" yelled Char, "Check this out!" The might dragon snapped the chain with flick of his wrist began swinging the wrecking above his head. Wigg's camera flashed like crazy but not as much when Char slammed the ball into a pile of cars scattering piecies of metal and glass.

"This is amazing!" exclaimed Wigg. "These photos are going to set my whole career!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Another man's junk is another man's treasure

choices: Char and Blast DID grow a bit just by flexing.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
The big three gave each other a loud high-five. "YEAH!"

Drago pulls Char and Blast in to give them a big hug, "This is incredible! I've never felt so BIG before!" Drago raises his immense and thick arms close to his head, watching the patches of ripped meat on his pipes rise out and shred with great power. "I can totally get used to this."

"Yeah, I'm, sure you would.", Blast remarks. Char then punches Blast on his sides.

"Well, hey, we're really glad you like it.", Char added happily. "I must say though,", Char flexes his arms down agaings his sides, tensing and flexing his whole body up to amazing proportions, "it's really nice to be this big. You can just feel the rush and exhilaration through your body and muscles."

Suddenly, Blast stomps a foot on the pile of broken car parts, just to show of his thick tree-trunk legs, "Yeah! I hear ya there!"

Char and Blast were basically in a pose-off, flexing a specific part of their body with the other one-by-one. Drago thought about joining in, but he was starting to realize something going on with the two. He wasn't sure, but after each pose, they appeared to be getting larger and larger, bit-by-bit. Drago looks back at Wigg, who still appeared to be admiring the photos he had just taken. "Hey Wigg, can you come here a sec?"

Wigg bounces up to Drago, "Yeah? What's up?"

"You still got some film left, right?"

"Yeah.", Wigg replies. "I actually bring a digital camera too, in case I run out of film."

"I want you to take pictures of them. Just basic start-to-finish ones.", Drago explained.

Wigg gives a thumbs up, "No problem!" Wigg pulled out his trusty digital camera, and then immediately started taking photos of the two bodybuilders. Their flexing and posing with one-another actually scurried on for a couple minutes, and Wigg's camera had plenty of power to capture it all.

Char and Blast were also pretty proud of themselves. They haven't really had a good ol' posedown between each other in quite some time. Every muscle group one started to flex, the other wanted to top it. Strangely, that seems like what was happening right now. As soon as the two erupted their final pose, Wigg takes one final picture.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Before and After

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char stretched out his back and arms rippling them all at once. "Well, I don't know about you guys but I'm getting kinda tired!"
Blast agreed. "Yeah, it's getting late and we got another tomorrow night."

Wigg understood but was still excited about the shots he got. He couldn't wait to develop them. He hopped towards the muscle titans enthusiastically. "You guys did great! Thanks again for the photos! I just know I got some of my best work here!" Drago shared his boss's excitement still feeling the great power flowing across his scales.

Drago's euphoria was short lived when Blast said, "We should probably shrink back to our original sizes."

"Do we have to?" asked Drago hoping Blast would say no. Blast answered, "As much as it would be cool be this big all the time, it would be kinda hard, don't you think?"

Drago wanted to say he could handle his new strength but he knew his turtle friend was right. "Yeah, let's do it."

After Blast and Char shrank back, it was Drago's turn to use the belt. "Bulk down." Instantly, Drago felt the amazing power leaving his body even though there was still some giant muscle left after he shrank back.

Char could see Drago looked a bit bummed for having to shrink back. "Don't worry, man. We'll use it again. I promise!" This made Drago feel better.

After about a couple hours later, Drago made his way back home at his luxury apartment ready for bed. Just as he changed into his boxers, he checked his email to see if Wigg sent him the photos he took of him, Blast, and Char. Wigg did indeed. Drago opened up the file and admired each photo of different pose the emphasized their incredible muscles. He loved each picture.

Drago then compared the last photo Wigg took with the earlier photos. He could tell Blast and Char's muscles looked a little bigger after each pose. He suspicions were correct! How did this happen? Did the belt do it? He'd have to figure it out in the morning.

The next morning, Drago's mind was still clouded with the growth of Blast and Char without the belt. How did they do that? Just by flexing? Only one way to find out.

Drago stepped in front of his full sized mirror still in his boxers and began doing random poses. Looking at his muscles thickening made Drago feel pumped for the day but he also felt a little bit of warmth coming from the muscles he just flexed. After relaxing his muscles, Drago noticed they kept their tense shape! He grew by flexing too! But how?

Drago was completely puzzled then it hit him. The belt. The belt must have done something to him that allowed him to grow slightly without it! Drago couldn't help but grin. He could get use to this new power.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Small Big Changes

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast were back in front of their usual tent, but they were helping one of their fellow performers, Monlee, move some of his equipment around. "A dozen thank you's for your aid in helping moving my belongings. I could not have accomplished such an unfortunate task without your kindness and gratitude."

"Hey, no problem!", Char replies happily, carrying a fairly large barrel in his left arm and over his broad shoulder, and hefty cable wire around his right forearm. "We're always happy to help."

Blast was following behind, carrying another barrel over his head and one around his left arm. "Why do you have so much heavy stuff?" Char whips Blast on his head with his tail, "Ow!"

"My performance requres a well-built and non-crowd-injuring setup. The one in charge has always had previous objections with me about moving my belongings around.", Monlee explains calmly. "Once again, I'm, thankful you strong ones are around to help me in my hour of need."

"Yeah, sure thing.", Blast replies uneasily. "How far did you say the spot is again?" Char whips him on the head again. "Ow! That flame isn't any further away you know!"

"It's not too much further. The one in charge wanted me to entertain the folk that walk the streets to hopefully gather more attention towards our circus.", Monlee assures. "With you two aiding me with my belongings, it should take fewer trips there and back."

"Okay.", Char replies happily. He then raises his cable-carrying arm to wrap the cables around his arm muscles, and then flexes his cable-stretching muscles with all his might. "I wouldn't mind the extra weight-lifting though."

Monlee notices the stretching cables, "Please, although I'm proud of you and your friend's muscular stature, I only have that one cable."

Char quickly relaxes his arm, "Oops! Oh, sorry." Suddenly, Char gets sprayed on the back of his head by a ball of water. Char turns his head back to his turtle friend, a cannon sticking out of Blast's shell, "Hey!"

"You started it.", Blast remarks, sounding childish.

"Hello you three." Char, Blast, and Monlee turned their heads to the front of them, seeing Dragona slither up to them. "And how are you guys today."

"Hi Dragona.", Char greeted.

"Greetings Dragona.", Monlee greets, bowing his head a bit.

"Dragona!" Blast suddenly runs past Char and Monlee with stars in his eyes. Suddenly, the two barrels he was carrying fall on one side of him. "And how are you today?", Blast asks excitedly.

"Uh...I'm, fine.", Dragona replies, trying to keep her smile.

While the muscular turtle was busy chatting with his most beloved friend, Monlee looks down to see Blast's foot was crushed by one of the barrels. "Umm..."

Char intervenes, "Let's see how long it'll take for him to actually notice."

Blast had actually been talking to Dragona for almost five minutes, Blast sounding mushy the entire time. Dragona was starting to slither off, "Well, it was nice seeing you. I guess I'll see you, before the show?"

Blast waves off to her. "Okay. See ya then." Blast just waves off while seeing the aquatic pokemon slither off.

As if on que, Char says, "3...2...1..."

"OWWW!!! My fooot!!!"

Monlee turns to Char, "That, wasn't very kind."

"Yeah, but he still loves me though.", Char grins.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Helping a Friend

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char chuckled while walking to Blast. "You okay, bro?"

Blast gritted his teeth. "Yeah, I'll be fine. I'm just happy to see Dragona. Feels like I haven't seen her in a long time."

"Yeah I bet, Cassanova. Come on, let's get back to our tent and get some rest. We got another big day ahead of us."

"Yeah, okay."

The duo stomped their way back to their tent and as they entered they found a large dragonite sitting in a chair. "Hey, guys!" said Drago. As much as Char and Blast were always happy to see their new friend, they found it strange how he made himself at home.

"Hey, Drago," said Char. "What brings you here?"

"I wanted to show you guys something." Drago flashed Wigg's photos in his hand. Both Blast and Char's ears perked up and they rushed to grab the photos.

The duo smiled bigger and bigger after looking at each photo. Their poses looked phenominal. The feats they performed matched the pressured muscles making them look sculpted marble.

"They look great!" said Char. "Wigg did a great job!"

"We all did!" corrected Drago. "By the way, do you see anything strange about those photos?"

Blast looked at the photos carefully hoping not to find anything wrong. "I don't see anything. What are you talking about?"

"Take a closer look at your muscles from the earlier photos compared to the later ones," said Drago.

Blast and Char moved their heads closer to the photos. The only thing they could see was a slight size difference in their biceps. "I think our muscles look thicker," said Blast, "But that was just us posing a little harder than usual."

Char then looked at his own arms and saw they looked similar to the tensed size of them in his photos. He was starting to get it. "What a second..."

"You got it! Your muscles got bigger by flexing!" said Drago. "I tried it myself! It really works!"

Blast took a closer look at Drago. "Come to think of it, you do look a little bigger."

"Are you sure about this, Drago?" asked Char.

"Totally! Give it a try!"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Hidden Truth

choices: "How 'bout a good old-fashioned posedown. See who can get the biggest."
"Wigg was interested with this for another photo shoot."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Char and Blast were still unsure whether or not Drago was telling the truth, or if the photos they have in front of them photo-manipulated, but they don't think Drago would even have such a skill. But, hey, it wouldn't hurt give a good flex once in a while. Char looks up at Blast, raising up his left arm, "Well, let's see." Char pulls his forearm in, making the hardened peak that his bicep raise up quite well. The three of them stared at his flexed arm for the moment awaiting for something good to be happening. Although Char did like the attention he was getting, nothing was happening. Char glances at Drago, "Uh..."

"Don't just stare at it.", Drago remarked. "Just keep flexing again."

Char just does as he was told. He lowers his arm, and then raises it to flex his thick bicep and tricep yet again. Char's arm was starting to feel a little weird, until he lowered it and then flexed it hard once more. "Whoa!" That's when Char was getting the brink of what was going on. The more the charizard flexed it, the bigger it was noticeably getting!

"Wow! That's incredible!" Blast shoots the belt out of his shell and into his palm. "I guess this belt can make you grow big faster on your own after you use it."

"You know Blast,", the turtle looks at his friend, "I kinda already noticed this myself."

Blast backs up a bit, "You, you did?"
