"Well, yeah.", Char admitted. "Everytime we worked out, even without the belt, I always thought something weird was going on with your muscles, but I then I just thought you were just growing bigger every time."

"Oh...", Blast replies incompletely. "Well, I can't say I didn't feel the same way about you too." Char looks up at his friend. "Weird though. We knew it was happening with each other, but not with ourselves."

Drago suddenly walks up to the two, wrapping a tremendous arm around the two's shoulders, "Well hey, maybe now that the two of you know about this, you probably won't need the belt to grow anymore. On your own, that is."

Char looks down a bit, "Well, yeah. I guess you're right."

"Good!", Drago yells out proudly, patting you both on the back. "Hey, you guys aren't too tired right now, are ya?"

Char and Blast looked at each other, Blast being the one to reply. "No, not really. Why?"

Drago steps forward, unwrapping his meaty arms from the both of you. "Just wonderin'."
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: I'm a Believer

choices: Do romantic scenes with the girls
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
"Wigg asked me if you guys and I wanted to do another shoot," said Drago. "He wants to get even better footage of us." Blast and Char didn't mind showing off their slightly bigger muscles, but what else could they do for photos? They did all their best feats at the junkyard.

"Does he want us to do more outrageous feats?" asked Blast.

Drago gave a slight smirk. "Not exactly. He wants us to show off at the beach! Tomorrow's going to bring great weather for a beach day! What'ya say?" Char agreed the moment Drago mentioned the beach. He would love to show his bare body for the rest of the world to see. Besides, his scales shined in sunlight. Blast always loved the ocean and didn't see why not.

"I'm up for it!" said Char.
"So am I!" said Blast.

"Great!" exclaimed Drago. "I'll see you guys there in the morning!" Drago left the tent feeling pumped than ever before. He loved going to beach. Doing beach footage was his favorite.

Blast and Char were getting ready for bed when Nyne and Dragona arrived. "Hey, you guys!" said Nyne. Char looked up excited to see his fox. "Hi, Nyne! Great job tonight."
"Thanks..." Nyne looked like she wanted to say something else but was too distracted by Char's rippling chest. It seemed like it grew more powerful everytime she saw it. Dragona noticed Nyne's shyness and spoke on her behalf.

"Say guys, since we got the day off tomorrow, you want to do anything?"

Blast stuttered knowing they just made plans. "Well...we have made plans to do another photo session with Drago."

"But it'll be at the beach!" interrupted Char. "You can come with us! I'm sure Drago and the photographer wouldn't mind!"

Blast looked at his bud. "You sure?"

"Why not? Drago and Wigg are layed back kinda guys. I'm sure they'll be okay with it."

"Sounds like fun!" said Nyne. "I'm in! What about you, Dragona?"

"I don't see why not as long as we're not a bother."

"Of course not!" said Char. He then flexed a thick arm that formed into a wall of muscle. "Besides, we don't want you to miss the show." The girls giggled and left the tent with a plan settled.

Blast and Char smiled under the sun and over the sand. They stood in the warm sand in the skin tight bathing suits right next to Nyne and Dragona in bikinis. The duo held their girls' hands walking down the beach looking for Drago. Other pokemon noticed the two couples and stared at the giant lizard and turtle. The felt a little shy from the stares but the guys kept walking high in pride knowing everything was going great.

"Blast! Char!" The group noticed a dragonite in a black speedo next to a wigglytuff holding a camcorder.
"Hey guys!" greeted Blast. "What's up with the video camera, Wigg?"

"I thought I try something a little different!" answered Wigg. "I want to catch your muscles right in the action! What better place to do that than at the beach?"

Char chuckled. "That's true."

Wigg then noticed the slender nynetales and the dragonair by Blast and Char's side. "Who are these nice ladies?"

"These are our girlfriends, Nyne and Dragona," answered Blast.

"Nice to meet you, sir," said Nyne. "I hope you don't mind if our watching their session." Wigg didn't mind at all. In fact, he fell in love how Nyne and Dragona looked in their bikinis. He knew he had to capture them in film too.

"Say, how would you too feel about posing with these guys?" asked Wigg to the girls. "You look marvelous, if you don't mind me saying so, and it would give me great footage of you all to show! What'ya say?"

Nyne and Dragona were very surprised. Neither viewed themselves as modeling material, but if it meant to be closer to their boyfriends and a bit more fame, they didn't see why they couldn't.

They agreed and Blast, Char, and Drago pumped their muscular arms in excitement.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Planning Plans

choices: all three of use it at once!
one person uses it several times and becomes a giant!
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
They spent the entire day posing and performing feats of stregnth for the girls. Drago showed off some to Dragona but admitted he wasn't that interested in her. they flexed and flexed. By the end of the day they were sure they had grown a couple inches.

"What a great day!" Wiig said as he filmed, "However i need something for a finale."

They pulled out the belt and the three muscle giants stared at it.

"Hey ive got an idea!" Drago said, "How about"
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Do feats for the girls

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content: One of us uses the belt three times in a row to see how big we get we haven't really tested the limits right. Drago asks char and blast agree but they have to decided on who wears the beast they decide on
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: one person uses it several times and becomes a ...

choices: Shrink back down and call it a day
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content:
Blast looked at Char. He saw the shining in his eyes and knew that Char wanted first dibs. "Go ahead," Blast encouraged. In one move Char took the belt from Blast and puts it on, grinning from ear to ear. He tilted his head back, closed his eyes, awaiting the pleasure about to hit his body. "Bulk up!" His chest was the first to feel the warmth of growth, his pecs exploded outward and his abs found a way to become even more defined. His arms were not far behind growing to what seemed like max capacity and yet it still expanded. His legs reached outward, becoming even more toned as pillars of strength. As the warmth started to go away, char opened his eyes to nothing but ocean and sand. But after a few seconds, Char realized that wasn't the ocean, that was the sky! And that would make the sand... He reached up one hand to feel his new body. His pecs blocked his view downward to the point where he had to bend over just to see a shocked Blast and Drago. Blast's head could only reach up to half way up Char's 14-pack abs, which was now a 10-pack with two extra on each side in their own column. Drago didn't fair much better, only reaching just under Char's pecs.

Nyne and Dragona turned to see the commotion only to see a giant firebreathing dragon. Nyne ran up to the overgrown lizard, "Char, you're gigantic!" She looked straight forward only to be greeted by a speedo that was definitely at it's limit. She looked up to see the eyes of her boyfriend gazing down at her.

Char reached down with one giant arm and scooped her off the ground, bringing her up to his chest. His pecs seemed like they could fit one of her in each. Once she was raised up by a hand half the size of her to the giant's head, she sat in awe of her lover's massive body. Char began to lay down, placing Nyne on his pecs.
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: One big dragon

1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.content: Char was already nearly 15 feet tall, and he had to strap the belt around his wrist for fear of breaking it. “BULK UP!” He triumphantly yelled, now creeping up to nearly 17 feet tall, and getting to be around that in width as well. Every part of him was so swollen with muscle, and yet he could still move pretty freely somehow. To call him a tank would be an understatement, he could probably rip one in half for fun. He yelled bulk up again, his body shaking from the massive amounts of power it had. He was nearly 20 feet tall when he remembered about blast and draco. Draco barely reached to his waist, and blast was a little higher than his knees. “One of you guys should get a turn now. Who wants to go first?”
1212111111111111121111111211111212112111.title: Even bigger now!

1213.content: Matt was a trainer that just started, he walked through gale forest, and found himself being attacked my a pidgey, Matt was to scared and dazed to do anything and let out a big sigh as he is all injured and weakened. As he woke up he found himself with his charmander and nothing else. Charmander tried to heal his cut by burning and remove the bacteria. Matt knew he had to train,
1213.title: Big Matt

12131.content: He told charmander that he needed to get stronger and charmander nodded, he instructed charmander to do push ups and sit ups and after 2 hours, he came back to charmander now sweating and panting like he was about to die. He brought charmander some food from the shop. Charmander took a break and now he glanced at charmander's now improved muscle! He was amazed, as he felt charmander's bicep. It was now pretty hard and defined. He felt charmander's abs, which were 4 little burning wood on charmander's stomach. He was amazed at charmander's potential and improvement but what really shocked him is charmander's now huge bulging tree trunks on his legs. Charmander Grinned and continue training Matt said
12131.title: He trained Charmander Only

choices: Show the little tike the ropes to working out.
Let the little tike try out the belt.
122.content:
One morning, Char was off and on his own out in the breezy forest. He also had some workout equipment along with him, wanting to take a short break on his own and actually get some quiet time to himself. As much as he loved his fans, he needs this workout time on his own, and boy did he feel great. Char also had his belt handy, wearing it around his right calf while he was doing arm lifts with a 100-pound dumbbell. He takes his time, letting his muscles plump and heave up and down with each rep, getting the most out of his pumped body as he just does more and more. As for the rest of his equipment, it was mainly a few barbells, dumbbells, and weights. Char does one more rep, holding his flexed peak up in the air, and then caresses it with his other hand. "Nice 'n' big. Just the way I like it.", Char remarks.

Suddenly, the big dragon overhears what sounded like a twig being snapped. He quickly turns around. "Hm? Oh." Standing in front of him was the same charmander from before. "It's you."

"Um...hi Char." The tike scratches the back of his head, "Sorry if I'm interrupting you."

"Hm?" Char wanted time to himself, but he wouldn't mind the same li'l tike from before stopping by. "Naw, it's alright." The big charizard sets the dumbbell down, and then kneels his massive body down in front of the charmander. "So what brings you all the way up here?"

"Well, I was actually looking for you back at the circus, but then I saw you up here. So, I kinda just ran all the way up here on my own.", the tike explained.

"Really?", Char remark. "You climbed all the way up here on you own? That's pretty brave of you. Anyways, I was just finishing up a few reps for now." Char was about to grab the barbell, but then looks back at his number one fan. "Hey, how 'bout I give ya li'l show again. Would ya like that?"

The tikes eyes gleamed, "Really? That'd be so cool!"

Char stood back up and raised both his arms in a double bicep flex. To the tike, Char's biceps look like the biggest mountains he has ever seen. Char then puffed his chest to define his pecs and abs. They rippled with power and looked like power was going to erupt from him for the tike to share. Char knew what pose to do for a finale. He kneeled down back to the tike on one knee. Char grabbed his wrist and flexed his bicep right in front of the charmander's eyes. They looked bigger than from afar! The tike couldn't believe a charizard like Char could have such power. Char smiled at the tike, knowing he was amazed by him. "Want to feel?" asked Char. The tike blushed. "Umm...do you mind?"
"Not at all! Give it a shot!'

The tike placed his tiny hand on Char's gigantic arms. It was impossible for the tike to wrap his claw around a big arm like Char's. It felt cool from Char's scales yet warm from the energy he had deep within him. The tike couldn't believe it. Char's bicep felt harder than iron and steel! The tike couldn't take his hand off of Char's arm. "Wow," said the tike. "You're really strong." Char chuckled making all his muscles ripple slightly. "I do what I can." He then winked at him. The tike stared in awe of the massive muscles Char had. "This is so cool! I can't believe how strong you are." Char smiled and brought his arms forward to his chest and flexed both, his chest and biceps swellig out, large veins visible on both as his biceps swelled to large peaks of unimaginable strength, making the tike's eyes go wide with amazement. "How is that?" Char said with a big grin. "It was amazing! I hope i can be as big as you are someday." Char smiled, placing his hand on the tike's head and rubbed it softly. "I'm sure you will one day, you just have to work hard and never give up." The tike grinned broadly "I will I promise!"
122.title: Char and Tike (Side Story)

choices: The tike returns with his dad
1221.content:
Char actually felt even more exhilirated than before after all that. He was happy to have such an adoring little fan. "Hmm. Hey, want I give you a few pointers when you start workout one day?"

"Me? Pointers?" The tike looks at all the large equipment. "That stuff, kinda looks awful heavy..."

"Oh no, no", Char assures, "I'm not gonna make ya lift this stuff. Though it's always good to start training sooner than later." Char kneels his immensely muscled body down just like before, "Now, since you're very young, I wouldn't recommend any lifting of weights and that sort of stuff."

"Then, what should I start with?", the tike asks curiously.

Char winks, "You can jog. Perhaps maybe even do some push-ups or sit-ups."

"Push-ups? Sit-ups?"

Char chuckles. "Heh. Guess I'll have to show you that. But just remember, don't overdo it. It took me years to get this big.", Char lies. "So nothing'll come to you fast."

The charmander nods his head, "Okay."

"Alright. So how's about I show you them situps and pushup?", Char asks excitedly.

"Oh, okay!", the little guy replies.

"Good! So let's start with some situps." Char got down to the charmander and lied on his back with his hands behind his head. "First, you start at this position," Char started. He then lifted his upper body up without moving his arms. The tike could see Char's chest defining as Char got up between reps. "And then, you lift your upper body up and keep doing it until you reach a setted goal. Got it?" The tike nodded agreeing. "Good. Now you try," said Char.

The tike got into the position Char showed him and Char placed his hands on the tike's feet. The tike looked at him puzzled. "It's hard to keep your position in situps sometimes," explained Char, "Especially with beginners."
"How many should I do?" asked the tike.
"Hmm...I think ten is doable."
"Okay!"

Char didn't even have to say go. The tike began excitedly. Char counted each rep the tike completed. The tike began to slow down after his fifth rep. "Come on," Char encouraged, "You can do this! Just a few more!" His words fueled the tike to reach his tenth rep.

"Not bad.", says Char to the panting charmander. "Alright, you won't have to do this next, but I'll show you how pushups work." Char accurately gets into position, pushing his arms out against the ground while facing it. Without hesitation, and with slow speed, Char begins performing an impressive set of pushups, letting his arms and chest and back just gush out and pump with energy flowing through his swelling muscles. The little charmander almost couldn't believe what he was seeing. Seeing Char's massive body all plumped up, Char's great feats of strength and agility with each pushup, it's almost too good to be true. In a matter of minutes Char was all done, and he had only done about ten pushups! Char gets back up on his feet, and then flexes his entire upper body for show. "Ha-hah!"

The tike wiggles his arms around, "Oh my gosh! That was so COOL!"

Char crosses his muscled arms over his thick chest, "Thanks. Glad you liked it."

"Oh I more than liked it. I ENJOYED it!", the tike yells. He then runs up to Char, giving him the best hug he could. "Thanks for letting me stick around Char."

Char puts on a big grin, and then kneels down once again to hug the little guy back, "No problem."

"Oh! I just remembered! My dad must be looking for me."

"Oh. Well then, you'd better get going.", Char.

The tike runs off, but not before turning to give Char a wave back, "Will I get to see you again?"

"Sure! Feel free to stop by if ever. I'll be up here for a while. Just don't tell anyone.", Char replies.

"I won't." The little guy then runs off on his own.
1221.title: Lesson# 1

12211.content:
Char was currently off with a barbell being lfted over his head. That must have been his fifteenth rep, but he was feeling really proud about it. Char's upper body was feeling great, his muscles tensing and rippling from all over while he pants quite heavily from his recent lifts. "Ah... Yep. Really glad the little guy stopped by."

"Huh? What the heck are ya doin' up here?", a boar-like voice emitted.

Char's entire body twitches. "No... It couldn't be... Not him..." Char turns around, the sound of a creaking door eminating as he does. .... It was him. Char turns back away, looking completely uninterested now. "Oh great.", he mumbles.

"Huh? What was that? I couldn't hear ya?" The muscular crosses his large arms over his thick chest. "But seriously, you needed some time to yourself or something? Workout out all the way up here in the middle o' nowhere?"

Char's eye twtitches as he grits his teeth. "Uh...YES!", he yells in his head.

"Come on man, is this really what you do when you're not busy?", Embo mentions what was the utmost truth once again.

Char drops the barbell, facepalming himself. He then covers the pig's mouth, "Yes! Yes to ALL of that! And if you don't mind leaving? You're interrupting my me time."

Embo slips Char's hand off, "Actually, I'm glad you're here." Embo sets his hands on his hips, and then shows off his massive pecs and lats. "I was just going through a quick workout myself. And thought I stop by to show you what I've got."

Char's shoulders drop. "......Really?"

Embo grinned, nodding "Yea, I got to show ya how a real body builder does it." Char shrugged disinterestedly. "I'm not really interested in having a pose off with you. I just want to work on my reps, so if you don't mind.." Embo laughed. "Are you afraid? scared I might show you up?"

Char snorted. "You? show me up? that's a laugh" Embo gritted his teeth and stomped his foot, cuasing the ground to shake a bit. "Such big talk from a little lizard, come on and show me what you've got"

Char growled softly "Alright, alright. If it'll get you off my back then fine." Embo grinned, taking a step forward. "Get ready to lose, I'm not going to let myself lose to you." He raised his arms up, intertwining his fingers and lowering his arms a bit into a triangle shape, biceps bulging out to form great peaks of strength.

Char let out a sly grin. "We'll see about that!" Char raised his scaly muscular arms in the air and placed his hands on the back of his head. Not only were his biceps and triceps bulging to godly proportions, but his pecs and abs also swelled bigger in power. Embo felt a little worried but not afraid of Char's muscles yet. That is until Char performed a second pose. Char then pressed his arms downward. His arms grew even bigger before Char completed the pose. When Char stopped moving, Embo found himself literally staring at a mountain of muscle. Char's entire body plumped up. His arms and chest became more vascular and stroong than ever before. Even his legs showed excessive power. Embo couldn't believe it. There was no way the muscle boar can do that himself.
12211.title: Unexpected, and Unwanted, Guest

122111.content:
Embo's jaw was agape for nearly a minute now, his eyes wide and astonished at what he was seeing. Char had been holding his pose for that long just as well, his left arm flexing downwards while stretching his pecs and lats and his right arm flexed up in the air, tensing his rock-hard muscles as much as he can. The massive boar was staring closely at Char's right arm, watching it tense up with great power while accompanied by a good vein. Char even lowers his arm and flexes it right up again to make his thick peak bounce right up greatly. The powerful dragon looks down at his opponent, holding a big grin on his maw. "Too much to take in, huh."

It took a second for Embo to actually react. "Huh!?" He huffs as he turns away and crosses arms, "Ah shut up!"

Char walks up to the pig, his large arms crossed over his massive chest. "Face it, you've met your match, buddy."

Embo turns to Char with a fist up, "Ah you wouldn't be so tough with that belt of yours attatched to your leg!"

"Heh." Char points back to himself with his thumb, "I've been weight-training MUCH before I found this belt.", Char lies. He then sticks his belt-wrapped leg out to flex his enormous calf, just enough to flex the fabric of the power belt, "Besides, this thing only improves the experience."

Embo snorts, and then turns away while throwing his arm at Char, "Ah who needs ya!" The angry pig starts walking away. "I'll be back!"

"Whatever you say.", Char toys. Char smiled returning to his workout, having got sufficiently pumped up after that and needed to burn off this extra energy.he grabbed two dumb bells pumping one in each arm 30 times before taking a break for a minute and starting another set of the same amount. this was really easy for him. It was too easy for him and char began growing bored of it. he thought about the little flex off he'd just had, and it really excited him. "I suppose practing my poses wouldn't hurt.."

Char set down the dumb bells and stood up. wondering what kinds of poses he could do. After his posedown with Embo, Char didn't feel like doing any fancy poses, but he was curious how strong he was when he posed. Char curled his left arm making his bicep grow to the size of his head. He then patted his arm with his right hand. His bicep felt strong, warm, and big under his grip. Char smiled feeling like his bicep was hard as diamonds, like they were all shoved into his arm.

Char then took a breath and pushed up his chest to define his pecs and abs. His chest was just as strong as he stroked both his hands on it. He couldn't help feel happy about his shape and strength. Char would have admired it more if he didn't run out of air that supported his puff chest. Char relaxed from his poses feeling satisfied.
122111.title: Fight Fire with Fire

1221112.content:
Char sticks out one leg, and then thickens the massive quads and calf that surrounded it. He then gives his leg a good feel as well, just like he did with his other muscles. It's interesting. He barely got a lot of time to himself, but still, he was feeling even better about himself and his body than he probably would working out on his own. Suddenly, another set of footsteps was making its way towards the empowered dragon, who was still preoccupied with his thick leg. "Well, looks like someone's been enjoyin' himself."

Char's head bops up, he knew who's voice that belonged to. He turns around to see it was... "Oh, hey Blast!"

The big turtle crosses his arms over his broad chest. "I figured all this alone time would make you love yourself even more."

"Yeah, well... Wait...whaddaya mean by that? Anyways", the dragon pokemon continued, "I haven't exactly been by myself the whole time. You're the third as a matter of fact."

"Oh. Who else was here?", Blast asks.

"The little tike from earlier, which was okay, and Embo apparently.", Char replies.

"Betcha you were pretty ticked off at Embo, huh?"

"Heh, the guy actually challenged me to a posedown. But I won." Char does another pose, turning his upper body around to do a back double-bicep pose for his good buddy, "As you can see, this was too much for the guy."

"Impressive.", Blast remarks.

Char holds his astounding pose, "Anyways, why're you here?"

Blast shrugged a shoulder. "I was getting a bit worried since you've been gone for a while so I thought I'd come by over here to check up on you. Nice to know you weren't kidnapped!"

Char scoffed. "Do I look like I could be kidnapped?"

"Naw, I'm just messing with ya." Blast scanned with ground scattered with dumbbells and other weights. "Blowing off steam, I see."

"Yeah, I was thinking about going one more time before calling it a day. Care to join me?"

"Sure, bro!"

Blast noticed a weight bench next to Char and made his way towards it. He didn't waste time; he started pumping his arms by lifting the bar up and down till his muscles felt warm. Blast smiled to himself and pumped faster as his arms felt like they were burning. Char chuckled at his bro while continuing his dumbbell reps. As much as Char loved the sensation of working out, he loved seeing his arm muscles tense and relax from each rep. Each set his arms heated up more and more, the burning felt great as he worked his biceps and triceps. looking over at Blast he could see he was enjoying himself quite a lot as well. each pump of the bar showed off Blast's well defined biceps. they were like giant crags of immense strength and Char couldn't help but admire them. Blast, in between reps, looked over and noticed Char staring and grinned. "checking out the competition eh?"

Char smiled before nodding. "I'm just curious to see how much you can really lift" Blast grinned, flexing a bicep. "Well why don't we find out together, unless of course you'd rather do something else to test out our strength other than lifting weights."
1221112.title: Big Turtle Friend

12211121.content:
"Okay, put it back.", Blast grunts as he pumps with the bar for like the 25th time. Char does so, setting the bar on to the ground. At first, his turtle friend looked really tuckered out, but then he just takes in a deep breath. Blast gets right back up on his feet and then turns to his muscle-dragon friend, flexing one arm in the air as his bicep tenses with great power. "Alright bro. Let's see what these babies can do."

Char was a little astonished at first, but then grins the same as his friend. "Alright then." The big dragon walks over to the many weights that lay effortlessly on the grass. "Good thing I brought just enough weights.", Char winks to his friend. He then sets them up with a bar that ends up weighing 450 pounds. Char slowly lifts the weight up against his chest, and then turns around with it in his hands to look at his friend. The orange dragon raises an eyebrow, seeing his friend was looking a little uncomfortable with the heavy bar. "What's wrong? Ya ain't afraid are ya?"

Blast stares a bit at the bar, but then looks up at his friend and shakes his head, "Naw!" He then stands up straight to proudly pat his muscular chest, "Just staring at something that looks so easy to lift." Blast childishly turns his head away while folding his thick arms over his chest, "Hmph!"

"Really?", Char remarks. Char was about ready to return to the weights, "Alright then. I'm sure you won't mind if I add some more on to the bar."

"Gih-!" Blast reaches out with one arm, "No don't!"

Char turns his head back around and chuckles, "I thought so." Char sets the bar down gently on the grass, and then looks straight at his friend while crossing his arms over his meaty chest. "Now come on and show me what those arms of yours can do."

Blast steps up to the bar, and then takes a deep breath. He kneels down on one knee and grabs a firm hold of the heavy metal. With a low grunt, he shuts his eyes and slowly picks up the bar with surprising ease. The bar still was heavy, but Blast actually liked how heavy it was. As the heavy turtle starts lifting, he immediately started to feel the burn. The burn started in his arms and stretched to his meaty chest. Blast leveled the bar up to his chin already sweating. Blast kept pushing his hands upwards against the bar and Char smiled for his friend knowing what he was attempting. The bar was now right in front of Blast's eyes. With a huff of air from his mouth to his muscles, Blast rose the bar above his head. Char clapped loudly for his turtle friend's accomplishment.

Without hesitation, Blast threw the weight down with a loud slam that sounded like a boulder in a rockslide. The muscle turtle the raised his arms to flex them mightly in front of Char.
"How do you like that?!" asked Blast.
"Not bad!" replied Char. "Not bad at all!" He then gave another grin. "How about we kick it up a notch?"
"What do you have in mind?" asked Blast.
"Let's see if we can lift beyond our limits! I want to see our muscles deal with bigger weights. Bigger weights equals bigger muscles!"
Blast chuckled. "Okay, how much are we talking here?"
Char had to think for a second on how much would be a challenge.
12211121.title: Char's Iron Challenge

choices: Do some weight-lifting with the current weight.
122111211.content:
"How about we try lifting 700" Blast nearly choked on his netx breath of air. "700? are you sure?" Char nodded with a big grin.

"Absolutely, unless of course you can't handle it" Blast narrowed his eyes and puffed out his chest.

"I can handle anything you can."

"Great, then let's get started" Char picked up the weight and returned it to the stand and began loading up more weight. With each piece that was added to the bar Blast began getting nervous. FInally the last weights were slid on and Char gestured to it in a grand teasing gesture. "After you."

Blast stiffened his back and nodded and nervously grasped the bar. taking a deep breath he pulled the bar off and nearly let go again. The weight was immense, it made his arms burn with the effort just to hold it.

Char could see Blast's arms thickening under the pressure. Veins popped out of the muscle turtle's arms to provide blood and adrenaline to Blast's body. Blast gritted his teeth hoping making a scary face at the weight would magically make it lighter. Blast pulled harder making his body grow even more vascular.

The duo heard a ruffle of dirt underneath the weight. Blast managed to get the weight a few inches of the ground! Blast was growing exhausted but he had to keep going. He knew Char would never let it down in he couldn't pull off this feat. Blast took in deep breaths while pulling the weight even harder.

It was as if each huff of air gave Blast energy because each breath drew the weight towards his upper body. Char was very impressed when Blast rested the weight on his chest. Blast paused to rest a bit. "Umm, bro," said Char, "You sure you can do this?"

Blast turned to Char and smiled. "Yes. I. Can!" With a monsterous roar, Blast heaved his arms in the air lifting the weight over his head. Before Blast or Char could express their excitement, Blast dropped the weight to the ground with a loud thump. His knees followed, and then his hands.

Char walks up to his tired and panting friend. Looks like the bar really put a number on him. "Hey Blast, you okay?"

The big turtle manages to sit up in front of his best pal. "Nng... Yeah...", he replies with a rather weak grin. "That bar sure put a lot of stress on my body, but I think it was all worth it."

Char took look at his bro's throbbing muscles. His chest and arms were actually looking quite massive! As if his feat put a lot of pain in his body, but with stunning results. Char then decides to pat a hand against Blast's hardened arm. "Dude, you look AND feel great! It's almost as if I'm touching a grand statue, er somethin'.", the big dragon appraised.

"Whoa, you really think so?", Blast asks hesitantly. He slowly raises up his own arm, watching as his shredded bicep and tricep flex with great size and definition. "Wow...neat!", the excited sea turtle yells cheerfully.

"Looks like Dragona's gonna have a sight to see.", Char adds.

Blast suddenly remembers something, "Ack! Dragona! I forgot, I was only supposed to check on you!" The big aquatic creature was about to get up, but his thick body was still pretty strained. "Ow...!"

Char pats his hands on his friend's shoulders, "Hey, take it easy man." The orange dragon then helps his bro slowly get back up on his feet. "I'm sure she'll understand. No need to rush back down to her in your current condition. Plus, if anything, I'm sure she won't hate you too much after you show her what you've become.", Char winks.

Blast looks down to his chest, and then brings his meaty arms in against his sides to see his pecs swell out greatly. "Hm... I guess you may have somethin' there.", the turtle replies with his grin returning. He then turns around to head on his way while waving an arm back at his friend. "See ya bro!"

"See ya!", Char replies. The big dragon then turns his attention to the 700-lb weight. "Hmm... I wonder..."
122111211.title: 700 lbs. of Hard Steel

1221112112.content:
Char couldn't help but wonder if he could lift as much as Blast, maybe more. He did spend most of the day working out, meaning his muscles grew more powerful under the stress. However, Char didn't want to overdo like Blast did. He thought he could hurt himsef, so Char decided to give the 700 lbs. weight a try and if it was too easy he'll add more.

Char walked to the weight Blast dropped and squatted down to wrap his claws on it. The muscular dragon felt a bit nervous and hoped it didn't wear him out like Blast. With a heaving breath, Char tugged on the weight hard. He pulled it as hard as he could and within a minute the weight was up to his chest. It was hard work but it took him less time to get the weight to his meaty pecs than it for Blast. Char was right. His earlier workouts made him stronger, even stronger than his best bud! Char smiled to himself knowing that he had to see what he was truly capable of.

Char gave a small grunt as he pushed up, the bar slowly rising up past his shoulders, then his chin, and finally raising over his head into the air and he exhaled a deep breath and then lowered the bar again and let it fall to the ground, being careful not to let it hit his feet. "I wonder how much i can lift."

Char decided to tack on another 200 pounds onto the bar, and began lifting up the bar a bit to set it up. Soon the weights were on and he took a deep breath and clenched his claws together a couple times before grasping the bar. He took a couple short nervous breaths, then held it as he pulled up and slowly began pulling the bar up. This was definitely more of a challenge for him. His biceps felt like they were going to burst out of his arm.

The progress was long and arduous and it seemed like it was taking an eternity to raise the bar as high as his chest. Char had no idea if he would going to be able lift it all the way, but he had to try or he'd never get any better. He sucked in a deep breath through his teeth and strained as he pushed up the bar. Every inch above his chest felt like his biceps were being stabbed with Nidoran's Horn Attack. it was excruciating, but he could almost feel his biceps swelling to meet the challenge.

Before he knew it, the bar had risen over his chin and was steadily rising, soon passing his snout and he watched as the bar rose past his eyes and began enetering the open air as the bar finally cleared his head. "Come.. on... just.. a little more..." Char gave a low growl as he pushed with all he could and finally raised the bar all the way up and then let go of the bar. the weights hitting the ground with a thunderous boom.

Char followed Blast by landing on his claws and knees. He warm and exhausted from his workout. The muscle dragon kept gasping for air in hopes that'll cool him off. Char's arms felt extremely warm from the stress of the weight. Strangely, that warmth somehow stretched out to his chest and then to his legs. Char's whole body felt like it was on fire and it was unbearable, even for a fire pokemon. Char looked down at his chest and arms and was surprised to see his muscles more thick and clean cut than before. He then looked at his legs and they too grew more muscle power. They looked thicker than an giant oak tree! Char rubbed his chest and arms to feel their definition. To his pleasure, Char saw that his muscles were harder and sturdier than steel or iron. Eventually, the warmth in his body cooled leaving a sense of strength inside of him behind.

The big dragon just wanted to take in what he was packing for the moment. He merely lifts up his left arm, watching his studly arm muscles tense and practically flex up on their own, as well as his forearm being well-accompanied by snaking veins. He then sticks out his right leg, seeing that his leg muscles, his thighs especially, were immense. Almost like he could stomp the ground, making the world shake a bit around him. Last, but not least, were his pecs. He gave them a soft and gentle feel, feeling how hard and thick they've gotten. Suddenly, Char smirks and then pounds his chest a bit like a gorilla. 'ROOOAR!!' Char quickly comes back to his senses after that. "! Whoa... That was unexpected."

"Char?" The big guy jumps a bit, and then turns around to where the greeting came from. Turns out, it was the little tike from earlier. "Um, was that roar from you?"

"Oh! Uh, yeah.", Char chuckles. "I was kinda excited. Did you hear it?"

"Yeah...", the little charmander started to rub his ear, at least where it would be, "A lot of it."

Char walks up to the little tike and kneels down in front of him on knee, he then chuckles as he pats the little tike's head, "Sorry. I guess I couldn't really control myself."

The charmander looks up at Char's large hand, "Huh?" The youngan then pulls in Char's hand, as best he could, "Whoa! Char, you grew!"

Looks like Char wasn't the only one to take notice. "Yeah?" He then raises his patting hand show off his ginormous peak right in front of the little pokemon, "Glad you were able to take notice."

Not being as shy as before, the little tike goes right ahead takes a feel of the dragon's larger bicep. His paws were practically miniscule against Char's thickened peak. "Way cool! Did you use the belt again?"

"Nope.", Char replies. "I just worked out on my own with a really heavy weight, and then", Char raises up both his arms in a powerful double-bicep flex, "boom!" The small charmander cheers for his biggest inspiration once again. Although Char wasn't completely sure what could have caused his growth so quickly, he knows for certain it must have been the belt working its magic. The muscley dragon then relaxes his arms, "So what brings you back all the way up here? Ya just can't stay away, can ya.", Char laughs.

"Well, I, just wanted to come back and check on you. Since I was still here."
1221112112.title: No Pain, No Gain

choices: The tike has to go. Someone else shows up after.
Someone shows up while the tike was still with Char.
12211121121.content:
Char was happy to see the charmander kid again. More so than before because the tike noticed his new size and strength. Char wanted to impress the kid even more but he already did a pose session for him. What kind of new show could he pull for him. Involuntarily, Char fluttered his wings. He took notice and got a great idea. "Hey, little bud," said Char, "Have you ever rode on an airplane before?"

The charmander kid didn't know why his muscle hero was asking but he answered, "N-no, why do you ask?"

Char got onto one knee to meet the tike in the eyes. "How about you and I go for a ride through the sky?" Char hinted his intention by fluttering his wings again at the tike.

"You want me to fly with you?" asked the tike nervously. "I don't know. I never been on a airplane before. What if I fall?"

"Don't worry," assured Char placing his giant hand on the tike's shoulder. "I'll hold on to you very tightly. I won't let you go. I promise we won't fly up too high. Trust me, you'll love it! It'll give you something to look forward to when you evolve into a Charizard! What do you think?"

The tike was still nervous but he did trust Char. He knew that Char wouldn't hurt him. "Okay," answered the young charmander, "But do it fast before I change my mind!"

Char laughed and then winked at the tike. "Don't worry, you won't." The tike nodded, still a little nervously before Char picked him up, holding him tightly to his chest, and the tike couldn't help but marval how solid they were. Char smiled as his wings began flapping, gently at first, then picking up, slowly gaining power as great winds buffeted the dirt.

Soon Charizard began floating a little with each beat, and then with geat flare he shot up a bit intot he sky and the tike yelped a little in surprise before he quieted down in excitement. Char felt the gentle winds flowing past him as he picked up a little more altitude, enjoyng the feel of the wind, but stopped when the tike shivered nervously and he looked down and noticed he'd gone up quite a bit. "O-Oh.. sorry little guy.. i just got carried away."

"I-it's okay.." Slowly Char descended a bit, and he began moving forward, enjoying the breeze that now washed over his entire body and the tike gave a small start of surprise. "This is really cool!"

Char laughs proudly at his fine, not-yet-evolved friend, "See? I knew you'd love it!" Char was taking it easy especially, flying around trees with ease, even flying over the circus where a few pokemon were taking notice of them from above. As the two were just flying up above, the big dragon looks down at his little dragon friend, seeing he was really enjoying himself. Even sticking out his arms to try to simulate himself flying. So Char thought, why not a tricks? Nothing too hasty of course. The first thing Char did were a few twirls while bulleting through the air. He takes a quick look down to see the little guy was surprised, but really enjoyed it most of all. "Mind if I did a few more tricks?"

The charmander looks up at his hero, "Sure! As long as it's not too fast."

"You got it!", Char winks. The massive reptilian then darts up towards the sky in a twirling motion. He was really recieving some massive air! "Oops!" Char looked down, seeing the two were A LOT higher than ever. Before Char could do anything else, stops right he was in mid air.

"Um, Char, why are we stopped here?", the tike asks.

"Um...well...", Char just thought he let the little guy see for himself.

Looking down, the tike could see there were really up there. Even higher than the mountains around them. The tike then looks up, seeing a pidove fly right past them. The big dragon immediately felt the little guy start to tremble in his grasp. "Um...Char...I think I'd like to go down now..."

"Not a problem.", Char assures. He would never want scare his biggest fan. Like Embo did. Char slowly floats to the ground, and then covers the tike's eyes while holding him ever so gently in his protectively muscular arms. "Don't worry. I've got you." Back on the ground, Char made sure if the tike was okay. "Heh, sorry about that. I guess I got a little carried away."

"No, it's okay. I'm just glad you were there to protect me the whole time.", the tike says warmly.

Char suddenly sniffles after that, but then yells into his head, "Come on Char, don't cry!"
12211121121.title: Soaring High

122111211212.content: what was it that showed up at that moment?
122111211212.title: Someone shows up while the tike was still with ...

choices: What time of day do you prefer?
123.content:
As the day rolls by, normally people would be out watching the sunset together, if they wanted. But not this night. In fact tonight is another night for Char and his friend Blast to appease the crowd once again with their fastastical feats. Only this time, tonight is what's known as their, like, one-hundredth show! Inside their popular circus tent, the two muscle mons began enticing the crowd with their usual feat of lifting a very large triangular weight. This has become more of an easy task, though still just as fun as they thought of different ways to show off their strong muscles with said weight.

For the next part of the show, they came up with an idea a couple attractions back that involved Char picking up his heavyset friend and flying around the circus with him while Blast shot a couple minor fireworks from out of his shell. It's very stunning indeed, as the two then drop back to the ground to show off their best and most muscular pose, until one final firework shoots off, exploding behind them as their large muscles glowed all around them from the explosion of fireworks. After that is their finale. It WAS going to be their usual flex-off routine while using the belt, but tonight they wanted it to be different. Even though they weren't precisely sure what number show this is.

Char has always been thinking about how big he could get with the belt, but this was something Blast was always skeptic about. For one thing, he was concerned it would scare a few folks, and another being if he could handle all the...a-hem, bulk. What got Blast to go through with it was that Char wanted his bro to use it too. Char put on the belt first, which starting to fit tight, but luckily its fabric was stretchable. As Char yelled out the magic words to the crowd, Char's body began its warm endevor, thickening out from all around while the muscled dragon flexes various muscle groups. In just over a minute, Blast's eyes marveled at the 10-foot sight of his best friend. This may very well be the biggest and most ripped he has ever seen of his bro, thus far.

Char raises up his arms in great massive flex, his biceps flexing out like boulders! The crowd went wild, as Char then lowers his arms against his sides to protrude out his massive pecs. Blast couldn't believe what he was seeing, until Char handed over the belt to him. Only being able to hold it with two fingers, Char drops the belt onto Blast's hands. Now it's the big turtle's turn. Blast slips the belt on around his wrist, and then says aloud the words everyone else has been waiting for. Blast's body immediately tenses up right after. Char had his arms crossed over his burly chest, grinning as he watched his bro grow right in front of him. Blast's chest started to stretch out, becoming much more thick, even with his shell. The big turtle's arms began to fill out even more, even growing a little more lengthy to support his rippling arm muscles. Blast could feel his biceps fill out against his padded pecs, but he was sure enjoying his moment of bliss. His legs were included in the set as well, which started to become much more meaty and well muscled out. They too also lengethed out just enough to support his growing thighs and calves.

It was long until Blast's magic growth spurt had come to an end as well. Once the large turtle opened his eyes, he was now standing almost as tall as his big bro, in a, friend sort of way of course. Char pats his friend on the shoulder proudly, his blue friend smiling proudly back. They both then glance at the crowd before them, and then pull out the most stunning poses they could think of! Char's was a great double-bicep while sticking out his thick pecs and right leg. Blast's was a lat spread while keeping his arms tensed up and stuck out against his sides. The two bodybuilders just let the crowd cheer on for the time being, feeling really proud of themselves.

All of sudden, the two musclemons gacked in pain, their bodies starting to ache like there was no tomorrow. They even started to glow a few times, like any normal pokemon would. They slowly starting to glow a few times while they clenched on to their aching bodies, and then...they both fall flat to the ground. The crowd was silent, unaware of what just happened. In a moment of desperation, their arcanine boss slides out on stage in front of the two. "Give it up for Char and Blast everyone!" The crowd slowly started to clap, one-by-one, until the audience was starting to pick up like they normally would. Their boss then looks back worriedly at his two best circus mates. "Eh-hem, well, that'll be all for tonight! Looks like these two really tuckered themselves out. But don't worry, they'll be just fine!" The crowd cheers one last time. "Thank you everyone for attending! We'll see ya next time!" He then whispers to himself, "If there's going to be a next time..."
123.title: Char and Blast (Another side Story)

choices: Blast and Char try to change back
Blast and Char try their new powers
1231.content:
The next morning, a thick ray of sunlight start to appear though a small hole of the tent. It was beaming strongly down the hole and right onto Char's forehead. The sound dragon soon started to wake up. "Hm...?" He stares blankly at the tent for a moment, until the beam decided to hit him in the pupil. The dragon picked himself up in while covering his eyes, "AUGH! My eye!"

"Ah, you're awake." The agonized dragon looks at his boss with one eye. "Good to see you're still up at it."

"Well, yeah. Of course I am." Char takes a look around. "Hey, where am I?"

"You're still in the show tent. Duh.", the arcanine explains.

"I am? Why didn't you take me to my usual tent?"

"Well, we tried.", Char's boss replies, "Even with everyone pitching in you two were still too heavy to even budge."

"Oh. That's right...", Char remembered. "Well, then where's Blast?"

"He should be back any minute. Boy was he shocked at himself when he woke up."

"Oh. Was it because of his massive bod?", Char remarked.

"Actually, it wasn't just that." Char raised an eyebrow at him. The arcanine then hands a mirror over to Char, "You might wanna take a look at this." Char grasped the mirror as he rocked forward, standing up with little difficulty. Looking intot he mirror his breath stops and he nearly drops the mirror, the end of the handle being caught in his claws as he stared into it.

"Boss your sure this isn't a trick mirror?" Char lowered the mirror as he raised his left arm, sprouting out of his wrists were some new sort of wings, but they didn't quite look like they would help him fly faster without looking totally ridiculous. Curling his tail he found that it had a few ridges protruding near the end of his tail, and one large spike near the base of it

"This is too weird.." Char's wings bristled as he looked intot he mirror again, finding that the horns on his head had changed as well. Looking from wing to wing, he found they changed a bit too. They looked a bit ragged, like a cat had decided to come claw them up while he had been out cold.

"It's weird but I like it!" Char turned around and dropped his jaw. He saw a muscular turtle-like pokemon he almost didn't recognize. The buff turtle carried a bigger shell on his back with a huge nozzle sticking out of the top center. He also had smaller shells on his wrists each with a smaller nozzle poking out.

"Blast?" asked Char, "Is that you?" Blast nodded satisfied with his new body and his best bro's. "Yep!" Blast responded with a flex of a even bigger bicep than from the show. "Man, I can't get over our new look! We look bigger and stronger even without the belt!"

"But how did that happen?" asked Char. "We're already fully evolved!"

"Maybe not..." Dragona stepped forward. "I once heard of a rare type of evolution that only applied to very strong pokemon. It's called...mega evolution."

"Mega evolution?" repeated Blast and Char repeated simultaneously.

Dragona continued, "Mega evolution is when a strong pokemon changes its form without changing into a totally different pokemon. It also makes them stronger than their previous form." Char and Blast got more excited as Dragona explained making the muscles swell with enthusiasm and power.

"I've also heard rumors that mega pokemon can change between their original forms and mega forms at will." That sealed it. Blast and Char were completely excited about their new change. They truly believed they could do anything now. Char imagined showing off his new mega form in front of an audience screaming of applause louder than ever before. Blast pictured transforming into mega for the first time for the audience and the amazement he and his bro would get.

"This is awesome!" shouted Char.
1231.title: Mega Char and Mega Blast?!

choices: If ya can't beat 'em, might as well join 'em.
Blast decides to stay the way he is a little longer.
12311.content:
"Shouldn't we check if we can change back?", Blast asks frankly.

"What!?", Char yelps, "We JUST turned into mega pokemon and you wanna change back already?"

"Because if what Dragona says is true, then we'd be able to change right back to our mega forms. Got me?", the turtoise explains.

Char's broad shoulders drop, "Oh. Okay. But, I wouldn't even know where to begin."

Blast holds up a finger, "How about we try and just think about it. Maybe then it will just start to happen on its own."

"Hmm... Okay." Char starts by thinking seriously, clenching his eyelids closed as a vein starts to poke out on his forehead, "HRRRNNNG..." Suddenly, it seems the large dragon just 'broke wind'.

The three took a step back, Blast being the one to speak up, "What're you doing?"

Char stomps his large foot, "I'm trying to change back! What do ya think I'm doing!?"

Dragona speaks up, "Well, I never said it would be so easy."

"Maybe you're trying too hard," suggested Nine. "Try to relax a bit more. You might change back."

Char thought his foxy girl had a point. He did feel a sense of tension ever since he transformed. Char closed his eyes again and took a deep breath. He could feel the heat in his muscles cooling. Suddenly, he felt his heart drop from his mighty chest. When he opened his eyes, Char saw his arms had no wings, his tail was its regular shape, and his back wings didn't look ragged.

"It worked!" Char exclaimed. "I'm back to normal!"

Blast was happy to see his bro back to normal again. "Okay, Blast," said Char, "You try now." Blast shifted his weight from one foot to the other as he closed his eyes to concentrate. He let himself relax, feeling the overwhelming heat slowly draining from his body. He felt a suddeny shift in balance and he could feel the weight on his back getting lighter as his heart slowed down to a normal pace.

Opened his eyes slowly, he was glad to see he no longer had cannons attached to his arms and he looked up, noticing the large cannone that was on top of his shell was gone too, replaced by the familiar two on each shoulder. "that is much better, never thought I'd miss this shell of mine." Char grasped Blasts's shoulder grinning.

"Well you'll miss it that much more when we change back, I want to see if we can do this whenever we want."

"What? come on Char we just changed back, why do we have to go mega again so soon?" Blasts's complaint fell on deaf ears as Char took his stance and focused, thinking about his muscles bulging upwards, growing hotter and hotter, witht he intensity of a active volcano. He could feel his body shifting as the heat intensified, his body pushing out with more muscle and he slowly opened his eyes as the shifting stopped. Turning his arms back and forth he grinned excitedly at the wings now back on his wrists.

Char lifted his arm up and flexed his left bicep, watching it flood with wild power. "Now this is something i can get used to."
12311.title: Just Checking

choices: Blast and Char try to explain
123111.content:
Blast looked at Char's grin of happiness over his new powers and saw a hint of desire in Dragona's eyes as they were staring at him. He had to go mega one more time. Blast clenched his hand, closed his eyes, and held his breath. He could feel his heart pounding harder and harder after each second. Instantly, he felt his is shape changing and growing more powerful. Blast opened his eyes to see cannons on his wrists again, a massive single cannon on his shell, and even bigger muscles on his body.

Blast grinned and flexed playfully trying to squeeze as much power as he could into one bicep. "This is so awesome!" said Blast. Dragona looked mesmerized by her turtle boyfriend's power erupting right in front of her. Nine felt the same way about Char. The girls could see the muscle duo were bigger and stronger than ever before. Dragona and Nine had to see it for themselves.

Dragona stepped forward to Blast. "Umm...you...look great," uttered Dragona.

Blast blushed making his blue cheeks a slight rosy red. "Thanks, babe," replied Blast. "You think so?" Dragona places her hand againt Blast's pillow-like pecs and felt the warmth and power sleeping inside.

She smiled. "I know so!" Nine stared at Char as he continued flexing his biceps, obviously putting on a small show for her. She couldn't help the firery red blush plastered on her cheeks as she reached out, giving one of char's biceps a big squeeze, but unable to push her fingers intot he rock hard muscle at all.

"Oh wow.. you're muscles are amazing." Char grinned, feeling a bit hot cheeked himself.

"Aww thanks!" Char wrapped a meaty hand around Nine who yelped in surprise as he lifted her up and set her down on his bicep. "hope you enjoy the ride."

"R-Ride? oh!" Nine gasped in surprise and she grasp Char's shoulder as he steadily flexed and relaxed his bicep, letting her rise up and sink as his bicep did.

Blast and Dragona stare warmly at the two lovebirds, Char continuing with his arm curls and bicep lifts. Blast was also holding Dragona close in his muscular arms. The serpent could even feel her turtle's pecs rise in and out against her back. Blast speaks up, "Those two sure seem to be having fun." The big turtle looks down at Dragona, "Hey, would you...like if I gave that a shot...?", Blast asks, with the squimish attitude he has.

Dragona quickly turns around so she was facing the big lug. She hugs him as best she could, "No, it's okay. I like this just as much."

Blast chuckles, bringing Dragona close as well. "Well, if you say so." Blast suddenly tenses up his muscles all around Dragona, almost enough for her to be squished into all his bulk. "Eh, this isn't what you meant, huh?"

Dragona chuckles in return. "Oh you..."

"Hey Blast.", the muscle turtle looks at his pal, "Mind if I chat with ya for a sec?" Char goes ahead and gently sets Nyne down.

"Uh, okay." The two muscle mon then walk off far enough to be chatting on their own.

The two ladies stood beside each other, giving each other a confused look. After a moment of silence the two weight-lifters turn back, Blast having rosier cheeks than usual. Dragona grows a little worried. "Oh boy..."

Suddenly, Char takes a big stomp forward with his pumped leg, "Nyne!"

Blast does the same his pumped leg, mirroring his friend, "Dragona!"

In unison, the two tensed up their entire bodies as they raised their arms up with grace and perform the best double-bicep pose they could, sticking out their chests as best they could, "We appreciate you THIS MUCH!"

Nyne and Dragona stare a little awkwardly with open jaws, "......"

So was there boss. "...Am I interrupting something?"
123111.title: Play Fire with Water

choices: They make it to the new town.
They have something else in mind.
1231112.content:
Char and Blast stare blankly at their boss. Their boss doing the same. Char speaks up after a moment of silence, "...Uhhh...hey."

The arcanine points back with a thumb, "I'll uh, just be heading back to my tent. You and Blast can meet me there whenever you're done with...", he starts waving a hand, "...this."

Dragona and Nyne look at each other, and then at the two studs. Their cheeks puffed up, and then they start laughing out loudly. Char and Blast stood side-by-side, their cheeks glowing a little red. Blast glances sternly at his broad friend, "You and your bright ideas."

The two ladies take their own leave out of the tent, Nyne looking back at them while Dragona was still laughing her head off, "We'll see you two later."

Char and Blast wave awkwardly back, "See ya..."

The muscled turtle then balls his hand into a fist and wacks Char right on his noggin. "OWWW!! What was that for!?"

Blast folds his muscular arms over his broad chest, "Oh you know why!"

It was only a matter of minutes before they reached the captain's tent. Blast was still feeling fidgety after their event, Char trying his best to comfort his rather large friend. "Come on, Blast! You gonna give me the cold shoulder now? 'Cause that's just weird coming from a dude."

Blast completely ignores his friend, "Boss, you wanted to see us?"

The boss nodded. "Yes boys, please take a seat."

The two did as they were told and the chairs squeaked slightly under their massive weight. "What's up?" asked Char.

"Well, I was wondering if you two could do me a favor."

"Of course!" said Blast. "We'll do anything!"

"Well, I just looked at the tickets for our next show. We're going to have a small audience if we don't do some last minute advertising."

"Did you have anything in mind, sir?" asked Char.

"I was thinking about spreading the word to the nearest town from here. It's about a half-hour drive from here. I was hoping my best strong men would use their muscle and charm to attract more people to see our last show."

Blast and Char smiled. They loved road trips. They used to take them all the time before they joined the circus. Road trips plus muscles equalled very happy big pokemon. "We'll be happy to do it, sir!" said Blast.

The boss sighed in relief and happiness. "Great! Thank you so much you guys! I owe you one!" Blast and Char walked out of the tent feeling excitement of their new assignment.

Char pumped his arms swelling them till veins stretched from his shoulder to wrists. "This is going to be so cool! I can't wait to go!" Blast grabbed Char by the shoulder with a bigger smile on his face.

"You okay, bro?" asked Char.

"I just had a great idea to ad for the circus while we're there!"

"We'll give em a gun show like we always do!"

"No, I mean more than that! I think I know how we can attract people even more!"

Char raised an eyebrow and said, "How?" Blast grinned as he brought his arm up and flexed his bicep, letting the thick vein snake it's way across the muscle.

"Well I don't see why we can't have some fun while we help out the circus. We can advertise the circus and let some of the younger pokemon paint pictures of the circus on our bodies if they wanted." Char reached back and scratched the back of his head as he thought it over.

"Painting on our bodies? can we still show off our guns?" Blast laughed before flexing his bicep even harder, pushing out his veins even further as it made it's way all the way up to his shoulder.

"What kind of performers would we be if we didn't show off our talents?" Char grinned as he wrapped his hand around Blast's bicep giving it a firm squeeze, feeling the solid muscle beneath.

"Great! I can't wait to get started."
1231112.title: Awkward...

choices: They were successful in their mission
They didn't get that much people
12311121.content:
Blast and Char borrowed a minivan that the circus occassionally use to get to town. After they reached their destination, Blast got the facepaint while Char got the table to set out for the face paint cirucs ad. Char grunted pulling the table out of the minivan and lifted it over his head.

"How come I got stuck with the heavy lifting?" huffed Char.

"Come on, bro," said Blast. "It's not that bad. Think of it as a warm up for the main event!"

Blast and Char set the table on a random sidewalk of the city and set a poster advertising for the circus. They were already getting stares from people walking by because of their giant sizes. After they were done, Blast and Char took a seat next to their table ready to spread the word of the circus.

A few shouts and poses from Blast and Char caught some people's attention but not enough to stop and get tickets for the circus. Char sighed. "I don't know if this is working bro. Most of the guys here think we're a couple of weirdos!"

Blast patted Char's shoulder. "Relax bro. We've only been at this for about an hour. Just be a bit more patient. We'll get more people for the show. I promise! Let's just keep doing on what we do best!"

The two continued their posing, mainly just flexing their muscles than shouting. Char didn't even seem much into it as his friend here, just flexing certain parts without much interest. "Hm?" The enlarged dragon barely notices a small pokemon standing before him. A buneary at that. "Well, hi there little guy!"

The lone buneary just stares brightly at Char. He wasn't excited, but he wasn't scared either. "There you are..." The two muscled pokemon look up behind the little one, noticing a tall lopunny walk up behind her youngan. She puts her hands on her hips, "I can't walk ten feet without you walking off on your own, can I." She looks up at the muscular duo, "Oh, hello. Guess he walked up to you guys, huh."

Char struts himself up a bit, "Yup. Sure did."

The lopunny picks up her yougan, "What exactly is going on here?"

"We're actually from out of town, here to entice new customers to come check out our circus.", Blast explains happily.

"Oh.", the lopunny replies. "So, are you guys like, performers from there?"

"Yup! We sure are!", Char replies excitedly. He elbows his pal, and they both flex a fine side chest pose, "Me and my friend are known as the 'strongmen' of the group." They even gave her a wink.

The lopunny chuckles softly. "Wow. Sounds interesting. I think I might be interested."

Blast holds up a thin paintbrush, "Here, would you like to let your kid draw on us?"

"I-hi'm sorry?", she chuckled.

"Yay! Drawing!", her child yelps.

"We're also doing this thing where we let kids draw on us for fun.", Char adds. "How 'bout it?"

The buneary starts air clenching for the brush in the lopunny's arms, "Well...if you want to."

She sets her youngan down, "Yay!"

"You know, it's funny." Char and Blast turn their gaze to her. "Normally my young would be afraid of burly pokemon like you. And you two are the biggest I've seen yet. Guess you two must have a lot of experience with kids."

"Well sure!", Blast replies, handing the buneary his brush.

Char and Blast flex one bulging arm beside the other, "We're a child-friendly circus!"

"Well that's good.", the lopunny replies happily. "'Cause this town is full of them."

"Are there a lot of adults like you too?", Char winks, only to get wacked by Blast in return, "Ow!" Char rubbed his arm where blast had struck him and shot him a small frown.

"what was that for?" Blast only crosses his arms in response.

"You know why. don't flirt with every woman you see." Char blew out a puff of smoke from his nostrils as he nodded his head before the smile came back.

"Hey I can't help it, I see a pretty woman and I can't help complimenting her" This earned him a smile from the Lopunny. Blast rolled his eyes, but a smile played at his lips as he simply shook his head.

"Alright you big ham then you get to be painted on first." Char smiled as he nodded his head.

"Okay okay. It's only fair i guess." Blast slowly lowered down onto one knee as he handed the buneary the small plastic containers of paint.

"You can draw whatever you want." The buneary was practically hopping with excitement as Char squatted down and smiled, flexing his bicep, letting the pokemon's eyes go wide with excitement. As he dipped the brush into some blue paint Char did he best to hold still. The paint felt cool against his skin and a small laugh bubbled up. "Man that is some cold paint."

It only took a couple minutes for the small kid to finish before he handed the brush back to blast. As Char stood up he twisted his arm around to admire his new 'tattoo.' In a cool deep blue paint was a small smiley face that looked like a pikachu's face. "Nice! you're a great artist."

The buneary cheers a little for himself, his mother laughing a bit in return. She picks up her little one, "You did a great job."

Char holds out a small flier to her. "Glad your kid had fun." He flexes a bulging arm of his own, "There'll be more of this if you and him both would like to come to our circus." Blast nudges Char on his side a bit.

The lopunny takes the flier. "I'll have to think about it now. See you soon." The lopunny walks off on her way, Char and Blast watching as their first customer walks away with her child.

Blast hears a sniffle come from his pal. "You okay?"

Char wipes his eye. "Brings tears to my eyes."

"What? That her kid had fun?"

"No. I just wish I could be that kid, being picked up by such a fine lady." Blast sticks his large, tensing arm out, ready to pulverize his friend. Char shields himself, "I'm kidding!!"
12311121.title: New Town, New Faces

123111211.content:
Char had an X-shaped bandage on the back of his head. Although it hurt like the dickens, he had to ignore it because their first customers actually attracted a lot of attention. Mothers and fathers from all around were starting to crowd their spot a bit. It was a little overwhelming, but nothing would be too overwhelming for the two bodybuilders anymore. "Wow. This is a hefty crowd.", Char remarks.

"Yeah, this sure to boost our ratings.", Blast adds. "Remember Char, I'm watching you."

"Oh for pete's sake! Fine, why don't I let the fathers with their kid, and you the mothers with theirs.", Char assures.

Blast smirks, "Heh. I knew you'd play right into my trap."

"Wait, what?!", Char yells.

Blast sticks his tongue out playfully, "Kidding. Hah!"

Multiple children were picking up paintbrushes and slowly approached Blast and Char. One little Meril child approched Blast painting a rainbow on his left pec while a Cubone painted a small peace sign on a free space of Char's bicep. So far it seemed Blast and Char were doing pretty at advertising for the circus. They were also having some fun along the way.

As their muscular bodies became more covered in paint, Blast and Char flexed slightly to themselves and saw how the paint stretched and rippled with each flex. Blast and Char looked at each other and winked. It was time to show the crowd a sneak preview of their circus show. After the last child was done painting, the duo stood up.

"Ladies and gentlemen," said Char, "Thank you so much for all your support today!"

"Please allow us to show you what you'll see at the circus if you decide to come!" said Blast.

"Yea! You won't See anything like this anywhere else!" Char grinned as he stood tall, his wings twitching in excitement. As the last kid backed up and went back to his parents Char raised both arms up until his hands, now curled into fists, rested in the air near his head. As he took in a deep breath ne clenched his fists tightly and flexed. A sudden wave of awe spread over the crown as Char's biceps inflated to their maximum peaks.

Sitting on each great hill of muscle squirmed crisscrossing veins that snaked their way upto his shoulders. The way his biceps bulged stretched out every painting, making them bigger and much more pronounced. Several kids were point out at their pictures on Chars biceps as they expanded and grew more and more visible. Blast nodded his head in approval as he took a couple steps away from his friend and tensed his chest.

Taking a deep breath Blast clenched his fists together as he held them a few inches away from his abs. As he flexed, he clenched his stomach muscles as well. A wave of gasps broke through the eager silence as Blast's biceps exploded with power. Each one turning into a squirming mass of massive muscles. The veins snaked their way from his biceps down to his hands. As he moved his arms away from his abs he showed off his rock solid Eight pack abs. Each one looked like they had been etched into stone. The only thing moving was the visibly protruding veings that snaked their way over each ridge of muscle and arch their way up to his chest.

"If you want to see more of this performance, come see us at the circus, we have games, popcorn, cotton candy and of course the full range of talented pokemon who put it all together." Char and Blast each took in a deep breath as each one did their best to flex as hard as they could, pushing their muscles to their peak of physical perfection.

"We hope to see you there!" A loud wave of cheering erupted from the gathered people as all the various pokemon admired their strength, the way they uphold each muscle to the best of their abilities. A short while later after the crowd had begun dispersing Blast gave Char a big smile as he draped a meaty arm over his friend's shoulder.

"Think we drummed up enough interest for the circus?" Char nodded his head, a wide grin on his face.

"I'd definitely think so. Now how we get on back, might be fun to show off all our new tattoos to the others. I bet our girls will love them." Blast gave a big heart laugh as he squeezed his friend in a shoulder hug.

"I bet they will."

info.brief_description: Digimon and Pokemon gaining muscle in their own way!
info.description:
You'll basically have your pick of any digimon or pokemon from any season, gaining muscle through hard work or through just plain wackiness. It's up to you! You're free to include more than one character in each chapter, so long as the one you chose doesn't take away the plot from the main character. You can even mix them up, so long as the main character is being written about in the proper place.

It's gonna be an E-rated interactive, so nothing too graphic please.

Last, it's not mandatory, but I'd like at least 100 characters per chapter.
